72a3(phal chen): dpa' thams cad las rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongasu ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho rjes ni ji lta bu zhig du yongasu son/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes rgya mtsho rnams ni
72a4(phal chen): ji lta bu zhig du yongasu ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs rtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsam pa ji lta bu zhig du 'jig 'arten gi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa
72a5(phal chen): mdzad kyang / sems can rgya mtsho rnams kyang snyan pa mdzad grang bar/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang san pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang ga 'ams rgya mcha snyan pa mtshad grang / 
72a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang snyan pa mdang / grang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang snyan par mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang snyan pa
72a7(phal chen): mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi shin du bstan pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad rgya mtsho rnams kyang bsam
72b1(phal chen): ba mang grang snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis mchod pa'i dkyil 'khon gyi ston de dag las tshig su bcad pa 'di dag 'byung ngo // mtha' yas rgya mchen bskal par rab spyad / 
72b2(phal chen): byang chub shing drung ra 'byung yang dag skyes/ bya mtha'i skal bar 'gro ba'i sbyin gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pas sku ni byin gis rabs/ 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi the tsom bcod// mos pa'i stobs ni yangs pa rab tu skyed/ 
72b3(phal chen): sems can sdug sngal mtha' yas zhi bar mdzad// sangs rgyas bde ba la 'gro ba thams cad 'god/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas zhing rdul snyed/ de bzhin gshegs la lta zhing kun nas gnas// de dag bsam
72b4(phal chen): paspyod yul ji bzhin du// the tsom bsal bar chos rnams rab bstan gsol// rgyal ba kun gis na jil du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gi rgyud rnams dang / sangs rgyas byin rlabs mtha' dang dbus myed pa/ 
72b5(phal chen): de dag tshul ni rnam dag stan du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul 'jug/ rgyal ba'i mkhyen la dza ltar 'jug pa dang / rgyal chen mtha' yas stobs rnams rnam sbyangs pa// rgyal sras kun la yang dag
72b6(phal chen): bsun dug sa'i/ sangs rgyas cing 'dzinang lang mtha' yas dang / me bsnyengs chos nyid ji ltar rnam sbyangs dang / rdzu 'phrul mthu' yang mtha' dang dbus myed pa// 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams la ba sgrag du gsol/ 
72b7(phal chen): ngazhin chos rgyal po tha la mnga' mang dacing // rgyal ba'i phung yul ji ltar mi 'phrogs dang // sangs rgyas chos gzhan bya rang dag dang / drugs brtse'i srang du yang dag bstan du gsar// rgyal 'i slar mang lta
72b8(phal chen): tshad myed cing / san dang de bzhin ljags dang // sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji la mtha' yas pa// 'di dag tshul 'i 'jug pa stan du gsol// ning rnams rgya ma mdze sar sems can khams// tshem tshungs/ 
73a1(phal chen): tshul rnams rgya mtsho de dag dang // sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa// 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras la stan gsol// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa// rnam par thar la 'jug rngu
73a2(phal chen): rgyamatsho dang chos rnams kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho dag/ byang chub snying por thams cad bsan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i che// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yong su rnam par rtog sa
73a3(phal chen): thug su chud nas// zhal gi sgo'i tshams kyi rnams kyi gseb nas// 'od gzer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du bya ba snyed rab tu bkye ba// 'di la ste rin po che'i ze ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 
73a4(phal chen): 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings su dbyings sna tshogs kyis rgyan byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer dang 'di lta ste 'od shin du phra ba'i sprin kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer dang / 'di lta ste phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul
73a5(phal chen): dang snying po byang chub kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od gzer dang / 'di lta ste rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs gi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od gzer dang // 'di lta ste rnams par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od
73a6(phal chen): ces bya ba'i 'od gzer dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi 'di thams cad du 'byung zhing 'khyil pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od gzer dang // 'od la sa rin po rdo rje dri ma myed pa mang po'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba'i 'od gzer dang / 
73a7(phal chen): 'di la ste byang chub sems da pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od gzer dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i sgra rab tu sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer dang / 
73a8(phal chen): de dag las sugs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'od gzeng rab tu bkye ste/ 'od gzer de ga re re zhing yang 'khong gi 'od gzeng sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin du thab sre // 'ad gnar
73b1(phal chen): de dag re re zhing yang rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog shin du snyan pa dag ste/ de dag rab tu 'phros nas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byas
73b2(phal chen): te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyeng gi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho nas/ 'od gzer gi sgo de dag thams cad kyi mthus gzhi dang / snying po me tog gi/ 
73b3(phal chen): rgyan gis rgyan pa'i 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// 'od gzer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi byin gyi
73b4(phal chen): rlabs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag par gyur to// bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod spyad tshe// phyogs rnams rgya mtshor sangs rgyas kun kyang mchod// sems can rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas nas/ rnam par
73b5(phal chen): snang mdzad byang chub mngon sangs rgyas/ phyogs rnams kun tu snang zhing mngon par mdzes/ sku rnams kun nas sprul pa'i sprin kyang 'gyed/ des ni sems can snod bzhin bskul byas nas/ byang chub sbyor ba chags
73b6(phal chen): mying rnam par dag/ srid pa'i rgyud na sngan chad 'khor ba'i tshe/ rgyal bas sems can yongasu sbyin mdzad pa/ de dag skad cig gcig gis rab du bkrol/ sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag mtha' yas so// rgyan rnams su
73b7(phal chen): tsho gas kun tu 'od kyang snang / byang chub shing ni yal ga rin cen 'phyang / 'od rnams bkye ba kun tu rnam par rgyan/ byang chub bsam gis myi khyab der sangs rgyas/ phyogs nas kun tu sgra ni rab tu sgrog/ sems can kun/ 
73b8(phal chen): kyi sems bzhin tshim byas te/ sna tshogs thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par 'dul/ de las chos nyid ni snga rab tu byung / zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed sngan cad du/ spyod che pha rol phyin kun rgyas par mdzad / stobs nas
74a1(phal chen): kun la sangs rgyas rab zhugs kyis/ rgyal ba de'i zhal lar kun kyang dang / zhing gi rdul snyed phyogs rnams thas cad nas/ rgyal sras mang po rab tu dga' ste lhalcags/ mchod pa sna tshogs char pa rab 'babs
74a2(phal chen): shing thams cad 'khor de rgyal ba mngon sum la/ gsungs dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas mdo' rnams/ rgya mtsho dag kyang sangs rgyas shin tu sond / 'gro kun yid bzhin chos gi char 'bebs kyis/ rkang
74a3(phal chen): gnyis rtse bo de la ltar yang deng / dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa/ skad cig thugs la de dag mngon sum ste/ rgyal ba byang chub shing drung sngon mdzad kyis/ rgyal ba'i drung du sbyar te 'dong bar gyis/ sangs rgyas rnam par sna/ 
74a4(phal chen): mdzad ye shes gtso/ 'od gzer kun gi sgo nas rab tu snang / de'i chos nyid ji lta ji 'dra de dag ltos/ sangs rgyas 'gro kun mngon sum chos ston to// de'i tshe 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho de dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gzer
74a5(phal chen): gisas yang dag par bskal ba'i rnams/ byang chub seMs dpa' rang rang 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ 'di ltar
74a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis rgyan pa 'di dang / 'dab chagasu shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtshod pad mo'i dpal dri ma myed par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gi khas/ 
74a7(phal chen): bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig gi rten gi khas rin po che'i 'breng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi chu bo rje par sangs rgyas pa na mkha' mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho
74a8(phal chen): nas byang chub seMs dpa'i chos kyi dpal pad mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 
74b1(phal chen): bco ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gi rlom cing rin po che'i chang gi 'od gzer bang mo'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gi rlabs
74b2(phal chen): ba dang rin po che'i ri bo'i zom gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog pa dang byin gis rlob pa dang / nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i lus gi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlabs pa dang / rin po che'i me tog gi 'phres
74b3(phal chen): ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brdab pa dang / sil swan s+thA thas cad 'byin pa'i sprin bcus namakha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlab pa dang / phyi ma'i shing gi mdzod kyi srin bcus namakha' kun nas yog par byin
74b4(phal chen): gis rlab pa dang / spos dang bdug spos gzugs thams cad yongasu ston pa'i sprin banus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gi brla ba dang / spos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun yog dang byin gis rlob pa dang / de dag
74b5(phal chen): stsogs pa mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bco ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs
74b6(phal chen): bu bstan te/ me tog rno bar sna tshogs kyi snying po can giseng ge la khri mngon par sprul nas rgyal mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur te/ de nas yang 'jig rten gi khos rgya mtsho 'di dang mdab cha gsum phyogs na 'jig rten ga 'is rgya mthong po/ 
74b7(phal chen): che bas cad snang bas rna bar rgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gi khas par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gi khaMs 'od mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gi rgyan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mkhyen pa'i 'od
74b8(phal chen): dpal gi ri'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub seMs dpa' chos mtsho' rna bar snang ba'i glo gros shes bya ba byang chub seMs dpa' 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'jo// 
75a1(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor de nas 'phags te/ bcoM ldan 'das gang na der 'ong bar gyur te/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thas cad kyis rna bar gsal bar byas pa'i snying po'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin
75a2(phal chen): kyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba'i rin po che'i rgyan gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar zhing sangs rgyas kyis mtshan shin du sgrog
75a3(phal chen): ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kunas yog pa byin gyis rlob pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thos cad sgrog pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po shing
75a4(phal chen): gi yal ga sna tshogs kyi snying po byang chub kyi sprin banus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / nor bu rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin 'od gzer dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas snang bar byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
75a5(phal chen): nas yog par byin gis rlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyal po rgyan thams cad dang ma 'dres par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan ston pa'i sngon bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po'o// 
75a6(phal chen): 'gro shin du sdung pa'i sgron mas sangs rgyas thams cad sprin bcus namakha' kun nas yog par byin gis rab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi
75a7(phal chen): tshon gis dus gsugs sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin 'jig rten gi las rgya mtsho'i rdul phra mo
75a8(phal chen): snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab par byed cing / bco ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bco ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogasu brten te/ in dra ni la dang 'dzam na da dang / pad ma ra ga sA
75b1(phal chen): tshogs kyi snying po can gi seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chagasu nub phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho rin
75b2(phal chen): po che'i 'od du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod te 'jig rten gi khaMs gos gi stan yong su byung ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos mngon du snang ba'i yon tan rin po ches brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub ses
75b3(phal chen): dpara' 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu rdza ba snyed dang ldan cig du bcolan 'das gang na ba deng 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po chen dang spos dang me tog sna tshogs thos cad kyi 'ang brtseg pa'i sman gyis rnam kha' kun nas log par byin gyis
75b4(phal chen): rlob cing nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas brgyan par khang pa rtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang spos 'gro ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcas na mkha' kun nas yog yog par byin gos
75b5(phal chen): brlab pa dang / mu tig thos cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlab pa dang rin po che thos cad gi me tog gi ze ba'i khang pa rtsegs pa'i ba sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlab pa dang / rin po che'i
75b6(phal chen): 'phreng bas yongasu rgyan pa'i gang ba rtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / 'od gzer gi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'phro ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i khang brtseg pa rgyan thos cad 'byung ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog bA
75b7(phal chen): byin gis bdapa pa dang / rin ba rgyan tshan thas cad kyis rab rgyan cing / rgyan rdzas cad dag par smon pa'i 'ang pa rtsegs pa'i sngon bdus nama' kun nas yog par phyi dgas rab pa dang / phyog sa cang rgya gos rab tu brgyan par kun tu
75b8(phal chen): bar 'gengs pa'i khang brtsegs pa'i sprin bcas na mkha' kun na log par byin gis rab pa dang / sgo kun me tog gi ta 'bras dang / dril bu'i dra ba thes pa'i khang ba rtse gra pa'i sprin bcus rnama'a' kun nas yog par byin gis rlab pa dang / 
76a1(phal chen): de dag las sogs pa'i khang brtseg pa'i sprin 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog pa byin gis rlob par byed cing / bco ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bco ldan 'das la
76a2(phal chen): phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogasu sen te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo chen po lo ma sna tshogs kyi gser las byas pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho
76a3(phal chen): 'di dang 'dab tshagasu byang phyog na 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bye du r+ya pad mo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gi khas kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gi khaMs me tog ud pa la'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa ye shre
76a4(phal chen): kyi dpal kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sem dpa' seng ge'i 'od gzer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sos dpa' 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba
76a5(phal chen): kha snyed pa dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur da te/ spos dang nor bu'i sna tshog thas cad gi shing gi sprin bcus na kha' kun nA yog pa byin gyi rlab cing sgo thos cad nA lo ma'i dog pa'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi/ 
76a6(phal chen): shing gi sprin bcus ni mkha' kun nas yog par byin kyis brlab pa/ shing gi gzugs thas cad las rgyan mtha' yas pa yongasu bstan pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gri brlab pa dang me tog thas cad kyi sprin rab
76a7(phal chen): tu na rad pa'i me tog gi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gI rlab pa dang rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor thas cad kyi rna bar snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / 
76a8(phal chen): tsan dan gi phye mthas cad dang byang chub seMs dpa' lus phyed yang dag par ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gri rlab pa dang / sngon gi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan pasaM gri myi khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus
76a9(phal chen): na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gri rlab pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i gis gi mdzod gau nyims rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gi rlab pa dang / sgra dbyangs thas cad rab tu sgrog ceng
76b1(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i sgra kun tu gtong ba'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / de dag la sog pa shing gi sprin nam 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gri
76b2(phal chen): rlob par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang ni ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogasu stan te/ seng ge'i khri nor bu sgron ma'i pad ma'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod gyur to// 
76b3(phal chen): de nas yang 'jig gi khaMs rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dad chagasu byang shar gi phyogs mtshams gi khaMs rgya mtsho 'dzam bu'i chu klung dang shel gi kha dog tshon gi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gi khas bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten
76b4(phal chen): gi khos rin po che'i rgyan sna chogs kyi snying po na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thas cad la myi 'jigs pa'i sgron ma bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzad mo bzad pa'i dpal
76b5(phal chen): gi gzo' brjod mar me zhes bya ba byang chub ses dpa' 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bco ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur to// seng ge'i khri rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas pa
76b6(phal chen): dang po'i snying po can gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlob cing / seng ge'i khri nor bu'i rgyal po kun tu mngon pas rnam pA sAng byas pa'i snying po can gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun yog par byin gyi rlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri
76b7(phal chen): rgyan mang po thas cad kyi rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gi sprin bcus can mkhar kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i spro ba'i sgron ma sna cho ga gi 'phreng ba'i snying po can gi sprin bcus rnamakha'
76b8(phal chen): kun nas yog par byani gis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri phyogs kun nas 'phreng rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i snying po can gi sprin bcu sa nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlob pa dang / seng ge'i khri spos gau me tog pad mo'o
77a1(phal chen): 'phreng ba ngan pa tshams ca kyi song babar gi sngon dus nam pa thun nas log par gyi myos rapa'adang / seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi bdan thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par gan pa'i nang bu rgyal bar ba bca pa dan/ 
77a2(phal chen): bcus namakha' kun nas yog par byin gri brlab pa dang / seng ge khri rgyan dang 'phreng ba thos cad 'phyang zhing rtab bas dang stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can go sprin bcus namanga' kun nas yog par byin gri ba rab pa dang / 
77a3(phal chen): seng ge'i khri shing thas cad kyi yal dag las nor bu'i dang rin po che dang phye ma 'byung ba'i snying po can gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlab pa dang / seng ge'i spos rin po che'i tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i nyi mas
77a4(phal chen): rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gi sprin banus na mkha' kun nas yog pa byin gis brlab pa dang / de dag las stog pa seng ge'i khri sprin 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis namakha' kun nas yog par
77a5(phal chen): byin gri rlob par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcoM ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang shar gyi phyog mtsham su brten te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gi pad mo sna tshogs kyi snying po can mngon par
77a6(phal chen): sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chagasu shar lho phyog mtsham su 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bai dur ru'i 'od zer kun du snang ba gser gi rgyan ces bya ba yod/ 
77a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khas kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gi khas spos kyi dpal dri ma med par snang ba ni de bzhin gsheg pa kun tu dga' ba'i shug dpal gi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sos
77a8(phal chen): dpa' ye shwe kyi 'od gzer shwe rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros shre bya ba byang chub sos dpa' 'jig rten gi khaMs kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed pa lhan cig du 'phag te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te nor bu yid
77b1(phal chen): bzhin gyi rgyal po thos cad kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / rin po che in dra ni la'i ze ba can gi me tog thas cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin
77b2(phal chen): gyis brlab pa dang / spos rin po che'i bla re thams cad kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba sprin ma' gzugags kyi bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin
77b3(phal chen): gis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang 'od dang / sgra dbyangs rab tu ston pa'i bla re'i sprin banus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis bslab pa dang / nor bu dang gos dang rgyan thams cad kyi gzugs
77b4(phal chen): brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog pa byin gis rlab pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi kha dog pa lta bu rin po che ni bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlab pa dang / 
77b5(phal chen): dril bu sna tshogs kun tu sgras khyab par byed pa'i dra ba'i bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / pad mo'i dra ba mtha' yas pa sna tshogs rin po che'i snying po can gi bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha'
77b6(phal chen): kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / gser gi ze ba 'od 'phro zhing snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gi bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / rgyan pas kyis myi khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston
77b7(phal chen): pa'i rgya nathas cad kyis brgyan pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / de dag la stsog pa bla re'i sprin 'jig rten go las rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis @#
77b8(phal chen): bar byed cing / bcoM ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar lho phyog mtsham su brtan te/ seng ge ri khri pad mo sna cho ga rin po ches rab brgyan pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas sprul nas skyil mo klum bcas
78a1(phal chen): de nas yang 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chagasu lho nub kyi phyog mtsham su 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i nyi ma'i 'od rab tu 'bar ba kun tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gi khas bar ma'i rgyud de dag las
78a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khaMs nyi ma dang seng ge ltar snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgo nas ye shwe rnaM par snang ba'i bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub seMs dpa' me tog kun nas 'phro nu ga pud rab tu 'phyad pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems
78a3(phal chen): dpa' 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu ra ba snyed dang lan cig tu 'alags te/ bco ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ sna tshe ga thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdug gi sprin bcus rnamapa' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing
78a4(phal chen): 'od gzer snang ba'i rgyan gyis rgyan pa'i me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin bcu na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa dang mu tig mang po'i kha dog mtha' yas pa thas cad kyi gdug gi sprin bcus namakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang nor bu'i
78a5(phal chen): rgyal po byang chub ses dpa' thas cad kyi snying rje'i rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i gdugs gi snying bcus na mkha'i kun nas yog par
78a6(phal chen): byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i tshon rje ba sna tshogs kyi 'od hUM phaT kyis rab tu brgyan cing dril bu'i dri bas bres pa'i gdugs kyi sprin banus mamakha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlab pa dang / rin po che'i shing gi yal ga thams
78a7(phal chen): ci gis brgyan pa'i gdugs gi sprin bcus nam ma'a' kun nas yog par byin gyis brdab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po nyim rnam par snang ba'i lte ba'i gdugs go sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / 
78a8(phal chen): spos dang gdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs gi sprin banus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang can dang gi bye ma mang pos kun nas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs gau sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog
78b1(phal chen): bar byin gis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po rnam par bstan pa'i kun tu rgyan gyis khyab par byed pa'i gdugs kyi sprin gyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab dang / 
78b2(phal chen): de dag la stsogs pa gdugs gi sprin 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom
78b3(phal chen): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho rung gi phyogs mtshams su bsdu brtan te/ seng ge'i khri in dra ni la yid du 'ong bar 'bar ba'i 'od gzer gi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rgyal mo krum bcas
78b4(phal chen): te 'khod de/ de nas yang 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su rung byang phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mamo rin po che'i 'od gzer 'bar ba'i skar mda' 'od kyi snying po zhes
78b5(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i snying po can/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho tshad myed pa'i 'ad bzhugs pa'i
78b6(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od gzer gzi' brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros pa byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng dang
78b7(phal chen): lhan cig du 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / 
78b8(phal chen): rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i gzugs gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / me tog gi sprin rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gi sprin bcus nam
79a1(phal chen): sang gums yon par phyi pas 'arlab pa dang / 'od gang ga tsunas sangs rgyas smrarang pam da kyi kyila'abang gtsun 'dus namamapar gan nas lag par phyin gyis 'dam pa / 
79a2(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzugs brnyan gi 'ong su chung ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngon bcus nam ma'a' kun nas lag par byin gis brlab pa dang / rin pa che'i yal gam na kun nas sangs rgyas
79a3(phal chen): rab tu ston par 'ang tshang kyil 'a'ong gdon sa rnamapal 'akun nas log par byin shes parab pa dang / nang bu rgyal ba ma mdur du rigs kyib kya kyi 'bar gyi ldan bcus namapa'i kun ras lag sa
79a4(phal chen): byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems skad cig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongasu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gas brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas
79a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi smon lam 'byung ba'i sna ying du 'ong ba'i rab tu gtong ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byon gis brlab pa dang / 'dod kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba
79a6(phal chen): 'isgra stsogs pa nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / de dag las sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin 'jig rten gi khams
79a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na 'a der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 
79a8(phal chen): nub byang gi phyogs mtsham su brtan te/ seng ge'i khri 'od 'azer 'bar mi zad pa'i gzi brjid kyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rgyal mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'dzin rten gi khams rgya mtsho 'di
79b1(phal chen): dang 'dab chags su 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i pad ma dro zhom dpal gi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gi khams rin po chena'i seng ge'i sAng
79b2(phal chen): zhing 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od gzer bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyingasu 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros
79b3(phal chen): shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po chen thams cad kyi 'od zer gi sprin
79b4(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa/ cing spos thams cad kyi 'od gzer gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro thams cad kyi 'dogazer gi
79b5(phal chen): sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod par khyab par byed pa'i 'od gzer gi sprin bcas nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / 
79b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od gzer gi sprin banus nam mkha' log par byin gis brlab pa dang / me tog gi khang brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od gzer gi sprin bdus
79b7(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab ba dang / gal pa thams cad cig nas cig du rgyud par sangs rgyas yang dag par 'byung zhing sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba brjod pa'i 'od gzeng gi sprin bcus
79b8(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che zad myi shes pa thams cad dang me tog thams ze ba'i 'od gzer gyi sprin brkus nam
80a1(phal chen): mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / de dag las sogs pa 'od gzer gi sprin 'jig rten gyi khrus rgya mtsho'i shin du phra ba snyed dang tha ma mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab par byed
80a2(phal chen): cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'og gi byo gsu brtan nas seng ge'i khri rin po che'i sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ 
80a3(phal chen): rgyal mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rtene gi khaM sa rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan pa 'di dang 'dab cha gsu steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gi kha rgya mtsho nor bu rin po che sna tshogs gi 'od rgya mtsho'i
80a4(phal chen): rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gi khams mtshan yid du 'ong ba rnams par snang ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam
80a5(phal chen): par tha red pa rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khams rgya
80a6(phal chen): mtsho'i rdul shin du phri ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par
80a7(phal chen): byin gis brjob cing / nor bu rin po che kun nas 'od kyi dra ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rgya ma chen pos rnam par snang bar 'ong
80a8(phal chen): 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / spos thams cad gi 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nas kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / rgyan thams cad 'di 'phro bar
80b1(phal chen): sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par bying na gis brlab pa dang / shing dang ze ba
80b2(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshog su 'od 'phro ba'i sprin banus nam mkha' kun sa yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / rdo rje sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlab pa dang / 
80b3(phal chen): nor bu rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas par brjod pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / mu tig gi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus
80b4(phal chen): nam mkha'i kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlam
80b5(phal chen): par byed cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ steng gi phyogasu brten te/ seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgrog pa'i 'od gzer 'byung pad mo'i snying po can
80b6(phal chen): dag mngon par sprul nas/ rgyal mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de dag la stsogs pa 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
80b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis skor cing bdun du byas te/ 
80b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du pha ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis rlob cing 'ongs
81a1(phal chen): motho dpa dang / gabs kyi sa nas 'ang gzer gi srin rin po thams par ga 'dog ga tshogs pa 'jig der gi khangs rgyamacho bcu'i dul shin tu zla ba sing rang dubyung bar gyur to// rin pa che re ro'i stenas
81a2(phal chen): rlomi gang tu dra bke thamasasad kyi smrab pa gang bar byas dang / dras gan tum ba ri ga yang zhing byam thob pasasargyas kyi zhing 'a'adu ba shin tu bzed du 'dug par gyur te/ nga yang dus gsum du gshen
81a3(phal chen): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mthong zhing shes par byard sems kyi gang cig re rel phyi la mas bu rnam par 'phrul pa'i yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo nas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cin
81a4(phal chen): la yang 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba sed re re'i lha'i gnas thams cad du skye ba dang shi 'pho ba yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo ga nas yang dag par skul bar byed par 'gyur ro/ sems skad cig re re la 'jig rten ga
81a5(phal chen): khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor thams shin tu bstan pa'i sgo gnas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
81a6(phal chen): du phra ba snyed kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu rjod cing rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gi
81a7(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du bra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu skrag pa'i sgo gnas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to// sems kyi
81b1(phal chen): kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin thams cad kyi char dbab pa'i sgod gnas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi
81b2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du prA ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin thams cad kyi char dbab pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul par byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra bsnyed
81b3(phal chen): kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham su chos kyi dbyings snang bas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
81b4(phal chen): du phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi skus chos kyi dbyings gang bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par tha rad pa dang / 'od thams cad kyi sgo dag nas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to/ sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gi khaM
81b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' kun bzang po rab tu gnas pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to// de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
81b6(phal chen): bkang ste/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par skul bar byed cing / 'jig rten gi khams 'byam glas pa dag tu rab tu 'dal te/ zhing re rer yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can ri rab kyi
81b7(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi ngan song gi rgyud du rtogs pa'i sdug sngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar byed do// sems can phyin ci log nges par ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni yang dag par nges pa'i phung po la rab tu dgod do// sems can dri
81b8(phal chen): rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba dang yid du 'ong ba dang / mtho ris su skye ba la rab tu 'god do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu dgong ngo // sems can rirag
82a1(phal chen): rjon// kyi rdum shin du phra ba snyed ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i bsod rnams kyi tshogs la rab tu dgod do/ zhing de dag re reng yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin du phra ba sred ni sngan cang ma bskyed pa'i byang chub
82a2(phal chen): kyi sems skye bar byed do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa yang dag par thob pa la yang dag par smra'o zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul nin
82a3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sprin chos thams cad kun nas snang zhing gzigs pa la yongs sbyangs te 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin phra ba snyed stobs thams cad kyis rab tu gnas pa dang / 
82a4(phal chen): ye shes kyi tshogs zad myi shes pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par bya ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang
82a5(phal chen): rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa la rab tu dgod do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od gzer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur to// // 'od gzer thams cad sgo nas
82a6(phal chen): sgra 'byung ste// ji snyed byang chub spyod pa 'jug pa dang // rgyal sras yon tan phun sum gang yod pa'i// dbyangs kyis phyogs rnams kun tu bkang zhing sgrog/ skal ba rgya mtshor skye myed spyad pa spyod// sdug sAl kun las 'gro ba kun 'grol
82a7(phal chen): kyang // yid la skyo med zhum pa gang yang myed// 'di'i tshul la rgyal sras rab tu zhugs// chos kyi sgo rnams kun la rab spyod cing // tshul 'dir bskal pa rgya mtsho zad par byed// mtha' myed dbus med lhag ma gang yang med// de dag
82a8(phal chen): ma ni pa rab tu rdzog/ dus su rgyal pa'i smon lam gang 'dag// rgyal sras da dag 'grol ba don du// de dag thams padam bras yong su myong // de dag spyod pa'i chen na 'o// rgyam bdun kyi yong khye na/ 
82b1(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun na gzugs brnyan lus 'chang zhing // rgyal sras ye shes rgya mtsho blo gros canaka/ de dag chos nyid zhir 'jug 'di 'dra'o// 'od gzer sgo nas re rer mtha' yas pa'o// bsam ma phye zhing rnams de dag rab tu 'jug/ 
82b2(phal chen): spyod pas rgyag ni kun nas yongs dag ste// rgyal sras de dag spyong yul 'di yin no// swa rtse gcig tu de dag rab gnas shing // zhing rnams dbyings kun kun nas sbyang byas kyang // sems can rnams la 'jigs par mi byed de// sa 'di rnam
82b3(phal chen): ngag tshul 'chang dag pa'o// tshul rnams kun la bsam gyis myi khyab lus// de dag kun tu zhing rnams snang tshogs spulang // skad cig sems la 'tsho 'pho skye ba med// rgyan 'di sems la chags pa med pa rnams kyi'o// dus gsum
82b4(phal chen): bskal pa gang yod ma lus par// skad cig cig gis thams cad rab tu ston// sgyu ma lta bu lus myed dngos kyang myong // de 'dra'i chos nyid chags myed thos rtogs so// bzang po'i spyod pa mchog la zhugs rnams// 'gro ba kun la
82b5(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i lus// rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te// 'od gzer kun gyi sgo nas dbyangs kyang sgrog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus myed pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod
82b6(phal chen): yul la rnam par spyod pa thob par bya ba'i phyir// sbyin chams kyi mdzod su nas 'ong gzer chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi sde byas phyogs rnam par ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o// 'od gzer rim
82b7(phal chen): tshe thams cad kyi kha dog sgron ma'i sprin du bdal ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu snang ba de byung nas tshul thams cad kyi phyogs 'byam klas pa rab tu snang bar byas te/ phyogs thams cad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar
82b8(phal chen): byas nas/ sems can rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po thams cad du skyod pa'i rgyan kyi tshul thams cad kyis rab tu bskyod pa// sangs
83a1(phal chen): rgyas kyi sprin 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad dang mnyam pa dag tu rab tu spros nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba rgya mtsho dag tu de bzhin
83a2(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gi char dus gsum gi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam paHphab ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rab tu bstan nas/ sems can thams cad
83a3(phal chen): ma lus par 'khor ba thams cad las rab tu gdon par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung ba dang mthun pa'i sprin gi char rab tu 'bab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam ma lus pa'i sprin gis char rab tu
83a4(phal chen): dbab pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor de dag tu dga' bar 'phrad pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogasu skor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bang
83a5(phal chen): mi tshon po chub rin po che thams cad las bsgrubs pa/ nang rim nor bu'i rgyal po'i mdzod sna tshogs las byas pa/ lo ma rin po che thams cad kyi rigs kyi char 'bebs pa/ ze ba'i 'phreng ba'i spos rin po che thams cad las
83a6(phal chen): byas pa/ snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gi tshon gis rab tu mdzes par bris 'od kyi 'khor rnaM par dag cing 'od gzer gi dra bas rnaM bar snang bar byas pa'i sprin dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba sems kyi skad cig
83a7(phal chen): la sangs rgyas ni par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pa'i rab tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gi sprin gyis thams cad du gang bar byed pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / 
83a8(phal chen): sman thamathas cad rab tu gan pa'i dbyang sa 'byin par gyur te bying / pad mchen po 'byung ba'i rjes pa byang chub sems dpa' cham bams cad pa pas bgyid pa'i shes bya byang chub sems dpa 'jig rten ga lab rgya mcho dus
83b1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig du/ bcon ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ pad mo chen po de'i snying po la
83b2(phal chen): 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag kyang ze ba'i 'phreng ba de dag la 'khod do/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thas cad la phab pa myed pa'i dbyangs chos kyi
83b3(phal chen): dbyings rgya chen zhing chad pas rab tu dga' ba'i shugs shin tu skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gi rje su song ba'i ye shes can sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gis myi khyab pa la rab tu zhugs
83b4(phal chen): ba'i mthu' dang ldan pa zhing 'byam klas pa thas cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnaMs kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pa/ ba spu thas cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad mi shes pas kun tu khyebs par byed pa/ sems kyi skad cig thams
83b5(phal chen): cad la dmyigs pa thas cad chos kyi dbyings kun tu sgyur ba/ chos kyi dbyings thas cad du dus gsuM khyab par byed pa'i spyod yul gyis rno bar spyod pa phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs 'chang ba/ ting nge
83b6(phal chen): 'dzin thams cad la rab tu 'jog cing / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa la rna bar spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad dang chos kyi dbyings kyi lus dang
83b7(phal chen): ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rna bar 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus myed par rno par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smoso// sangs rgyas kyi ni chos kyi dbyings kyis gsal// 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba
83b8(phal chen): mngon sum ste// ji ltar mos pa'i sems can rgyas bkang nas// snying po byang chub de la rgyal ba zhugs// zhing rnaMs kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed gi// rgyal ba spu rtse kun la rab zhugs te// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor kis kun nas so/ 
84a1(phal chen): kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa mchog ston to// sku cig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho ste// byang chub snying por pad mo'i bdan la bzhugs/ chos dbyings rgya chen thas cad kun bkang ste// sU dzas kun la rnam par 'phrul ba ston// zhing rdzas
84a2(phal chen): re re dag na rab bzhugs shing // zhing rnams 'byam glas kun tu rgyas mdzad par// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams// kun kyang snying po byang chub drung du 'dong // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi// byang chub ses
84a3(phal chen): dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'o dang // chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas rtags tu rgyas par 'gengs// zhing rnaMs thas cad gzugs brnyan rab tu ston// chos dbyings rdul rnaMs ye shes spyod yul can// 
84a4(phal chen): kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du yang dag byung // byang chub seMs dpa' ye shes mchog yul can// chos sprin nyan cing rab tu mkhas pa'i rjes// sangs rgyas kyi 'khor rjes kun la gnas// 
84a5(phal chen): zhing nas kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor sbyong // rgya mtsho'i chos la rnaM par snang bar spyod// de dag rgyal ba'i sa dzas rgya mtshor zhugs// sangs rgyas chos rjes gzhad dang gzhan byung ba// de dag smon lam rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug/ sangs
84a6(phal chen): rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa de dag shes// sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing // de dag rna 'phrul rgya chen kun la zhugs// zhing rdzas kun gyi rdul phran mang snyed kyi// lus kyi sprin ni rtag
84a7(phal chen): par rab tu ston// sems can kun bkang 'od kyis kun la zla'o// bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' chos kyi dpal pang son par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas gi byin gyi bas
84a8(phal chen): khyim phyogs brdud na par bltas te// de rim tshig su bcang ba 'di ga sngam// sangs rgyas mi shes shin tu zag/ dras nas kun tu zung ba/ mas kyings thugs rung bas na/ 'an rten makon nas pa cu rjod / yang ga
84b1(phal chen): rgyas chos kyi sku// 'dres pa myed cing gnas pa med// sems can thams cad yid bzhin du/ gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong // chos rnams thams cad mngon sangs rgyas// chos rnams kun la rab tu bzhugs// thams cad mkhyen
84b2(phal chen): pa thams cad gzigs ka/ zhing rnams kun na rnaM bar mdzes// kha dog bsam gis mi khyab par// sems can thams cad yid bzhin du// sems can mchog gi 'od rnams dang // de bzhin sku'i sprin kyang mthong // de bzhin gshegs
84b3(phal chen): pa'i sku dag las// mi zad sangs rgyas sprul pa rnaMs// zhing rnas kun tu rab sgrog cing // chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu ston/ spu rnams re re kun nas kyang / phyogs bcur 'od gzer dra ba dag // sangs rgyas gsung ni rab 'byin cing // 
84b4(phal chen): gdul dka' thas cad rnam par 'dul// sangs rgyas 'od gzer sgo rnams nas// sgra dbyangs zab mo rtag tu 'byung // sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho ni// byang chub seMs dpa'i spyod yulo// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ 
84b5(phal chen): mtha' dang dbu sa myed rab tu skor// ye shes zab mos shes bya ba// rgya chen phyog su rab tu ston// 'jig rten khas thas cad du// rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang nas// 
84b6(phal chen): yang dag sangs rgyas snyan pa ma dang / bla napa'i de rnams kyang / zhing rnams kun ma dus mas par/ sangs rgyas sems can mnyas byung // rna par 'phrul bar btu'o// denas byang chub sems
85a1(phal chen): na// 'dug rten kun la mdzon// sems canathams cad bsam pa bzhin// thams cad gzigs pa sangs rgyas so// rnam par 'brel pa thams cid mdzang // mthong las 'ad mnga' sangs rgyas rnyid/ chos rnams tsha
85a2(phal chen): 'jug kyang slob// ye shes rnam pa sgyu ma'i tshul bzhin du/ rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug/ 'jug pa rnams la'i byang ba myed// 'byung ba yod par rnam par snyan// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i// chos rjes 'byu
85a3(phal chen): ba nam mkha' bzhin// 'pho dang gnas pa myi mnga' ste// 'on kyang rgyal ba'i kun na snang // sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings las byung // de phyir sangs rgyas rab tu brjod// yul na bzhugs rang bzhin med// de la 'byung ba mi
85a4(phal chen): mnga' ste/ sku dang mtshan kyang de bzhin med// rgyal ba gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'o// 'gro ba kun tu chos kyi sprin// bsam pa kun la rab byung // yang dag sangs rgyas rnam kun du// sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad// 'jig
85a5(phal chen): rten khams rnams thas cad kyi// snying po byang chub kun na snang // 'khor gi rgya mtsho thams cad na// zhing rnams kun na rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gi sku dag la// yon tan rgya mtsho zad mi shes/ sangs rgyas yon tan
85a6(phal chen): mtha' yas te/ de dag yon tan zad pa med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smra so// / 
85a7(phal chen): bsam gyis kyi khyab sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' gang bzhugs pa// de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyi// sangs rgyas rje 'phrul thams cad mdzang / ye shes lus kyis zhugs pa rnams// zhing kun rdul gi spru
85a8(phal chen): yang // de bzhin gshegs pa thos cad dang / bdag nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo // gzugs brtan zhing rnams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'byung / kun tu byin gis brlabs rnams dang // 
85b1(phal chen): rlam par 'thus pa rab tu phyod// kun tu bzang po'i sngon ma dang // spyod pa gang gis nam spangs pa// de dag zhing rnams rnas cad du/ rangs rgyas kun kyi rje 'phrul mthong // kun du marnam pa nyid rdza dang/ 
85b2(phal chen): can sa no// 'a nas rjes ma na/ sangs rgyas snong zhugs so// sa sa rgyas mi shes bcugs pa'i rnams/ chos kyi dbying sa rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gi sungs tu// rgyam ma mnapa
85b3(phal chen): tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing dag tu// byin gi rlabs rjes rab bston pa// gzhan dang gzhan gi lus dag nas// mying gis kun na rab tu gnas// byang chub snying por rje 'phrul dang // byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing // 
85b4(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dag/ skad cig sems kyis ston pa mdzad// zhing rjes 'byam klas thams cad dang // skal pa bye ba bas yus// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag rnaMs// skad cig sems kyis rnaM par ston// sangs
85b5(phal chen): rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du// byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa rnams// sangs rgyas sku la rna spyod kyang // mtha' ma rnyed par myi rung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'od gzer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros kyi
85b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rna bar ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// sangs rgyas rnaM bar snang mdzad kyi// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// chos dbyings tshul rnaMs thams cad kyang // sangs
85b7(phal chen): rgyas sprin gis mngon par yog/ 'jig rten khams nas rgya mtsho dag/ phyogs bcu kun na gang yod pa// thams cad kun tu 'khor lo 'khor// de ni smon lam rdo 'phrul pa'o// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba// gzhan dang gzhan
85b8(phal chen): gau myi dag gis// zhing rnams gnas pa kun tu yang // chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'khor// rnam par snang mdzad byin gis brlabs// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang // kun du bzang po'i smon la mngag/ brjod cing zhing rnams kun tu 'byung / 
86a1(phal chen): zhing kun rdul la sku'i rnams// thams cad chos char rab tu 'bebs// 'dres pa med cing 'byung ba myed// 'jig rten dag narna bar mdzes// skal pa bye ba grags myed par// zhing kun rdul phran sdus dag du// rnam par
86a2(phal chen): snang ba mdzad pa'i gsung // sdong gi spyod pa rab tu sgrog/ zhing rnams thas cad rdul snyeng gi// 'od gzer dra ba phyogs bcun// sangs rgyas 'od gzer kun sgo nas// byang chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul// kun tu ma 'dres
86a3(phal chen): sku dag gis// chos dbyings yongasu rab bsal te// 'gro rnams 'dul ba ji bzhin du/ gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong // dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad gi// mgon po ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gi mtshan
86a4(phal chen): kyang sgrog/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// de ltar byung dang 'das pa dang // sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa// de dag kun gi bsam yas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
86a5(phal chen): don tan gi mdzod myi zad pa'i dpal gi gzi brjid mar mes sangs rgyas gi byin gi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i// ye shes tshogs ni kun
86a6(phal chen): non cing// ye shes rtogs pa brnyes pa nas// de dag 'di'i tshul la bzhugs// chos gi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings// zhing rnams kun tu rab tu 'byung // sangs rgyas kun gi spyod yul de// byang chub sems dpa'i cheng du brjod/ 
86a7(phal chen): rnanas pa // na/ da pa 'du ga pa na pa da / na sa/ 
86a8(phal chen): thanas ca/ shing nam pa ku gnas shing byung / dul nam 'ang srings kyang / chos rnams kun du rab du byung / zhing rnams su kyang rgyab par byed// yegs cags so spyod du'o// sangs kyisems cad byung chumadu/ 
86b1(phal chen): las pa med par kun bkang zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam spyod pas// sangs rgyas spyod yul rnams la zhugs// sangs rgyas kun gi rje su stegs dbyangs// chos kyi dbyings ni rab sgrog pa// chos dbyings rje su shes pa rnams
86b2(phal chen): dbyings gi rgya mtsho rnams la spyod// bskal pa rgya mtshor ma 'dres par// sgra dang dbyangs rnams shin tu sgrog/ dus rnams thams cad shes par gsal// dbyings gis de dag sa la zhugs// sgra'i shes la rmongs pa myed/ sems can
86b3(phal chen): sgra yang spyod yul de// thams cad mkhyen pa kun gi yang // rnaM par 'phrul pa'i dbyings shes// sa nas sar yang phyin gyur da cing // stobs kyi su la rab gnas te// skal pa bye bar spyad pas na/ chos nyid 'di la rab tu 'jug/ 
86b4(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od gzer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gi rlabs gis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// // gang la sangs rgyas
86b5(phal chen): bzhugs pa'i// chos rnams de dag mtshan nyid med// ye shes sa ni thob pa'i rnaMs// 'jig rten gtso bo rab tu mthong // shes rab snang ba'i kun 'od can// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag rnams// sangs rgyas thos cad kun gyi
86b6(phal chen): yang hata sku'i rnaM bar 'phrul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings la rnam spyod cing // lus kyi dngos la rab 'jug ste/ zab mo'i chos rnams rtogs gyur nas/ smon lam dag gis yang dag byung // bsod nams rgya mtsho 'byung gyur cing / 
86b7(phal chen): yeng shes sa la rno bar gnas// chos la rje skyed khong du chud/ spyod pa'i mchog la rab tu spyod// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thos cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gi drung dag na// chos kyi dbyings la spyad pas na// rang bzhin lus ni rab tu mdzan
86b8(phal chen): zhing nas 'byam klas thams cad du/ skal ba bye ba bsam yas su// thams cad gzigs pa'i chos kyi rnams// rgya mtsho kun la rab tu spyod/ bdag mthong bas ni lus dang rdul// cig tu 'dres par mngon par byas// 
87a1(phal chen): ma skyes mtshan nyid med pa ste// zhing rnams kun tu'ang rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten kun gi bas 'thun par// sems can kun la mngon suM du// lus kyi sprin ni bstan byas shing // byang chub don du sos can
87a2(phal chen): 'dul/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthu' yis ni/ byang chub sems dpar brjod pa ste/ gang gis mgon po mthong ba'i// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs shin tu zab// mgon po ji snyed gang bzhugs pa'i// byin rabs mtha' dang / 
87a3(phal chen): dbus med de// chos dbyings rab tu gang byas nas// byang chub sems dpa' rje 'tshang rgya/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro cu ga bung rab 'phyang bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gis rlabs gis phyogs
87a4(phal chen): bcur rnaM par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smra so// zhang rnaMs kun tu sangs rgyas kyi// gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgra 'byin te sha/ chos gi dbyings rnams gang byas nas/ yon tan sprin ni rab tu rjod// yang dag
87a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// rna dag ni mkha' 'dra ba ste/ gzugs kyi sku yang rab stan cing // chos nyid 'di la shin du 'jug/ dga' dang mos pa'i shugs rnams dang // sangs rgyas stobs rnams thams cad la// rab tu gnas
87a6(phal chen): shing de dag ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug// shes rab chu dus chos 'di dag// kun tu shes par mi nus te/ ye shes mig gis rnam sbyangs shing // 'di'i tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// rab tu gnas dang byin rlabs
87a7(phal chen): dang / chos kun rna bar spyad pa dang // rab tu 'jug dang ldan pa'i// mnyam pa nyid la rab tu zhugs// chos rnams mtha' yas klong gi rnams/ chos kun mtshan nyid rnams la ste// kun mkhyen nyid la rab zhugs shing // chos kyi
87a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho kun la spyod// sangs rgyas zhing na kun 'khor cing // thams cad kun na rnaM par mdzes// 'ongs pa myed cing 'phos pa med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de 'dra'o// gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'i sku nas ni// sos can rgya mtsho'i nang na snang
87b1(phal chen): mos pa ci 'dra yod pa'i rjes// de bzhin mgon po kun gyis mthong // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang // spyod pa mang po sus sbyangs pa// de dag thams cad ba spu la 'ang // rnam 'phrul gzhan dag mthong // lus gi rjes ni
87b2(phal chen): re res kyang / chos kyi dbyings rnas kun du khyab// 'khor lo kun na 'khor ba ste// chos kyi 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od gzer gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po blo gros gis sangs rgyas kyi byin
87b3(phal chen): gi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// sangs rgyas sku ni thas cad nas// 'od gzer sprin mang phyogs rjes bcur// kha dog mtha' yas 'bar ba'i 'od// sems can
87b4(phal chen): kun la bsam pa phro// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad gi// snying po byang chub kun na bzhugs// bdud rnaMs thams cad rab btul te/ 'khor gi nang na rnams par mdzes// thams cad 'dul na'ang 'dres pa// 
87b5(phal chen): 'od gser dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams gzhan la du// zhing gi rnas ni rgya mtsho'i klong // phyogs kyi rnaMs kyang kun tu gnon// zhing rnas thang chen mnyam zhing dag/ in dra ni lar kun nas gnas// 
87b6(phal chen): spyi'u tshugs dag dang spel gzhi dang // pad mo'i dbyings dang khyad khyud dang / dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i khyad par du// gzugs rnas kun gyis rab tu gnas// chos kyi dbyings rnaMs gar phyin par// thug par med par
87b7(phal chen): 'gram bdal ba// de dag kun gyi 'khor rnams su// shin tu snyan pa'i chos 'byung // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dbyings na// 'khong pa'i zhing rnams pas mi khyab// de dag kun tu chos nyid 'di na/ 'jig rten 'gon
87b8(phal chen): bo rnaMs kyang ston// tha dad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings// chos kyi 'khor lor rab tu 'khor// cig gis tshul gi rnam pa yis// chos ston pa ni kun tu 'byung // sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// tshul rnams
88a1(phal chen): thams cad rab tu brjod/ dang ba rgya mtsho tshul dag gis// mi zang tshul nas rab tu bstan/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun na yang / rgyal ba rdzas ni mig yog 'dra// snying po byang chub rnams na snang // 
88a2(phal chen): 'byung ba dag kyang yod pa min// de nas byang chub se sa dpa' chos dbyingasu 'ong 'phro ba rnam pas// snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas gi byin gi rlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rna pA saM ltas te// 
88a3(phal chen): de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// lta zhing lta zhing sangs rgyas rnams/ sku gzugs bas gis mi khyab ste// 'ga' ba rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung // chos kyi shugs ni rab tu 'phel// mtshan rab kun sas
88a4(phal chen): rgyas rnaMs// phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'byung // rdul rnaMs kun tu 'jug pa yis// sangs rgyas sbyin kyang de bzhin bstan// skad cig skad cig seMs kun la// sangs rgyas 'od ni dpal gis 'bar// rna 'phrul gzhan dang
88a5(phal chen): gzhan dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // byang chub seMs dpa' shes rab che// rgya mtsho'i chos las byung ba rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pa// 'di'i yul la rnam par spyod// kun tu bzang po'i smon/ 
88a6(phal chen): lam la// gang rnams shin tu gnas gyur pa// de dang de rnams zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas rna 'phrul kun la lA/ ye shes zab mo rnam gnond cing // chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ni// mos pa rgya mtsho shes pa ste// 
88a7(phal chen): smon lamagun gis byung ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi mu dang gsung / chags pa med la rab tu zhugs/ spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/ spyod yul kun kyang khong du chud/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gnas shing / 99
88a8(phal chen): spyod yul mu rang ba'i rnams/ chos kyi dbyings la rab brtson pa/ rgyal ba rnams gis gnon to// skad cig sems kyi zhing gi rnams/ sangs rgyas zhing ga dul mnyam thang // de dag chos nyid ji bzhi du// chu cig/ 
88b1(phal chen): steng du rnam par spyod// zhing rnams ji snyed thams cad na// zhing gi rnam 'phrul gang yod/ pa// chos nyid 'di la bzhugs pa'i rnams// zhing gcig du ni sdud par byed// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' stobs
88b2(phal chen): dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo glos gis sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// zhing rnaMs rgya mtsho thams cad du// de dag gsung ni/ 
88b3(phal chen): zab mo 'byung // dbyangs kyi yan lag kun rgyas pa/ chos kyi sprin gi char 'beb so// brjod pa rgya mtsho thams cas kyis/ sems can kun gi skad dag tu// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu yang // chos rnaMs
88b4(phal chen): bstan pa rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams kun tu ma lus par// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mthong zhing // sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang // byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug// rdul rnams re re'i steng nas
88b5(phal chen): kyang chos kyi dbyings gi phyogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas zhing rnas kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa byed// chos kyi sku ni tha dad min// nam mkha' bzhin te chags pa med// gzugs kyi sku ni rnam
88b6(phal chen): dmyigs pa// myig yor snang ba'i mtshan nyid do// myig yor yul la mi gnas te// nam mkha' bzhin du dngos po med// mnyam pa nyid 'di rtogs gyur nas// ye shes rgya mtsho thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku ni ma
88b7(phal chen): skyes te// gzung ba med cing 'byung ba med// na mkha'i mnyam pa nyid dang mtshungs// gzung du med las 'di bstan to// zhing rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams// de dag spu cig brtse la tshogs// ye shes myig dang ldan pa sa
88b8(phal chen): sku rnams kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong // rnam par snang mdzad smon lam ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing / bla med chos gi 'khor lo dag/ zhing rnams kun na rtag tu 'khor// ji ste bskal pa bas yas pas// 
89a1(phal chen): spu rtse gcig tu rnam sprul pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdzad kyang // de'i mthu' ni rnyed par dga'// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir// de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po byang chub
89a2(phal chen): tu phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin du// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying/ 
89a3(phal chen): po byang chub dag tu// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bye ba'i rdul shin phra ba snyed kun nas 'dus par gyur to// 'di na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gi khams thams cad gi snying po
89a4(phal chen): byang chub de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par 'aspru lad pa dag tu kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na rab tu ston to// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo'o// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ 
89a5(phal chen): las// // de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shi nad tu rgyas pa'i mdo'o// // bam po bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
89a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen kun tu bzang po seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can de nyid la 'dug ste// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
89a7(phal chen): mdzad gi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings gi/ gzugs brnyan rnam par brtags pa'i tshogs/ mam pa' dbyings chags pa zang
89a8(phal chen): cing mya che ba khyab par byed pa'i rang ba nin chos kyi dbyings rgyam che'i grong mnyam pa nyid gi rjes su song zhing shin tu bdabang ba'i tshogs chos thams cad gi gli'i ting nge 'dzin gi dkyil 'khor yang dag par 'byung bas rgyas pa
89b1(phal chen): 'gengs pa phyogs thams cad du yang dag par zhugs pa chos kyi dbyings gi lus kyis kun nas yog par byas pa'i rang bzhin gi snying po can// dus gsum gi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes snang ba'i rgya mtsho'i
89b2(phal chen): klong phyogs thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya bas mngon du yang dag par ston pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par tha rad pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes gi lus rgyas
89b3(phal chen): par 'gengs pa'i snying po can zhing 'byi glas pa thams cad ma lus par chos gi dbyingasu 'jug pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad yongasasu grub par byed pa
89b4(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad du smon lam rgya mtshos rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo ston cing brjod pa'i byin gi rlabs la mnyam par bzhag par gyu ra to// / 
89b5(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das gi zhabs kyi drung du/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thas cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gi sku'i snying po
89b6(phal chen): zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas rdugs pa// phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad gi khongasu rtog pa// 
89b7(phal chen): dus gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byung ba'i khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos nond pa'i risu rtogs pa// shin tu phra shing sgribs pa med pa phyogs rgya chen po rgya mtsho thams cad/ 
89b8(phal chen): snang ba// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i ris rtags pas rnaM bar nond pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sman gis rnam par gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs thogs pa med pas chung pa/ chos kyi dbyings
90a1(phal chen): dang sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad gi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba/ chos gi dbyings gi rdul ma lus pa kun tu gtogs pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig/ 
90a2(phal chen): rten gi khams thas cad gi rdul shin du phra ba dang mnyam pa dag tu rdul phra me re re la 'ang / zhing 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu bzhugs nas/ zhing re re zhing yang de bzhin gshes/ 
90a3(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gi khams gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu bzhugs ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i zhabs gi drung du yang lus 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba steng gi ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas
90a4(phal chen): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams par snang mdzad gi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag go// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thos
90a5(phal chen): cad de bzhin gshegs pa rna bar snang mdzad sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i rjes la/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam glas pa thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal
90a6(phal chen): bstan to// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs gi bu khyod 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa
90a7(phal chen): na bar snang mdzad gi sku'i snying po 'di la mnyam par gzhog pa legaso leg so// / kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
90a8(phal chen): snang mjed 'di'i sngon gi sngon lam gi byin gardebs dang / khyod gi sangs rgyas thams cad gi smon la dang / spyod pa yong su dag pa'i yang 'dis ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad chos gi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba dang / de bzhin
90b1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dbye ba dang / chos thas cad kyi tshul gi phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus pa snang bar bya ba dang / sems can gi khams thas cad gi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rna bar byang / 
90b2(phal chen): ba rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chags pa med par 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad yongasu gnan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
90b3(phal chen): gi 'khor thams cad sgo kun nas rab tu brjod pa dang / chos gi tshul gi dkyil 'khor thams cad la zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu bzung ba dang / chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyi tshul rnam par lta ba dang / 
90b4(phal chen): sems can gi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad yongasu shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gi gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i dbyangs yongasu bzungs pa'i phyir byin gis rlob mdzad do// de nas sangs rgyas
90b5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrub so// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa
90b6(phal chen): la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubaso/ dus gsum gi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrub so// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'jig pa dang / 
90b7(phal chen): 'dra ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrub so// chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrub so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par tha rad pa zab mo tha mi dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
90b8(phal chen): cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrub so// byang chub sems dpa' thas cad gi dbang po rgya mtsho la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrub so// sems can thams cad gi skad rgya mtsho dang / 
91a1(phal chen): 1// chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubaso// 'jig rten gi khams mang po thams cad kyi rje su song zhing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus yang dag par gzhol ba'i
91a2(phal chen): ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrub so// sangs rgyas gi gsung gi yan lag dang / sgra dbyangs kyang nye bar bsgrub so// ji ltar 'jig rten gi khams 'di'i bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gi drung du 'dug pa la nye ba bsgrubs pa de
91a3(phal chen): bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtsho dag dang rdul shi nang tu phra ba'i khong su lus 'khod pa thas cad la yang nye bar bsgrub so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin
91a4(phal chen): nyid thob pa'i phyir// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g.yas pa mtshan dang dpe' byed bzang pos rnam par mdzes par brgyan pa// 'od zer gyi dra ba'i me tog sna tshogs
91a5(phal chen): shi nang tu rgyas pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin 'gyed pa/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin gyis rnam par gsal bar gyur da pa/ phyogs thams cad du spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od kyis rnam par snang ba sangs
91a6(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gyi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su sgra 'byin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par stond pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa
91a7(phal chen): dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba rnam par stond pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i snang ba yang dag par stond pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
91a8(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan byung ba rnams brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bor bzhago// 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul shanang tu phra ba'i khongs na yod pa thams cad
91b1(phal chen): du yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung dag du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bo la phyag rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams rab tu bzhag go// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis reg ma thag
91b2(phal chen): tu/ de nas de mod la ting nge 'dzind de las ldang ba'i sgo rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nad du phra ba snyed dus gsum thams cad du sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las/ 
91b3(phal chen): ldang ba'i byin gyi brlabs kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings dang / dus gsum du mnyam pa'i rdul thams cad kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sgo dang / sems can ma lus pa'i gnas thams cad dang
91b4(phal chen): mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang mying gyi 'khor lo las ldang ba'i sgo dang / phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams thams cad du chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa'i spo dang / 
91b5(phal chen): rdul shind tu phra ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin mtha' dang dpung myed par 'byam klas pa'i sgo dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas langs par gyur da te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i
91b6(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag tu/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so re re zhing ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed la rab tu bzhugs par gyur da to// gzungs rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig
91b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shind tu phra ba snyed la yang dag par rab tu zhugs par gyur to// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed la yang rab zhugs par gyur to// tha dad pa yang dag par
91b8(phal chen): shes pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed la yang dag par rab tu zhugs par gyur to// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shinang tu phra ba snyed la yang dag par
92a1(phal chen): rab tu nugs par gyur / spong ba rgyam mo'i sani 'jig rten kyi 'ams rgya mtsho'i rdung shin du rtsu bsred larab tu zhugs par gyur to// nas kyi dbyis kyi phyog su rnam par sang zhing de mnan gshegs
92a2(phal chen): bathams cad kyi ye shes snang ba yon tan gyi snying can rgya mtsho'i sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra bsnyed la yang dag par rab du zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ye shes ma 'das pa'i tshul rgyu
92a3(phal chen): mtsha'i sprini 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shinang tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur da to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i rtse mo thams cad na zhing gzhan dang gzhan rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshan
92a4(phal chen): rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba dang 'byung ba dang / byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa bstand pa rgya mtsho'i sprin/ 
92a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shinang du phra ba snyed la yang dag par rab tu zhugs par gyur to// 'dir ji ltar ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor rgya mtsho rnams dang / 
92a6(phal chen): rdul shi nang du phra ba thams cad kyi khongs na yod pa kun du yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnam rab tu zhugs par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzind kyi chos nyid rab tu thob pas phyogs/ 
92a7(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ma lus par bag langs cam drug yos te/ rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gnas shing chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra yang shinang du grag par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
92a8(phal chen): ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil la'o rgya mtshams cad du yang nor bu'i rgyal po bcu'i srin gyi char mngon par bab par gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na 'di la ste nong bu'i rgyal po mtshan dang ldan pa'i gseng pal gyi rgyal mtsha gyi dpa labya gyir
92b1(phal chen): mngon par phab po/ 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyis rnam par gsal bar byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/ 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur rin po che'i 'khor lo rab tu 'grems pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// 
92b2(phal chen): 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che'i snying po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/ 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 
92b3(phal chen): 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par snang bar byed pa'i snying po byang chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur snang ba'i sprul pa 'gyed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab bo// 
92b4(phal chen): 'di la ste nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo dang mthu rab tu grag par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi sprin gyi char mngon
92b5(phal chen): par bab po// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ongs pas phyogs thams cad khyab par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char bcu po 'di dag mngon par bab par gyur to// de bzhin
92b6(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun na kun du bzang po de// pad mo yid du 'ong la rab tu 'dug pa mthong / 
92b7(phal chen): kun tu rdzu 'phrul rnam pa 'di 'dra ston pa byed// ting 'dzin yul la 'jug pa mtha' dang dpung myed do// lus rnams thams cad nas kyang kun tu bzang po de// sprul pa rab tu 'gyed cing chos dbyings rtag par 'gyengs// ting 'dzin kun/ 
92b8(phal chen): kyi tshul dang mying dang rnam 'phrul pa// thams cad dbyangs kyis chags pa myed par rgya cher sgrog/ ting 'dzind thams cad gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam 'phrul gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung dag tu/ 
93a1(phal chen): rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul yangs pa gang byas te// zhing rnams kun tu rnam par 'phrul pa mang po stond // zhing kun rgyal ba kun gyi zhabs drung rje bzhin du// de ltar zhing kun shinang tu phra ba'i rdul phran la// ting
93a2(phal chen): 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus ston// rnam par snang mdzad smon lam dbyings la rab tu zhugs// kun tu bzang po'i lus ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid// thams cad zhing la myi nas de bzhin nyid la gnas// lus kyi/ 
93a3(phal chen): sprin ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam par kun bkye ba zhing // sems can kun la bsam pa bzhin du de dag stonang // sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la zhing rnams gang yod pa// mtha' dang dpung myed kun la rab tu zhugs pa rnams/ 
93a4(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gnas pa dag la bstand// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa tshad myed// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rdul bral mtha' dang dpung myed pa// tshad myed thams cad lus kyi nang du kun chud cing // dbyangs
93a5(phal chen): la zhing mang dra bar rnam 'tshang rgya ba stonang // skad cig sems la bskal pa mang po de bzhin ston// zhing rnams thams cad 'byam klas pa na rnam gnas shing // rnam par 'phrul pa dam pa ston par rab tu snang // phyogs rnaMs
