93a6(phal chen): kun gyi zhing gyi dbyangs rnams ma lus spyod// kun tu bzang po de la rnam lnga kun kyang mthong // rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes stobs la zhugs// ting nge 'dzin sa ni tshul rnams kun gyis rab tu mnan// chos rnams
93a7(phal chen): 'byam klas gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs// rang gyi byang chub spyod pa sngan chad spyad pa son// de ltar zhing rnams kun tu bsam yas rnam 'phrul ba// phyogs rnams rgya che kun tu bkang ste rab tu bstand// ting dzin
93a8(phal chen): rnams la 'jug parabatu bsanang ba'i phyir// rgyam thar 'ong zer nin las yon tan logs sgra 'byung // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'bar yod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus thal mo rung de/ byang chub sems dpar
93b1(phal chen): kun tu bzang po la lta zhing dbyangs kyi nga ro gcig tu/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// rgyal ba thams cad chos las skyes pa ste// smon lam kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu byung / de bzhin nyid mnyam nam mkha'i snying po ste// 
93b2(phal chen): chos kyi sku yis rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun la bzhugs myed kyang // kun tu bzang po'i 'khor rnams kun na snang // phyogs bcu kun tu yon tan grags pa khyab// ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mnga'// rgyal
93b3(phal chen): ba thams cad skra thob phyir spyod pa// phyogs bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho yod pa rnams// rdul sbubs kun tu de dag chud byas shing // zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na// rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin
93b4(phal chen): dang spyod pa dang // chos rnams kun la spyod cing gnas pa'i rnams// rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par kun kyang snang// chos kyi dbyings rnams lus kyis khyab byas shing // zhing rnams 'byam klas kun na shi nang tu zhugs// sems can rgya mtsha/ 
93b5(phal chen): don du de spyod cing // rdul phran kun la chos kyi dbyingasu zhugs// chos kyi dbyings la de ltar zhugs nas kyang // rdul phran kun la myi zad tha myi dang // nam mkha'i dbyings ni lus kyis gang byas shing // rgyal po'i chos rnams yangs pa
93b6(phal chen): rab tu ston// yon tan rgya mtsho 'od kun gzhal du myed// rnam yangs stobs chen 'od zer yon tan sngon// 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i don du spyod byed cing // rgyal ba'i spyod lam gzhal du myed pa stonang // gang gyi don du bskal pa rgya mcho dag
93b7(phal chen): mtha' yas par ni bzang po'i spyod spyad pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// thams cad chos kyi dbyings las rab tu brjod// zhing rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // stobs bcu rnams kyang ji ltar byung gyur dang // 
93b8(phal chen): sems can rgya mtsho ji ltar byung 'gyur ba// sems can rnams la sgra dbyangs gtong zhing stond// 'khor rnams yangs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang // kun tu bzang po khyod la mngon sum gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang bar gyur pa'i// 
94a1(phal chen): chos kyi la'ar ma de dang tong kyim dang / gning du rgyas par chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas palab che zhes bya las/ kun du b.rang ba na de 'azhid dang rnam par 'phrul pa rang du byung ba zhes bya// 
94a2(phal chen): le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam par bltas// sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas// chos
94a3(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas// sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang // dbang po rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho la
94a4(phal chen): rnam par bltas// dus rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas nas// byang chub
94a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa de thams cad la smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dra zhing 'jig pa yongasu dag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes ni bsam g+him+b+hi
94a6(phal chen): khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las 'byung ba rgya mtsho mkhyen pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par
94a7(phal chen): gnas pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad mtha' dang dpung myed par bstand pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom
94a8(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsam pa dang dang pa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni bsam
94b1(phal chen): gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi skad cig gcig la dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid thug su chud pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs/ 
94b2(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho yang dag par bstand pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// sangs
94b3(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par dgod pa rab tu bstand pa rgya mtsho ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu bstan pa yong su dag pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// sangs rgyas
94b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung myed pas rnam par snang ba ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yong su dag pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgya/ 
94b5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa mtha' yas pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer mtha' yas kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mya
94b6(phal chen): khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dpal rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu 'grub pa ni bsam
94b7(phal chen): gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshe 'phrul rnam gsum yayong su bstan pas sems can rgya mtsho yongasu spyan par mdzad pa dang // 'dul ba mdzad pa ni bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
94b8(phal chen): rnams kyi 'dul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la brtson pa don yod pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu bzhugs pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
94b9(phal chen): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
95a1(phal chen): nod pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la tha myi dang bar spyod pa ni bsam gyis mu khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / 
95a2(phal chen): rnam sar 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen po'i ye shes rnam par dag pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos myi 'phrogs pa ni bsam
95a3(phal chen): gyis myi khyab ste// de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthu de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis byin du brlabs pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
95a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rje su brtsa yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du de
95a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rje su brtsab ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can gyi dad pa rgya mtsho tha dad pa ji bzhin du rab tu bstan pa dang / sems
95a6(phal chen): can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul kun du snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rgya mtsho'i sgrib pa'i ri gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang rgya
95a7(phal chen): la'abyung ba'i lam rnam par sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i sngon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'gro/ 
95b1(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho rnams de bas kyang shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / mos pa'i tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings
95b2(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin dang snying po sgo kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi myig dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba yongasu spyod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad
95b3(phal chen): kun nas snang bar byed pa'i snying po shes rab chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor thams cad yong su bzung ba'i gzungs kyi stobs yang dag par bskyed pa dang / snying po byang chub thos cad du sangs rgyas kyi yu
95b4(phal chen): thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul snang ba'i 'ang chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtshornam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir// de'i mtshigs su bcang ba ni
95b5(phal chen): dag smras so// yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi ye shes zab// mtha' dang dpung myed des ni zhing rnams khyab// sems can bsam pa sbyor ba ji bzhin snang // rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo'o// bsam gyis myi khyab rgya mtsho'i/ 
95b6(phal chen): zhing yod pa// bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pa// sems can rgya mtsho yongasu sbyin bya'i phyir// sems can nang na rgyal ba rnam par mdzes// sems can rgya mtsho 'byung ba bsam myi khyab// sangs rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin/ 
95b7(phal chen): tu zang // srid pa'i gnas can dang ba chung ba'i sa// sangs rgyas byang chub shes par myi nus so// gzhan du gang rnams shinang du sems brtan cing // dge ba'i bshes gis yong su bzung ba dang // sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyi brnangs
95b8(phal chen): dag sangs rgyas lashes 'ad pa tu 'jus// gang rnams sems dag nam byed tu meng // yang rnga'i rnams cas mnas byams na dang // dang pam sa can dgan// 'di gnas shing ga rlo 'ju
96a1(phal chen): kun du bzang po'i smon lams dag dang // chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbyi du khyarab pa la// gnas shing spyod pa rab tu sus spyod pa// de dag rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'di shes so// gang gyis rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul 'di
96a2(phal chen): mthong ba'i// byang chub sems dpa'as thob bya legs par thob// gzhan gyi yul gyis shes par myi nus te// 'di ni kun tu bzang pos gtogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byinang rlabs shing // 'gro ba mtha' dang su
96a3(phal chen): myed 'di dag na// kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// rnam par snang mdzad yul dang mthu yin no// 'dig gyi lus su zhing rnams thams cad kyang // rab tu zhugs zhing rnams kun// de dag sug rtse kun du la bar gyis// rgyal ba 'i
96a4(phal chen): spyod yul shi nang tu bshad par bya// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam spyod pa rnams// mtha' dang dpung myed mngon par bsgrub pa dang // kun tu myig gi yul dang lus ldan pa// de dag mgon po'i spyod yul 'di nyan to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu
96a5(phal chen): po 'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shind tu bstand pa ste// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang // ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 
96a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams yong su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu rkyen shinang du bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shinang du bstan pa dang / 'di la ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha'i dbyings dang rnam pa shinang du bstadang pa dang / 'di na na
96a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ldan shinang tu bstand pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rgyan shin tu bstan pa dang 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha yongasu dag par bya ba'i tshul shinang du bstanang pa dang / 'di la ste 'jig
96a8(phal chen): na tshwalas rgyam tshad gtum pa kyis byung ba gning du dun pa dang / 'dis pa 'jig rten gyilangs rgya tsho'i banapa pa'i phyi ngas shinang du bathun pa dang / 'dun na/ brnam bamatha' las pa'i chud kyi ma cho ga na ba / 
96b1(phal chen): 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha myi dad pa shinang tu bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag la stsogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shinang du bstand pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
96b2(phal chen): shi nad tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi gsungaso// gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen la
96b3(phal chen): dmyigs pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed phrag bcus byung ngo // 'byung ngo byung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs dang / chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang / sems can
96b4(phal chen): rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang / sems can rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang bsod nams kyi rtsa ba skal ba mthun pa bstsags pa dang / 
96b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing yong su dag pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pas rnam par bsgrubs pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang
96b6(phal chen): rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge' ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rgyu mthun pas mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa khyu mchog gyi mthu dbyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
96b7(phal chen): kun tu bzang po rnams kyi smon lam gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar rgyu dang rkyen la dmyigs pa'i sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen la dmyigs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shinang du bram
96b8(phal chen): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i thams cad byung ngo byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byung ba shin du bsan pa 'di nyid la gsal bar spyod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi
97a1(phal chen): dang bung byung ba// rnan pang sang ma ngas kyis yongs sus// rlung dru sems dang kun gyi mam pa bzhin// smon lam rgya mtsham pa mas rnas sbyangs shing // ba ma can las rnams rgya mtshabs
97a2(phal chen): bas te phyogs kun ning rnams rgya mtshathams cad 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi nam 'phrul dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgras// sngon lam rgya mtshothams cad mngon ba sgrubs shing // nam ngam/ 
97a3(phal chen): dbyings la 'byam klas shing 'byung ngo // spyod pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpud med rnams// spyod cing tshad myed bde gshegs yul la 'jug/ phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun spyong zhing // bskal pa mtha' yas zhing rnams re rer/ 
97a4(phal chen): spyod// sems can bsam dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// las kyis zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad byung // phyogs kyi zha nyon mos las gyis de dag bcas// mos dang bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// zhing rnams rgya cha
97a5(phal chen): rnam dag rgya can rnams// rin chen rgyus byung sna tshogs dri myed pa// dad pa rgya mtsho rnam par spel ba'i phyir// rgyal sras rnams ni phyogs bcur zhing rnams sbyong // chos dbyings rdul gyi khongs su rgyal sras rnams// kun tu bzang po'i/ 
97a6(phal chen): spyad pa spyod pa dag/ rdul gyi khongs su mtha' yas zhing ston te// rnam dag mkha' bzhin mtha' dang dpung yang myed// nam mkha' dbyings 'dra'i rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste// snying po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na// pad mo'i snyan/ 
97a7(phal chen): 'khod kho dog mtha' yas kun// de dag zhing bcas lus kyi nang na 'khod// skad cig sems kyis dus gsum 'byung ba'i// zhing 'brung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang ston// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dus gsum zhing bstan pa/ 
97b1(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho'i zhing myi zad// tshul gyi khyad par mtha' yas sna tshogs pas// rdul rnams kun la mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams// sangs rgyas skad cig gcig la byin gyis rlob// rgyan gyi rnam pa tshul kun rab
97b2(phal chen): du mkhyen// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la gnas pa shi nang du bstand pa ni// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shind tu phra ba sred de// 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan
97b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi rgya mtsho kun la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho la la ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho la rab du gnaso// 
97b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po chen thams cad kyi kha dog gyi mdog la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi kham
97b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sgyu ma la bu'i las kyis byung ba lA ma yin dang // mthu 'i che la bu'i lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams
97b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rgya mtshol rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams
97b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems kun du bzang po'i smon lam gyis rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa ste// de dag la stsogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gnas pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing
97b8(phal chen): yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shind phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstand pa'i don 'di nyid yongasu bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi
98a1(phal chen): mdu da 'a / bram ni mas rgyas 'didag sa su rgyamatha nga/ 'das rgya
98a2(phal chen): rgyu'i sa dbyings legs 'khor bar snang // de dag gis ni phyogs bcu'i na mkha'i dbyings rnams zhing kun rab tu khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri myed 'od can nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas// snang ba'i snying po can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dag
98a3(phal chen): la legs par gnas// 'gro ba de dbus rgyal ba 'khor lo bzang po skor// 'ang mo sangs rgyas yul yin sems can rgya chen shinang du mgu byed pa'o// la la me tog sngon ma kun tu rgyas pa'i mu tig nor bus brgyan// 'od zer dra ba'i
98a4(phal chen): kun nas sprin 'bar 'od 'phro sprin gyi 'od can te// zhing mang mtha' dang dpung myed rgya chen pad mo'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab brgyan zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil 'khor dbyings rnams la la sangs rgyas byin la gnas// 
98a5(phal chen): yangs shing rin chen mang ldan rgya chen de dag byang chub sems dpa'as gang // lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho mang tshogs lnga dbang lus la de bzhin gnas// de na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// nor bu'i shing dang
98a6(phal chen): spos kyi 'od 'phro ba'i sprin rnams mnyam pa'i dbyings la gnas// chu'i phung po dag dang rdo rje rgya mtsho brtan la'ang de bzhin gnas// la la gos dang brag dang rgyal mtshan me tog rgya mtsho dag la gnas// kun na'ang rnam 'phrul 'di dag rgya
98a7(phal chen): chen rnam par snang mdzad stonang pa mdzad// zhing rnams ring dang thung dang klog gi gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs ste// sna tshogs rgyan ces snying po dri ma bral ba yongs dag dri myed snang // rnam pa sna tshogs de dag smon lam rgya mtsho dbyings la/ 
98a8(phal chen): btu sa// sas rgyam na gyis su nam yangs du ma thu pa gyis 'dags// rnam chu 'argyam thasel labyi rdu sa pad nga byed pa sa// byang chu mas dpa mi na mangs grang
98b1(phal chen): dag par gnas// de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen thams cad kun nas rab tu snang // rin chen sangs rgyas gsung rnams kun tu gtong ldan de dag las kyis sprul// chos kyi dbyings mnyam zhing rnams 'byam klas myig yor sgyu ma dang / 
98b2(phal chen): yang 'dra/ mig 'phrul rnam phye rnam dag dri myed sems kyis shi nad tu bskyed pa ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang // las kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag bde bar gshegs
98b3(phal chen): pas stan// skad cig sems kyis zhing rnams 'byam klas 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i rnams// zhing rdul kun la kun du bzang po rtag par rtag tu bsgrub byed cing // de nas bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba sbyin par bya phyir spyad pa spyod/ 
98b4(phal chen): chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun du rnam 'phrul de che ston// rdul rnams kun na chos dbyings yangs pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang gnas// sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin gyis brlabs pas kun kyang yog cing yongasu rgyas/ 
98b5(phal chen): ji ltar rdul phran gcig la rnam 'phrul de bzhin 'gro ba kun na'o// rnam par snang ba'i snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen rab tu ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad myig yor lta bu sgyu ma smyig rgyu 'dra// snang ba myed cing
98b6(phal chen): 'byung myad phyogs bcu dag na 'gro dang 'ong ba myed// mkha' la gnas pa de dag rtag par 'byung zhing 'dzag par de bzhin 'gyur// shinang tu yangs pa de dag smon lam rnam spangs las kyis yongasu bzung // kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la 'jig
98b7(phal chen): ten khams rgya mtsho rnams kyi dbyings ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// 'jig rten gyi las rgya mtsho byam klas pa la la ni kun nas zlum pa'o// 'jig rten gyi las rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas gru bzhir// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
98b8(phal chen): byam thas pa la la nan ma mar rnam padum rna par byar// 'dag na na pas rgya tshoms rnams la kun na 'artsom par dgyi 'dug no// ga la sa rgya che 'byang mas 'am ma 'ang ma
99a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la lan shing sku tshogs kyi lhun gyi dbying su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni me tog sna tshogs kyi dbyi'i su dug go// 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mtsho
99a2(phal chen): klas pa la la ni khyim sna tshogs kyi dbyibasu 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i byam klas pa la la ni sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyi dbyingasu 'dug// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni mtshan sna tshogs kyi dbyi/ 
99a3(phal chen): su 'dug go// de dag la stsogs pa 'jig rten gyi khris kyi dbyibs shinang tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shinang tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtsho'i dbyibs kyi tshul rgya/ 
99a4(phal chen): mtsho 'di nyid yongasu bstan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing la ltos// rnam bye sna tshogs mtha' yas dbyings su
99a5(phal chen): gnas// dbyings kyis rnam par bye ba sna tshogs te// phyogs rnams kun na zhing rnams rgya mtsho snang // la la zlu bo la la zur gsum ste// de dag la la phyogs na grub bzhir gnas// nor bu pang mo 'khor lo yin lag brgyad // kun kyang las
99b1(phal chen): las rnams rgya mtsho bsam myi khyab// sku gcig rtse la bsam gyis myi khyab cing // thams cad rdul snyed sna tshogs dbyings na gnas// kun na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// 'khor rnams rgya mtshor chos rnams rab
99b2(phal chen): tu son cha rdul gcig rtse la phra dang yangs pa rnams// thams cad rdul snyed kha dog kun dang ldan// kha dog dbyibs rnams kun kyang rnam par brtags// de dag kun na rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor// rdul rnams kun la rab tu zhing bstan
99b3(phal chen): ci de dag smon lam rnam par sprul pa yin// na mkha'i dbyingasu las kyis sprul pa ni// sna tshogs sems dang bsam pas rnam par brtags// sems can kun mnyam rdul rnams thams cad la// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa
99b4(phal chen): sprul pa dag/ rnam par snang mdzad chos nyid de yin te// rdul phran kun la zhi rnams shinang tu bstanang // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lhun dag ni gzhan dang gzhan du shes par byas te// 'jig rten gyi
99b5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po tshe gcig las rnam pa sna tshogasu bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhun cano// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi
99b6(phal chen): 'odo zer gyi ldan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni 'od kha dog su tshogs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni rgyan rnams cad kyi mdog kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam tshol la nI dze na
99b7(phal chen): myi shigs pa'i yun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs kyi yun can no// 'jig rten gyi las rgya mtshol la ni rin po che'i mtshan nyid kyi lan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi/ 
99b8(phal chen): mtshol la ni sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni nyi ma'i nor bu dkyil 'khor gyi lun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni rin po che shinang du phra ba 'dzind pa'i lun can no// 
100a1(phal chen): 'dag tan rgya lams rgya mtshal lan spang ba btas no// 'jig rten tshalas rgyamamal lan na'i thebasas cad kyi 'dag 'ang 'tha ba dam par 'asmras no// bdagarten gyi las rgya mtshal la na da dang 'das / 
100a2(phal chen): sa kyi sa kyi ra ro// 'jig rten gyi 'anas rgyab mam la rjod du 'ams cad kyimags nga pan gyi ltan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshal la no da 'a mthams cad kyirang kyi su ma na/ 'jig rten rgya
100a3(phal chen): rgya mtshal la ni rgyan thams cad shinang du bstan pa'i lun can no// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skad cig gis dmyigs pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la
100a4(phal chen): la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rin po che'i dbyibs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs
100a5(phal chen): rnam par dmyigs pa'i lan can no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin da bu bstand pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid la rab tu gzung bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byini gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu
100a6(phal chen): rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smra so// zhing gyi rgya mtsho la la ni// rin chen rang bzhin kun na gnas// rdo rje bzhin du myi shigs sa// rin chen pad mo rnams la gnas// la la 'od zer rang bzhin te// dag cing
100a7(phal chen): bzung myed 'od zer 'byung // rgyan rnams kun gyi 'od zer gyis// sna tshogs mkha' bzhin dri ma myed// la la 'od kyi rang bzhin te// dag cing 'od zer gsal la gnas// 'od kyis sprin can sna tshogs 'od// byang chub sems dpa'
100a8(phal chen): rnams kyi gnas// zhing namam rgya ma tshol la ni// tshul g.yong sa zung gnas pa ste// brjod du byed cing bzung du byed// smon lam dbang gyis rabatu byung // ma la nang bu mu byig tu// slong ba mas cad rnam par bar // dzu pa 'ang
100b1(phal chen): mo 'ogani dag pa// byang chub sems dpa' sa yongs gang ba// rin chen 'od 'phro byung ba'i zhing // 'od 'phro'i sprin gyis mngon phebs shing // rin chen thams cad sna tshogs ldan// thams cad las kyi sprul pa yin// la la mtshan la/ 
100b2(phal chen): byung ba ste// gzhi kun mtshan gyis kun tu bris// cod pan rnam pa sna tshogs bkod// sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par sprul// rgya mtsho'i sems las byung ba ste// zhing rnams mos pa yid la gnas// yul na myi gnas sgyu
100b3(phal chen): ma bzhin// yongasu rtog pas yang dag bskyed// sangs rgyas sku'i 'od zer gyi// nor bu sna tshogs kun du gnas// sangs rgyas sprin rnams par snang // sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu sprul// la la kun tu bzang po yis// zhing rnaMs
100b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho shin tu sprul// na mkha'i rgyan rnams thas cad dang // smon lam rnams kyi rnam par bris// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rgyan shi nang tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang du/ 
100b5(phal chen): pra ba snyed du shes par bya ste// 'di ltar dmyigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phros pa'i rgyan dang // 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo rje su rjod cing rab du byung ba'i rgyan dang // 'di la/ 
100b6(phal chen): ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho las rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang // 'di la ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i klong khongasu sanang pa'i rgyan dang / 
100b7(phal chen): 'di lta ste dus gsum gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs rnam par dmyigs pa'i rgyan dang // 'di la ste seMs kyi skad cig la bskal pa mtha' yA ba rnaM pA 'phrul pa'i yur yongasu sonang pa'i rgyan dang // 'di la ste rgyan gyi dmyig pa thas cad
100b8(phal chen): las sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang // 'di lta ste rin po che dang spos thas cad kyi sprin rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste snying po byang chub kyi rgyan dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di la ste byang chub sems dpa'
101a1(phal chen): spyong bas da ngag kyi sa na kyi na pa pa ra// sas rgyas kyi kyi kyi bas kyis phyogs nan pa sakyi// 
101a2(phal chen): bcang ba 'di dag smraso// zhing rnams rgyam margya chen mtha' las te// rnam dag las kyi sna tshogs gnas// phyogs bcu'i nang rnams rgya mtshornams kun kyang // su tshogs rgya can yangs pas kun nas gnas// khatog sa chom
101a3(phal chen): yangs pa'i zhing gyi rnams// rgya mtsho rtag par phyogs rnams kun tu 'byung // rgyan dang rin chen 'od 'bro sna tshogs sbyin// sgra 'byin zhing gyi dbyings rnams khyabs par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho nas// de dag kun
101a4(phal chen): kyang rgya mtsho'i zhing na drag/ sna tshogs rgyan dang smon lam sprin gyi rnams// de dag zhing mang rgya mtshor sgra yang 'byind// 'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag// rgyan gyi sprin rnams kun nas sgrar 'byin te// sems can de dag rje sprin rje
101a5(phal chen): 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byin gyis kun nas sgra yang sgrog/ dus gsum byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i// rnam 'phrul zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // dmyigs pa re re la yang sangs rgyas kun// de 'dra'i zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rgyan la ltos// 
101a6(phal chen): 'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang // phyogs bcu'i da ltar byung ba'i ji snyed pa'i// bskal pa de dag rgyan mang yangs pa yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho re re dag na snang // dmyigs pa kun la sangs rgyas sprin gyi rnams// 'gro dang mnyam pas/ 
101a7(phal chen): 'jig rten kun tu 'gengs// rnam par 'phrul zhing sems can rnam par 'dul// 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnamathard to// spos 'od srin dang de bzhin me tog krung // rgyan nas sna tshog thas cad kun nas kyang // rtag par kun du khyab pa rab du 'byung // 
101b1(phal chen): 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam tha ra to// phyogs bcur kun gyi snying po byang chub rnams// sna tshogs rgyan can kun kyang ma lus par// thams cad rgya ma ma'i zhing 'di dbyibs dag na// namakha'i sprin bzhin rnam par ston pa
101b2(phal chen): sAng de rgyal sras kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi// zhing rnams mtha' yas 'byam klas rgyan gyi rnams// 'gro ba'i grangs sed skal pa rgya mtshor rnam sbyangs pa// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun du rab tu snang // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 
101b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed du shes par byas te// 'di ltar byang chub tu sems dpa' rnams kyi dge' ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la brtan
101b4(phal chen): pa'i dge' ba'i rtsa bas bskal pa mnyam pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bsod nams rgya chen po'i sprin rnam par 'phel bar byang ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par dag pa dang / 
101b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu brtan pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang // yongs su sbyang ba dang / byang chub
101b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu dgod cing gzung ba'i rnam par spyod pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang // 'byung ba rgya mtshol rnam par spyod pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' kya rnams
101b7(phal chen): kyi smon las rgya ma tsha thams cad mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub 'a rnam par dag pa la rang tu 'jug pa dang // 'dil ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi rdum
101b8(phal chen): yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang // de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongasu dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun
102a1(phal chen): tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid rnam par bstan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas
102a2(phal chen): te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rnams par rgyan// smon lam rgya tshul rnams rgya mtsho rnam kyis 'byung // kha dog mtha' yas las kyi rgya mtshos dag/ zhing rnams
102a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho dag tu 'ongs mang 'khyed// sngan chad dge ba'i rtsa ba shes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing // bskal ba mnyam pa'i las dge yongs sbyangs te/ snying rje byams pas 'gro yangs kun bkang zhing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho/ 
102a4(phal chen): yangs pa 'di kun sbyangs// chos sgo kun tu ting 'dzin sa kun gyis// sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho yongs sbyangs te// bsam gtan tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyangs shong // zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yongs pa byung // smos pa'i
102a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor mtha' yas stobs bskyed cing // rgyal ba'i mnyam nyid ma nor rtogs byas nas// bzod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnam yongasasu shing // rnam dag kha dog mtha' yas zhing rnams 'byung // bsod nams rgya sprin ni na mkha'
102a6(phal chen): mnyam bskyed cing // 'gro ba kun phan po de don spyod spyad de// bsod nams rgya mtsho sems can kun bstan pas// 'jigs rten khams rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang byung // zhing rnams rgya mtsho rdul snyed tshad med pa'i// pha rol phyin
102a7(phal chen): pa ma lus kun sbyangs te// smon lam mthar phyin mi zad goms byas pas// bri med rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yangs pa 'byung // 'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yid tshad mod dang / chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs sbyangs te/ 
102a8(phal chen): sna tshogs thabs sgos sems can sbyangs pas na// 'di 'dra yid 'ong rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams na byung // rgyan rnams kun gyi tshul dang sa yangs shing // rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho kun gzhugs nas// 'gro ba kun gyi sdug
102b1(phal chen): bsngal mcho bskams pas ka zhing gyi mtsho yangs 'di kun dag par 'gyur// stobs rnams rgya mtsho ga zhal med yongs shing // 'gro ba 'di 'dra tshad med rnams sbyangs te// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yangs kun bsnyen bkur bA
102b2(phal chen): zhing mang rgya mtsho rnam mang rnam par dag/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi kham rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shinang du phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste// 'di ltar sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku chu ngur kun tu ston to// 
102b3(phal chen): 'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad gzugs kyi skus gang bar ston to// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad myi ring ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad ring ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sangs rgya
102b4(phal chen): kyi zhing gcig yong su dag par byin gyis rlob po// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yong su dag par byin gyis rlob po// sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi gcig gyis yongs su bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo// 
102b5(phal chen): byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni tshul bsam gyis myi khyab par bstand pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sems can gyi khams nyung ngu rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas
102b6(phal chen): 'byung ba la la ni sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rnam par gdul ba byin gyis brlob ste// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ra sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shinang tu phra ba
102b7(phal chen): steng du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'di nyid yongasu bsand pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe
102b8(phal chen): tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// rgyal ba 'byung ba thabs rnams sna tshogs kyi// sgro nas zhing rnams rgya mtsho rab tu 'byung // de dag sems can bsam pa ji bzhin mkhyend// sangs rgyas thams kyi sgo mang rgya mtsho'o// sangs rgyas chos srubs
102b9(phal chen): gyis myi khyab ste// myig g.yor ma yin mtshan nyid myed pa'i gzugs// gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu// sems can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin sond la ltos// sku tshe thung bar la la rnam par stond// la la bskal pa bsam
103a1(phal chen): yas byin gyis rlor// chos kyi sgon phyogs rnams kun gyi sgo// rab tu mdzes pa 'gro ba 'di na bzhugs// la la zhing rnams rgya mtsho bas ma yas dag/ snong zhingadi 'byam yas phyogs bcu kunana'ang // la la zhing
103a2(phal chen): rnam par sbyong ba mdzad// smon lam ma lus kun kyang tshul gcig go// la la bsam gyi myi khyab theg pa'i rgyanang // sems can yadang bzhin sangs rgyas son pa mdzad// la la theg pa gcig kyang rab stond te// rgyal ba'i thams ni gcig kyang mtha' yaso// 
103a3(phal chen): radabyung la lo byang chung sangs rgyas nas// sems can myi mang lam la gzhog pa mdzad// la la skad cig gcig gis sems can rnams// rgya mtshamatha' yas byang chub don du 'dul// la la spu'i sgo nas mtha' yas pa'i// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sprin rnaMs/ 
103a4(phal chen): rab du 'gyed// 'gro ba kun tu de dag mngon bkang zhing // thabs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul ba mdzad// lal sangs rgyas gsung gyis kun bkang zhing // ning du sems can yid bzhin rab tu sgrog/ mtha' yas bsal bar de dag gsung sgrog cing / 
103a5(phal chen): sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul// la la zhing rgya bsam gyis myi khyab ste// 'khor rnams yongs dag kun nas 'khor bcas pas// zhing mang rgya mtsho phyogasu gang byas shing // sangs rgyas mkha' la sprin ltar khyab par bzhugs/ 
103a6(phal chen): de ltar sangs rgyas thabs ni bsam myi khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu rgyas bkang zhing // 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon sum ste// sna tshogs rgya mang du ma'i tshul dang ldan// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bsngal/ 
103a7(phal chen): pa'i rkyen gyi rlabs kyi tshul shinang du bstand pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shinang du pra ba snyed du shes par bya ste// 'di ltar zhing rgya mtshol la ni bskal pa grangs myed par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// 'angadi rgya mtshol la ni bskal pa tshad med par/ 
103a8(phal chen): byin gyis brlab so// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskrad pa dpag tu myed par byin gyis rlab so// zhing rgya mtshol la ni bskal pa bsam gyis myi khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa mtshungs pa med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// 
103b1(phal chen): zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa kun nas mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa kun pa nas mu myed par byin gyis brlabs po// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa gzhal du med par byin gyis brlab so// zhing
103b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa brjod du myed par byin gis brlabs pa'o// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bskal pa'i byin gis brlabs kyi tshul shinang du bstand pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shining du phra ba snyed do// 
103b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi tshul shi nad du bstand pa 'di yongasu bstan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcud rnam par bltas te/ 
103b4(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bskal pa tha dad de// sna tshogs tshul 'jug rgyan rnams gzhan dang gzhan// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // bskal pa tshul ni rgya mtsho grangs kyang myed// skal ba myi
103b5(phal chen): mthun 'gro ba kun dang mnyam// phyogs dbyings 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams na snang // bskal pa mtha' yas la la ring dang thung // bskal pa sna tshogs rgyal ba'i sgras kyang bsgrags// rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'di dag phyogs dbyings snang // byin rlabs
103b6(phal chen): bskal pa zhing rdul snyed dang ldan// la la gzhan rnams bskal pa gcig gis 'jug/ la la bskal grangs smon lam du mas byung // bskal pa la la dri med la la nyon mongs can// la la rnam dag la la nyon mongs rnam par dag/ bskal pa'i mingan
103b7(phal chen): smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis byung // sems can 'du shes rnam pas tha dad tshul la 'jug/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed sngan chad spyod spyad pas// 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho shinang tu yangs shing dag/ de dag kun nas sangs rgyas yul
103b8(phal chen): can kyang byed// 'dodas rgyacan 'arnam pa'i 'jig rte rgya tsha lams// bad la dzim nga 'ad ci rgyang rdzogs// sam ldan rgyas dang 'od tam 'ang ma tshun 'angag/ dang dang bying babang ba bslal batshung la 'ardzun/ 
104a1(phal chen): bskal ba 'di dag pa rnam dag bskal pa kun nas byung // dri mid bskal ba' 'ang sangs rgyas gcig spyo// bskal ba la yang chung gi tso bo mtha' yas 'byung // bskal ba'i drus rnams thams cangs chul zad myi shes// smon lam sa
104a2(phal chen): mthus bskal ba sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur// bskal pa mtha' yas lal rnams kyang bskal gcig 'dus// bskal pa la la gcig tu bskur ba bye ba'i mthu// bskal pa rgya mtsho kun kyang sna tshogs sgonas 'jug/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nang nas
104a3(phal chen): sgra yang 'byin// bskal pa la lar bskal pa kun gyi rgyan kyang 'byung // mying gi rgyan rnams rnam par dag pa'ang de la yod// bskal ba la la sangs rdzu 'phrul mthu' yis 'byung // bskal pa'i tshul rnams kun gyi 'di'i rgyan yangs yin// zhing dang bskal/ 
104a4(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho tshul ni gcig dag/ zhing gi rdul rnams kun kyang tshad med gzhal tu myed// skad cig yud tsam nyi ma'i grangs kyis bskal par 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad sems can 'du shes rnams par 'byung // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi
104a5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul shi nang tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste// 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag bskal pas 'jig cing 'du ba la rab tu
104a6(phal chen): 'jug pa rab tu gnas pa dang // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa kun nas gnas pa dang // 'di la ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshar gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsod
104a7(phal chen): ma rgya margyachen pa sags pa rnams pa dag pas// 'dig rten gyilas rgyam nanas ca ngas pal rnam par dag par gnas pa dang // 'dinas byang chub sems dpa tshang ba rdzogs kyi spong ba ma zungs
104b1(phal chen): rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan du 'dod pas bskal ba rgyan tha dad pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang // 'di lta ste phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtshor 'dus pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa/ 
104b2(phal chen): rgyan shi nad tu mang por kun nas gnas pa dang // 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi rgyan nub par 'gyur ba dang // 'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams/ 
104b3(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas gnas pa dang // 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongasu dag par gnas pa dang // de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khas
104b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba steng du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yang 'jig
104b5(phal chen): rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongasu bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag spraso// zhing rnam rgya mtsho'i chos nyid/ 
104b6(phal chen): 'di dag ltos// chos kyis byung ste ji lar gnas pa lar// de dag 'byung zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu snang // sems can nyon mongs myi zad ldan pa dang // las dang nyon mongs ngan pas bsgribs pa rnams/ 
104b7(phal chen): de dag bsam la zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams// kun nas nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yin// sems can rnam dag bsam pa ldan pa rnams// bsod nams brtan dang rnam dag spyod yul can// rnam dag yul la nyon mongs ldan gyur da rnams/ de dag
104b8(phal chen): momos pa sna tshogs spyod yul gyi// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus dag na// bskal pa de ni rnam par snang // sems can nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yang // de'i chos nyid bsam yas yangs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bskyed pa dang / 
105a1(phal chen): de dag bsam pa ji ltar rnam 'phel bas// de bzhin bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po dag/ bsam gyis myi khyab zhing rgyan yongasu spyod // bye ba mang po bsam yas myi zad pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcur kun rgyu yang // rgyal rnam par
105a2(phal chen): dad yod pa myin// bskal ba tha dad tshul gyi bye brag snang // rdul rnams re re'i sbubasu dus kun du// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i// rgyal sras ci tshul 'dod pa de bzhin du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho de tshul dag par 'gyur// gal te rgyal ba rnams
105a3(phal chen): ni skyer 'gyur na// zhing rnams rgyan gyis shind tu brgyan par 'gyur// bsam pa yangs dag de bzhin rgyas 'gyur te// 'di ni zhing rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o// gal te rgyal ba mya ngan 'das gyur na// de'i tshe de zhing rgyan rnams 'grib par 'gyur// sems can rnams
105a4(phal chen): kyang snod du rung ba myin// zhing gyi rgya mtsho de yang nyon mongs ldan// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul yangs pa dag// bsam gyi myi khyab gang tshe son pa na// de tshe zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po dag/ kun kyang rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan par 'gyur// kye rgyal ba'i sras
105a5(phal chen): dadag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha myi dad pa'i tshul ni 'jig rten gyi khos rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste// de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang // ma byon pa dang / da ltar byunga'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
105a6(phal chen): kyis gsung so// gsung ngo gsung bar gyur ro// de ni 'di la sa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho gcig tu 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho'i rdul shinang du phra ba sed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tha myi dad pa dang / 'dil ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu
105a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byung ba tha myi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang chub thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tha myi dad pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho dag gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
105a8(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor tha myi dad pa dang // 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tha myi dad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams kyi sprul pa'i
105b1(phal chen): du/ mtsha gyi 'khor lo ba myi ngang pa dang / 'di la ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bskal ba mtha' yas par brjod cing rgyas par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs tha myi dang ba
105b2(phal chen): 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tha myi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag du rdul shi nang tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yong su 'du ba tha myi dad pa dang / 
105b3(phal chen): 'di la ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul 'byam klas pa thams cad la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po ston cing brjod pa tha myi thad pa dag ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha myi dang hrI
105b4(phal chen): tshul 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang du phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho tha myi dad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho shi nang du bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa phyir/ 
105b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnams par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// rdul rtsig steng na zhing mang rgya mtsho ste// kun na rgyan mang rnam dag kun yod kyang // gnod pa myed cing 'dre ba gang yang myed// 'jug
105b6(phal chen): ba bsam gyis myi khyab 'di la ltos// rdul rnams kun la bsam yas sangs rgyas bzhugs// sems can kun gyi bsam pa yid bzhin du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad khyab byas kyang // de dag thabs la tha dad gang yang myed// rdul rnams
105b7(phal chen): sman pa shang da pa ma pa/ tshags rgyan nas rjes smras te// phyosams kun gyi mang du ga // ngan pa dang 'byung ba myed// nga rgya ma ma ga/ gyu pa
105b8(phal chen): 'jos rten dun rgya nga ga zhugs kyang // ga da pa dag dang 'dro gyi bgyid// rdul gcags ni pa mas tsha byed do// phyos btsun ri ma la chu tsho'i kun gang dang // 'jig shegs ma
106a1(phal chen): spyod bstan kyang // rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams tha dad gang yang myed// rdul rnams kun la kha dog bsam myi khyab// sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun tu gang byas te// sangs rgyas sprul pas sems can rnam 'dul yang // 'byam klas/ 
106a2(phal chen): phyogs na tha dad gang yang myed// rdul rnams kun la rgya mtsho'i chos brjod de// de dag 'khor lo tshul bzhin 'khor mdzad cing // thabs dang mthu'i sgo mo sna tshogs kyis// thams cad brjod kyang de la tha dad myed// rdul gcig la la ni rgyal ba/ 
106a3(phal chen): kun gyi gsung // 'gro ba snod du gyur pa de dag brjod bya ste// rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal par byin brlabs kyang // de dag gsung gyi yan lag tha myi dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams// thams cad rdul bsgrubs gcig tu rab tu 'dzud/ 
106a4(phal chen): rgyal ba rnams kyi rdung 'phrul mthul ltos// las kyis dngos la de dag skyes pa myin// rdul gcig la ni dus gsum rgyal ba dag/ ji ltar byung ba de dag thams cad snang // de dag gshegs dang byon pa gang yang med// 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas rnam hA/ 
106a5(phal chen): 'phrul// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdor sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shinang du bstan pa'i phyogs gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ste le'u bzhi pa'o// shinang du rgyas pa chen po'i mdor
106a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya // bam po brgyad pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten ni khams rgya mchog ni dang sring ba me rtag gi rgyan kyis brgyan pa 'di btsam ldan 'das de bzhi gshes
106a7(phal chen): pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i che// bskal pa rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yong su dag par byas te// bskal pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rtend kyi
106a8(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs drung du// smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed kyis yongasu dag par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho ga zhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan
106b1(phal chen): gyis brgyan pa de ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed kyis shi nang tu bzung ba ste// de la rlung kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og ma ni gzhi kun nas rton pa zhes bya ste// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bas brgyan pa'i
106b2(phal chen): gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de// nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnam par dag pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na klung gyi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i mthu zhes
106b3(phal chen): bya ba yod de// rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro mnyam par rton pa zhes bya ba yod de// nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i gton to// de'i steng na rlung gyi dkyil
106b4(phal chen): 'khor rgyan kun nas rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod de// 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor me tog gi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlud kyi dkyil 'khor gzhi kun nas dri ma myed cing yongasu dag pa zhes bya ba yod de// me tog thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i seng ge'i
106b5(phal chen): khri zhes rton to// 'de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs kun tu sgra sgrogs cing kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de// mu tig dang man shel gyi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po chen thams cad 'dzin pa
106b6(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po shing dang me tog sna tshogs klong gi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzinang pa'i shugs shes bya ba yod de// spos kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ri rab kyi sprin gi gzhis ston to// de'i
106b7(phal chen): steng na rlung gyi 'khor gyi khyim kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de// rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi gzhis rton to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rlung gyi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shi nang du phra ba snyed de dag thos
106b8(phal chen): cad kyi steng ma ni rlung gyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid bzang po// dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba ste// nor bu kun nas snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i spos kyi chu rgya mtsho'i gzhis rton to// spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas snang ba'i gnyis brgyan pa'i snyi
107a1(phal chen): po zhes bya ba de las pad mchen po sbyin gyi rgyal mtsha byer pa'i 'ad par dang ba ba sna tshogs shes par bya ba mngan par byung // bang ba cher po de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ma ga ni dang slong mag tsa rgyan gyis brgyas
107a2(phal chen): ba kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa// rnam par dag pa shi nang tu brtand pa rdo rje dang nor bu thams cad kyi khor yug gyis bskor ba rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pa shing gyi rgyud rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa 'di 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems
107a3(phal chen): dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di nyid kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yong su dag pa'i phyogs 'di nyid brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par
107a4(phal chen): bltas te// de'i tshe tshog su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rgyan me tog 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho // rin chen kun gyi snying po kha dog sna tshogs te// rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// drung du sngon tshe rgya mtsho sbyangs pas
107a5(phal chen): dri ma myed// rgya chen snying rje sprin gyis khams rnams kun bkang zhing // zhing gyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i lus kyang kun bkang zhi/ sngon gyi bskal pa rgya mtsho spyod pa spyad pas na// 'jig rten gyi rgya mtsho'i khams de yangs shing rnams par dag/ 
107a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam par snang bas smon lam che mdzad de// 'od snang btang ba ba nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa ni// rlung kyi phung pos btab kyang myi bskyod myi g.yo sa// nor bu kun rgyan sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snying po'o// me tog mdzod bkye
107a7(phal chen): gdod pa rin chen 'di 'ong bzhin// sngon gyi smon lam dbang kyis mkha'i dbyings la gnas// rgya mtsho'i rgyan rnams thams cad sna tshogs brtan par gnas// phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams kun du 'od kyi sprin kyang gtong // nor bu thams
107a8(phal chen): cad sgonas byang chub sems dpa'i rnams// byung zhing 'ong zer smin 'bar phyogs rnams kun tu 'dod // 'od zer me tog tshon dang 'od zer 'khor lo'i tshogs// phyogs rnams ma lus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab par byed// rin chen kun gyi'o// 
107b1(phal chen): zer sprin rnams bkye ba ni// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed// sdug bsngal thams cad bcil zhing byang chub mchog la dgod// 'jig rten rgya mtsho thams cad 'od 'phro rab du 'bar// 'gro ba kun dang / 
107b2(phal chen): mnyam pa'i sprul pa satshags rnams// rin can kun dang skarnams kun nas rgyal ba 'byed// brgya byin dag dang tshangs pa'ang 'khor la sbyar 'dra dang // 'gro bkun gyi lus su lus rnams kun kyang gnas// sprul pas 'idab sa kyi
107b3(phal chen): dbyings kyi tshad mnyam pa// 'od zer sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad mtshan kyang sgrog/ 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi bsam pa tshim byas nas// tshul rnams sna tshogs sgro nas sems can rnam par 'dul// 'jig rten rgya mtsho me tog
107b4(phal chen): snying po de nang na// rdul phran kun gyi khongs na chos dbyings thams cad kyi// rin chen 'od bkye sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'bar bar snang // rnam par snang mdzad rnam 'phrul zhing la ltos// bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsul byas/ 
107b5(phal chen): smon lam yangs pa'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings mnyam dang // bzang po'i spyod pa brnyes shing ye shes ldan pa'i// dgongs pa las ni rgyan mdzes de dag byung ba yin// / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdor sangs rgyas phal po
107b6(phal chen): che zhes bya ba las// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pas snang ba zhes bya ste le'u lnga pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig
107b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i khor yug chen po ni nor bu'i rgyal po pad mo nyi ma'i gzhi la rtend pa ste// nor bu'i rig rgya mtsho spos kyi tsan thams cad las grub pa nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis
107b8(phal chen): lhun shi nad tu 'phags shing zil gyis gnod pa dang // nor bu spos zhim po gzi brjid kyi 'khor lo rnam par snang ba'i snying po can nor bu'i rgyal po rdo rje sra zhing myi shigs pa ltar shi nad tu mkhregs shing sra ba// rin po che'i chu thams cad kun nas/ 
108a1(phal chen): 'byung ba rin po che'i shing gi nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad me tog shin tu rgyas pa// spos kyi rtsi mchog bzang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spos kyi me tog dpal can shi nang du bzang bas rnams par brgyan pa// 
108a2(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dra bas kun nas bres pa ste// de dag la sogs pa rgyan bzang po'i rnam pa 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shind tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// de nas byang chub seMs/ 
108a3(phal chen): dpa' kun du bzang pos yang khor yug gyi rgyan dang yon tan yongasu dag pa 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smra so// 'jig rten gyi khams rnaMs
108a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho gang yod pa// mtha' dang dpung myed sna tshogs rnam pa can// nor bu mang pos rnam dag mtha' yas mdog// de dag sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul par 'byung // dri myed khor yug rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni// nor bu mang po de bzhin spos mang dang // 
108a5(phal chen): mu tig gsal ba'i tshogs la rab tu gnas// kha tog mtha' yas rin chen rnams kyis brtan// snying po nor bu'i sprin can sna tshogs sra// 'dzam bu chu klung 'od 'phro snying po'i tshigs// 'od 'phro dam pa phyogasu snang zhing 'tsher// khor yug/ 
108a6(phal chen): dri ma myed par rnam par mdzes// nor bu rdo rjes 'dus byas shi nang tu sra zhing brtan// 'tshams rnams myi phyed nor bu sna tshogs 'brul// / mtshan ldan nor bu rin chen rnam bkod pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis yongasu dag par snang / 
108a7(phal chen): spos chu'i sprin gris kha dog mtha' yas te// rin chen tsan dan me tog kun tu gram// pad mo sna tshogs gos kyis kun nas yog/ rin chen rtsi mchog dri zhim rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs shing gi sprin gyis kun nas brgyan// nor
108a8(phal chen): bzang kun gyis kun nas gzi brjid 'bar// 'od zer sprin gyi dkyil 'khor can// gos kyi chen gyis shinang du 'bar bar gnas// spos kyi 'od 'thong drug pa gdugs 'chang ba// byang chung sems dpa' mang bas chos dbyings dang / 
108b1(phal chen): snga byangs rang po rgyu mtsha mas cadan bying // 'di ni rnam par snang ma dang chos kyi 'khor bar// rin men mdzes pa de dag thams cad dang // rang tha dag dang gan nas 'das rnam shing / kun la rnam par mang ma dang sku gsal pa// bcu
108b2(phal chen): brnyan tshul du nang na yod pa snang // thams sacad gzugasu sku rnams mtha' yas te/ sangs rgyas sprul mang kha dog mu myed pas// thams cad phyogs dang chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing // sems can mang po tshad myed rnam par 'dul// 5/ 
108b3(phal chen): cang rgyal bas sgra dbyangs kun 'byung ste// rnam par snang mdzad sman lam 'khor lo yis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho yong su dag byas pa// de kun de las rnam par 'phrul zhing grag/ shind du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo'o sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las
108b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i khor yug gi rgyan rgya mtsho shi nang tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste// le'u drug pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la khor yug chen po de'i nang gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa chen po'i gzhi'i nor
108b5(phal chen): bu mang po'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// rdo rje lar shi nang tu 'khrigs shing swa la brtan pa// rin po'i che'i rigs thams cad las grub pa// rgya mtsho rnam par phye ba myi shigs pa'i snying po can myi mtho myi dma' ba'i snying po can thang mnyam zhing rnam par dag
108b6(phal chen): pa/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa// sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs lta ba'i nor bu'i gzugs sna tshogs kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/ rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyi rgyan kyis brgyan pa/ 
108b7(phal chen): rin po che'i yid du 'ong ba'i pad mo thams cad kyis gzhi byas pa// dmyigs pa thams cad du sna tshogasu gyur pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa// nor bu'i rgyal po snod kyi mdzod spu thams cad kyis gzhi mnyam par 'dal pa nor bu'i rgyal po dus
108b8(phal chen): gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing gi rgyan gyi sprin gyi dra ba rnam par bres pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi 'od dang // nor bu'i dra ba myig 'phrul lta bus rnam par phye ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la spogs pa sa'i
109a1(phal chen): ma pam da rgyu can du bas du pa na rag can bya'ams rnam ma 'dul shinang tun pa dang // de nas byang chub mas pa 'bur du ba rang bas yang 'jig rten gyi lams rgyam tsha nan rgyar rgyam ca das/ 
109a2(phal chen): yongasu brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// sa'i dkyil khor gzhi ni rnam dag mnyam// 'khor lo'i dra bas bsgrubs pa myi shigs sra// rin chen
109a3(phal chen): sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gzhir gnas shing // rin chen sna tshogs kun gyis kun tu gang // yid 'ongs ni rdo rje gser gi gzhi// rin chen chub ri bo'i 'khor los bsgrubs// pad mo'i dkyil 'khor gzhi yin me tog sa// tsan dan phye ma rin
109a4(phal chen): chen kun du bkram// 'od zer sna tshogs rin chen me tog rnams// 'od 'phro 'gyed pas phyogasu sprin kyang 'bar// sangs rgyas 'od srung nor bu rnam par bkram// sa kun me tog yid du 'ong bas yog/ thams cad sprin ni phyogs na sdug lding pra// 
109a5(phal chen): myi zad yangs pa kun nas khyobs par 'dug// zhing rnams thams cad phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas chos ni snyan par sgrog// rin chen nad snang sangs rgyas smon lam kun// shi nad tu dus ring rtag tu kun tu ston// sngan chad
109a6(phal chen): spyod pa tsa 'dra spyod pa dag/ kun kyang nor bu'i 'bru las gsal bar snang // de'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu sna tshogs gting // de'i nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul snang // sangs rgyas spyod yul de dag zhing gi rnams// rgya mtsho kun gyi rdul phran re rer
109a7(phal chen): snong me tog chen gyi sang ba tshon gyi 'khor los bsgrubs// der ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag 'dong zhing // byang chub sems dpa'i smon la mo kun kyang srog/ snying po byang chub sems 'khor du rnam 'phrul lo// rin chen 'od zer 'odang / 
109a8(phal chen): ldan pa dag/ sa'i nor bu rgyan las rab tu 'byung // sangs rgyas chos nyid 'ang rtag tu sonod // chos dbyings nam mkha' la bu kun tu 'gegs// sangs rgyas kun yul ye shes rgya chen dang // kun tu bzang po'i sngon lam sus shes pa// 
109b1(phal chen): de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho kun du yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho dbyings kyi 'phrul la 'jug/ shind tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo' sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa gzhi'i rgyan shinang tu/ 
109b2(phal chen): bstan pa zhes bya ste le'u bdun pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i dkyil 'khor de la spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shi nang du phra ba snyed yod de/ 
109b3(phal chen): de dag kun kyang gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi rgyand kyis brgyan po// nor bu'i rgyal po dang spos thams cad kyis kyang klung rab tu bsgrubs pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba 'od rnam par spang ba'i dra bas kun nas bres pa'o// rin po
109b4(phal chen): tshe thams cad kyi kha dog dang mdog sdug snang ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su rgyas pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi me dog sna tshogs klong du 'khyil pa'o// tsan dan gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gyi dkyil 'khor dang smon lam
109b5(phal chen): rgyamatsho sgra 'byind pa'o// rin pa tshe thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyis ni rnam par snang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin me tog sna tshogs kyi kha dog la du rab tu 'byed pa'o// 'dog dang dbyangs mthar yas pa'i gdugs kyis/ 
109b6(phal chen): khyabs par rnam par 'phrul pas rgyan pa'o// dmyigs pa thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams mang po rgya chen po thams cad snang ba'o// phyogs kun nas rin po che'i thamams kyi phreng ba bcu rab tu bkye ba'o// mu tig rin po che thams cad kyi kha dag
109b7(phal chen): li bur mu khyud kyis kun nas bskur ba'o// ran pa che shes gyi rgyal mtshan bye bakhrag zhigu rgya srung brjod du med pa bcus kun nas brgyan pa'o// 'di la seMn chung nga me tog kyi'ang ba bcags pa cu thung gang ga'i byam snang ba dan mang mas
109b8(phal chen): sru ninas bger bar// 'dim gnong dumams pad kyi da pa med bur ba'i thang byer bya ma mag jig pargya dang rdzog banas pararas pacang // 'dim pa dang bang dra gad bus brjong bar bar 'das ma'adas
110a1(phal chen): 6/ shaning du phra ba snyed kyis rab tu bsgrubs so// rin po che thams cad kyi me tog pun da ri ka dang spos kyi chu yongasu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba'o// 'dri la ste rin po chen shing gyi phreng ba rin po che 'bar zhing kun nas 'phyang gA/ 
110a2(phal chen): nor bu'i dra ba can gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed kyi kun nas bskor ba'o// tsan dan dang spos dang nor bu mang po sgra thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag gis rnam par snang bas byas pa/ 
110a3(phal chen): chu klung gyi gang ga'i bye ma stod kyi 'gram shi ning du brgyan pa'o// 'di lta ste rin po che dang gos dang rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu mang po thams cad kyi sgra byung bas rgyan shinang du rgyas pa'o// rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu thams cad kyir 'bye ba
110a4(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du myed pas yongasu bskor ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'di nyid yongs su bstand pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ 
110a5(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa stengs de na spos kyi chu bo'i rgya mtsho nor bus brgyan pa rnam spyod de// zhing rnams rin chen gos gis lhun bting ba// myi shigs rdo rje lta bus sra zhing mdzes// spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po mang po dang / 
110a6(phal chen): nyi ma'i nor bu 'od 'phro sprin dang // pad mo rin chen 'phreng ba 'ang kun nas bres// zhing rnams dri myed yid du 'ong ba'o// spos kyi chu yis yongasu rgyas pa ste// rin chen 'od zer sna tshogs me tog glong // sgra dbyangs rab tu gtong ba'i dbyangs kyi kyang / 
110a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu sgrog/ them skas 'phreng ba yid du 'ong dang ldan// gzhi ni rin chen nor bu mang pos brgyan// stegs bu kun bkod rin chen pad mo yi// sman sug 'dra ba rnam par bres pa ste// rin cen nor bu'i shing gyi phreng / 
110a8(phal chen): bdag/ rin chen gser gyi kha tog yad 'ong 'bar// 'od kyi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang // rnam par 'phrul mang dbyangasu rab tu sgrog/ spos chus yongs gang rin chen bsgrubs pa ste// me tog pun da rigs kun nas bskor// 
110b1(phal chen): spos dang 'od dang 'dug spos 'od zer 'gyed // de dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs// rin chen rgyal mtshan mu tig 'bar ba can// gos dang nor bu sna tshogs kun 'byung zhing // rin chen nor bu'i dril bung ba dag/ thams cad/ 
110b2(phal chen): mkhyend par 'jug pa'i sgra yang sgrog/ pad mo'i grong khyer rnams kyis kun nas bskor// kha dog mtha' yas nor bus rnam par brgyan// phyogs rnams kun nas mu tig sprin bkye ba'i// grong khyer rgya mtshos de dag rab tu brgyan// dra ba
110b3(phal chen): bzang pos kun nas bskor pa ste// rin chen byas pa'i gzugs bzang khyim gyi rnams// rnam pa du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i// rgya mtshos bzang zhing mdzes par rab tu brgyan// sngan chad rnam par snang mdzad kyis// sna tshogs rgya mtsho
110b4(phal chen): gzhi rnams yongs sbyangs pa// shi nad tu cha rgya che mtha' dang dpung myed pa 'ang // de dag kun na rnam par 'phrul pa byed// spos chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang spos chu'i chu klung g.yas phyogasu 'khor zhing 'bab pa// gling bzhi 'jig rten
110b5(phal chen): gi khams rdul shin do tu phra ba snyed kyis 'khor byas pa ste// spos chu'i chu klung de dag thams cad kyang 'khor kun nas rdo rje'i bang po kha dog dang dri mtha' yos pas bsgrubs pa'o// nor bu'i 'khor lo dang nor bu'i 'od rnam par dag pa
110b6(phal chen): sna tshogs kyis mtha' kun nas dkrigs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad kyi 'dog lta bus rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa'i
110b7(phal chen): dril bu'i dra ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog du 'dug pas kun nas khyebs pa'o// spyod pa'i 'od kyi glong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi dbyings lta bur rab tu 'byung ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad nang na snang zhing 'od
110b8(phal chen): gning du 'bar ba// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho lta bur snang ba thams cad kyis shinang tu yog par byas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par snang ba dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul
111a1(phal chen): pa'i sring po'i me tog shi nang du rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo dbyang su sgrog pa'o// spos kyi chu dang rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi
111a2(phal chen): 'od dang 'od zer gyi sprin rab du byung ba ste// chu klung de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shinang tu bstand pa// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shind tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gyi rgyan dang
111a3(phal chen): yon tan rgyu mtsha'adi nyid yongasu bstan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnams par bltas te// de'i me tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// mu krung drim myed pa'i chus rgyas shing // gni ni nor bu rdo rje pang mos byas// rin ches
111a4(phal chen): mang po'i zil bus gzhi bkram zhing tu kun nas brgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong // them skas 'phreng bas de dag kun nas bskor// pad mo 'phyang ba'i mu khyud 'khor can te// me tog brgyan pa'i mu tig phreng ba dang // me tog lnga lIs sna tshogs kun nas bres// 
111a5(phal chen): nor bu'i chu bo spos chu 'byung ba ni// rin chen kun gyis kha dog mdog ltar dbab// rin chen nor bu me tog mdzes par bkod// sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsung skad brjod// de dag rnyog pa nor bu zla ba ste// rin chen sna tshogs thams cad dpa' grong ngo // phyogs
111a6(phal chen): narnams bcu po kun na rtag par yang // spos dang bdug pa 'od 'phro'i rgyan byung ngo // chu bo rnams las rin chen thams cad kyi// 'od zer 'phro ba kun tu rab tu rab tu 'byung // me tog nor bu'i phung po gdugs rnams kyang // rin chen kun gyi gzer du rab tu/ 
111a7(phal chen): 'bad // phyogs bcu'i zhing gyi gzugs brnyan dmang po dang // sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rin chen rnams las snang // rin chen 'khar ma'i gan tan yad 'ang las// spos rus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang 'bab// rin chen gser gyi drim dran/ 
111a8(phal chen): drab pas// yog cing sangs rgyas gsung du snga sreg 'bab// rgyal ba kun gi bying chung srung pa dang // kun tu babang ba'i spyod mchog ra 'dud// sangs rgyas sman mam snang byangs rnam pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad can gyi phur 'angan/ 
111b1(phal chen): rnam dag nor bu'i ngo so dang ngogs kun nas// sgra rnams sgrog pa kun nas rab tu snang // chu bo thams cad dbang klong dag las kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen 'bar ba dag/ chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu rgyas byed pa// 'byam klas b+h+yo/ 
111b2(phal chen): sa kun nas rab tu snang // chu klung de dag thams cad dri myed cing // nor bu'i rgyal po sprin gyis kun khyab pa// mdzod spa'i dpal dpal dang sangs rgyas gzi brjid 'bar// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snang // spos chu'i chu glang de dag gi bu
111b3(phal chen): dag kyang sa sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa ste// chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che na'i me tog pun da ri ka'i phreng ba kring bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// chu glung gyi 'di
111b4(phal chen): de dag re re zhing rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'dzag rten gi khams kyi rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu phye ba'o// shing gi gser thams cad nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyi sprin rtag par rab tu 'byung ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems
111b5(phal chen): dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprin dang 'od rnams kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // shing gyi bar de dag thams cad kyang 'od shin du 'bar ba ste spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam bskal pa
111b6(phal chen): thams cad du byi nad gyis rlob pa'i sgra sgrog pa'i sprin gyis yongasu gang ba'o// spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i sprin gis mngon par khyab pa'o// spos kyi rgyal po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyas pa'o// 
111b7(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan bsam gyis mu khyab pa'i kha dog yang dag par sond pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang ba'o// gos kyi tshogs sna tshogs san+d+hal bus mngon par yog pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis yas
111b8(phal chen): pabapar byed pas rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od kyis mngon par gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa rgyam tsho'i gzugs brnyan shinang du son pas rgyas paste// 
112a1(phal chen): de dag la sogs bcu byung ga bar dadag ri de ning yang rgyan gnang tu bas nang pa ni 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mtsho'i rdul shinang tu rbab sod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du 'ang bas yang sngas nu chu klung kyi rgyang mjug
112a2(phal chen): mtsho 'di nyid yongasu pasand pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// chu grung bar dag shinang du rnam par dag/ rin chen rgyan can gser gyis rnam par
112a3(phal chen): bris// yal ga me tog sman rnams 'phyang lding ba'i// shing gi phreng bas kun nas mngon par khyab// shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor sgo dag nas// rin chen ming po'i sprin rnams kun kyang 'byung // me tog 'od mang rin chen snying po can/ 
112a4(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun skor 'gro ba khyab par byed// gzhi rnams nor bu mngon par bkram pa ste// me tog rnam bris rin chen cha 'bru dang ldan// kun nas rin chen sprin gis khyab pa ste// rgyan dang sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan snang / 
112a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po yis// sa rnams thas cad kun nas rnam par gang // phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar zhing snang ba'i sprin// rdul phran kun la gzugs brnyan gyu rad par snang // nor bu'i rgyan gyis shi nang du rnam par rgyas/ 
112a6(phal chen): mu tig gsal ba'i dra bas rnam par phye// nor bu'i 'khor lo kun nas rab tu bkod// kun nas rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul pa snang // 'byam klas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis// sangs rgyas sprul pa bkye ba kun na snang // sangs rgya/ 
112a7(phal chen): mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing // spobs bcu'i mnga' ba'i chos nyid rab tu sgrog/ rin chen sna tshogs pun da ri ka yis// mu rnams kun nas snying po nor bu smos// de las myi zangad 'od zer rgya ma tsha'i rnams// rab tu byung ba'i ba sa
112a8(phal chen): sna tshogs 'byung // dus rnams gsum po'i rkyen rnams thams cad kyang // nor bu de dag 'bru'i ning na ste// 'byung ba myed cing gzung ba 'di yod pa gyid// de na sangs rgyas rnams par 'phrul b.ri mthu// rgyal ba rnam par rung mdang / 
112b1(phal chen): thams cad du// rgyun dang sprul ba thams cad rab tu 'byed// san chad sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis// de dag gro nang 'ong bar sna ba myed// rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad dag la yang // rgyal sras thams cad srung bar/ 
112b2(phal chen): spyod de// rang gi gzhi dang lung bsan sa'i rnams// bsam pa rnams dag tshul bzhin de dag mthong // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shinang du bsunang pa
112b3(phal chen): ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i dmyigs pa dag la'ang dmyigs pa re re zhing yong su dag pa'i yon tan
112b4(phal chen): dang // rgyan shinang bstand pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho ni rdul shi nang du phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sos dpa' kun du bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongasu dag cing yon tan mtha' dang
112b5(phal chen): dbung med pas yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rgyan shi nang tu bstand pa rgyan shin tu rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongasu bstand pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
112b6(phal chen): spras// zhing gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams cad kyang // rin chen rgyan can 'od zer gnas pa ste// sdug cing gsal ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog/ rin chen thams cad 'od kyang rnam par 'bar// mu tig nor bu'i sprin mang zang
112b7(phal chen): shes/ sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan phyogasu rnam par snang // zhing ni yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu ston pa byed// sangs rgyas gsung gi sprin ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste// nor bu'i
112b8(phal chen): rgyal po thams cad snyan par sgrog/ rnam par snang mdzad sngon gi spyod pa rnams// rin chen rnams las rtag par snang zhing grag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri myed 'od// rgyan rnams thams cad nang na rnam par snang / 
113a1(phal chen): nga mas ma nga/ spyanas sa papa ya bya / sa
113a2(phal chen): byi gas brnang par// 'di rnams kun nas sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// 'di rnams 'byam klas par ni rnam 'phrul 'ang // ji sring zhing du de dag kun chul// de dag nonang du kun larab tu snang // de yang zhing gi rgya mtshas
113a3(phal chen): par sbyangs// sprul pa rnams ni myig yor 'dra ba ste// thams cad dag na chos nyid 'di yang snang // 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul te// smon lam rnam par 'phrul las byung ba'o// bzang po'i spyod pas gang rnams na byung
113a4(phal chen): gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' shes mchog rgya mtsho can// de dag rdul phran kun la rang rang gis// rang gyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zha 'bring du// bskal pa bye ba rgya chen pos ya su/ 
113a5(phal chen): de dag spyod yul thams cad mthong bas na// skad cig sems de dag thams cad ston// zhing rnams mnyam myed 'byung ba myed pa ste// de dag mkha' 'dra mnyam nyid mtshan nyid myed// smon lam stobs kyis kun tu gnas pa ste/ 
113a6(phal chen): sems can rnams la phan phyir rab tu sbyangs// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shinang tu bstan pa gang zhe na// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi spos chu'i rgyamacho sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
