156a1(phal chen): kyi spu rtse re re nas// dbyangs sbyin bgyi bas na mkha' kun bkang zhing // mun nag chen po kun nas smad par byed dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang rna bar sel// sangs rgyas dbyangs ni phyogs rnaMs bcu po na// sems can rnaMs kyi sngon
156a2(phal chen): dge rgya mtsho rnaMs ka thas cad dbyangs kyis kun du sgra yang sgrogs// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de dag lhas// sangs rgyas 'khor rnams rgya mtsho 'tshang rgya ba// mtha' dang dpung med yang dag rab tu byung // de na rgyal ba chos kyi 'khor lo
156a3(phal chen): bskor// sems can rgya mtsho mi zad rnams kyang 'dul// tshad med rno bar 'phrul pa dag ltos// zhing rnaMs kun nas rgyal ba mngon par bzhugs// de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med// sems can don tu rnarno bar mngon sangs
156a4(phal chen): rgyas// dga' zhing mos pas kun kyang 'dod par gyis// kun du bzang po'i smon lam kun btad cing // chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bar bya// sangs rgyas kyi byin gi rla bA de'i sgra la thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khaMs thos/ 
156a5(phal chen): bde ba'i yid dang sri shu spro ba yis// bde gshegs de ni lta ba'i phyir 'dod do// de mthong sdug bsngal thas cad zhi bar gyur// byang chub sems ni yang dag skyed byas shing // 'gro ba kun la byis pa'i sems gyur te// kun du brdad
156a6(phal chen): bo'i smon lam kun pa dang cing / chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bar bya// sas rgyas kyi byin gi rlabs de'i sgra la thogs pa med pa 'jig rten gyi khos thas cad du khyab par gyur te// de thos pa'i seMs can chud med pa rjes kyang / 
156a7(phal chen): byang chub smon lam btab pa gyur to// de yang pha ma dang ldan gcig tu 'khor thas cad dang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag gi bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin lngas nam mthas cad kun tu
156a8(phal chen): yog par byas te// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'dong ngo // 'ongs pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i rgya ris
156b1(phal chen): 'i mdor 'jig rten gyi khos kyi rdul shin du thar snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor can yang dag par ston to// des de thos nas tshul thas cad rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa 'byung bar rab du smras so// ye shes kyi rim parna bar ngas
156b2(phal chen): cing dri ma myed pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'ang non par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba thas cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyan ces bya ba la yang zhugs par gyur to// zhing thas cad du yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 
156b3(phal chen): snang ba mtha' yas pa mthong bas rna bar dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dag par rab tu zhug so// spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nas kyi sprin dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan bya ba la yang dag par rab tu zhug so// rjesu
156b4(phal chen): rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chos rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thas cad snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par rje su rtog pa gyur to// 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen po'i shugs kyi rgyan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugaso// rang 'byung
156b5(phal chen): du gyur pa shin tu mthong ba'i shugs kyi dbang bskul ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho yang zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gsheg pa pha rol tu phyin yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od rnam par snang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang shin tu snang
156b6(phal chen): bar gyur to// smon lam gyi stobs tshad med pa la mos pa'i rgya mtsho'i snying po'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang dag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gsheg pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po'i rgyan
156b7(phal chen): gi rgyal pos byang chub sos dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigasu bcad de gsungs pa// legs yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho chen por mngon pa 'byung // chos kyi dbying su thas cad rgyas byas te/ sangs rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi zad gi
156b8(phal chen): bas gyis mi khyab tshul la 'jug pa 'gyur// sangs rgyas thas cad yon tan sprin mthong ba'i// ye shes dang mi zad non par gyur// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho kun gyi tshul// grag pa chen po yongasu rgyas par byed// gzug kyi tshul rjes rgya mtsho ma
157a1(phal chen): ba dang tha dad yang dag shes nus mi bang drung / spyod pa skon lam khyod ni mngon par bsgrubs// gnal med la shes ldan par khyong 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin ga rgya mtsho 'jug par 'gyur// smo lam rgya mtsha'i nang du khyad byes/ 
157a2(phal chen): rnam 'phrul 'di la'ang shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bas mi khyab// chos dbyings dam pa bsaM gyi mi khyab pa'i// bas pa rgya chen rno pa sbyang byas te// sangs rgyas sprin la rnam par blta bar gyis// rgya mtsho'i zhing
157a3(phal chen): rnaMs dri med rnaM bar sbyongs// nga'i byang chub spyod pa 'jug par gyis// sngon gi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po'i// spyod pa ngas ni ji ltar rnaM sbyangs pa// de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyis shwe bar gyis// zhing rnaMs re rer sangs rgyas mang po ngas// rgya
157a4(phal chen): mtsho brgya mang shin tu mchod pa byas// sngon spyad de'i 'bras bu yi 'di yin te// 'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i rgyan la ltos// las kyi rgya mtsho mi zad rgya chen dang // zhing rjes rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang // smon lam bsaM yas go cha bgos pas na// 
157a5(phal chen): 'di rnaMs 'di 'dra'i rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgya mtshom lus mchod byas shing // zhing rjes rgya chen rgya mtsho sbyang byas nas// bskal pa 'byam klas kun tu spyad byas shing // rgyal ba yon tan 'od ces mnga' bar 'gyur// r+g+ha/ 
157a6(phal chen): ba'i sras ngag de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas blta na rgab shin du gtsang ba'i bdag po de yang dus byas par gyur te// rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos/ 
157a7(phal chen): dbar los sbyar ba'i rgyal sring thob par gyur to// nags tshil chen po lal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po cha'i mi tog rgyas pa zhes pa deng yang de bzhin gshegru ba pasad ris rgya mtsha shin du 'phags shing thal gyis rid pa zhes bya ban du
157a8(phal chen): babyung bar gyur to// des de bzhin gsheg+sa pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rna par 'phrul ba mthong dang/ 'bang bas sa dang dpung gyi yan lag pa ni'i chags ces dpa na pa che dun dang grong gi ma dang tshul tu ma yang ni
157b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nas rgya mtsha shin tu 'gra pa shing zil gis mnon pa gang na bzhugs pa der dong nas/ des bcom ldan 'das de la rin pa cha'i khang pa brtags pa// spos dang nor bu thos cang / 
157b2(phal chen): tsa D+yan gyi snying po zhes bya ba phul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa des kun du lta ba'i spyod pa byang chub sos dpa'i spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdor// 'jig rten gi las rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du za bsrid kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bas
157b3(phal chen): ba yang yang dag par bshad par gyur to// de thos nas byang chub seMs dpa' gzi brjid chen pos R+sha par snang ba zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo// ting nge 'dzin de thob pa kyang dus gsum gau byang chub sos dpa' thas cad kyi
157b4(phal chen): bsod nas rgya mtsho mngon du gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nas rgya mtsho shin tu 'phag shing zil gis mi non pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thas cad la rna pA gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi
157b5(phal chen): brjid chen po la tshogasu bcad de gsungs pa// yon tan bsod nas kun gyi gzi brjid can// byang chub mchog gi smon lam yid ldan pa// 'gro ba kun la snying rje rgya mtsho yis// nga'i drung du khyod 'ongs legs legs// snying rje chen po
157b6(phal chen): khyod ni sems can rnaMs// sdug bsngal gyur pa kun grol don zhugs pa// 'gro ba kun gyi 'gon dang skyabasu 'gyur// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul yang de yin no// byang chub sems dpa' shin du brtan pa rnams// skyon med yid kyi spyad pa
157b7(phal chen): spyod pa dag/ mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags med pa'i// ye shes 'di 'dra shin tu thob par 'gyur// de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po'i// mthu chen smon lam spyod par zhugs pas na// med de dag mthong gyur nas// de dag bsod
157b8(phal chen): nams rgya mtsho gtogs par 'gyur// khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i zhing rnaMs thas cad kyi// rgyal ba'i sprin rnaMs kun kyang shin du mthong // de dag spyod brgyad pa rgya mtsho thas cad kyang sngan chad ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du mthong // 'di tshul
157b9(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'di la su zhugs shing // ye shwe sa la su dag gnas gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes slob cing // thos cad gzigs par gdon mi za bar 'gyur// khyod ni zhing kun rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi// bskal pa rgya mtsho spyod pa/ 
158a1(phal chen): sbyang byas nas// rgyal ba kun gi sngon spyangad rgyam mnas// bslabs na rang byung nyid du 'gyur bar 'ong // zhing rnaMs rgya mtsho yongasu dag pa nas// phrog bcu dag tu ji ltar mthong ba bzhin// khyod kyi zhing yang rna par dgazur te/ 
158a2(phal chen): smon lam kun kyang shin tu sgrog par 'gyur// 'khor gyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thas cad kyang // khyod kyi sngon la thos gyur rab tu dga'// kun du bzang po spyod pa'i lam dag gis// byang chub se mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// mtha'/ 
158a3(phal chen): dang dpung med zhing rnaMs 'byam glas par// bskal pa rgya mtsho dag du spyad pa spyod// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thas cad dang // smon lam rnaMs kyang yongasu rdzogs par gyis// nag tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me
158a4(phal chen): tog rgyas pa de nyid du// de bzhin gshegs pa grag pa rnam par grag pa'i spyan pad mo'i dpal zhe bya ba byung bar gyur to// rgyal po gzi brjid chen po de yang de nas shi 'phos na rgya mtsho'i steng na/ lha'i grong khyer rin po che zhi ba'i
158a5(phal chen): gnas shwe bya bar phyir te/ der bsod nams dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba lha'i rgyal po chen por gyur to// de nas lha'i 'khor gi tshogs chen po dang bcas te rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyis char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'dra/ 
158a6(phal chen): dedri bzhin gshegs pa rna par grag pa'i spyan pad mo'i dpal gang na bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo // deng bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa grag pa rnaM pa grag pa'i spyan pad mo'i dpal gis tshul yangs pa'i sgo kun tu rna par
158a7(phal chen): spang ba'i zhes bya ba'i mdo 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan to// des de dag thos nas dga' ba'i snying po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab du thogo// 
158a8(phal chen): chos thas cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i tshul dbyingasu zhugs par gyur to// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o// 'phags pa shin du rgyas pa/ 
158b1(phal chen): chen po'i mdo' sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba// / bam po bcu gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshon de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
158b2(phal chen): gangs can mtsho rnam par spang mdzad kyi phyag mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dbying ltar 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khaMs ri rab ni kun du bzang po chad pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbying ltar 'jug pa/ song gsum/ 
158b3(phal chen): gi snod chen po'i 'jig rten gi khas ni yong su 'dzin pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyib ltar 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams ni lun cog spyod pa/ ka'aphrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug
158b4(phal chen): ba stong gi 'dzag rten gyi khas ni kun tu spyod pa dga' ldan gi lus kyi dbyibs lar 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khos ni gnas kyi dam pa mche ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs lar 'dug pa// gling ni byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan/ 
158b5(phal chen): suM bcu rtsa gsum gi lA'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ grong rdal gi mdzod mtha' yas pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs lar 'dug pa/ bzang shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba'i snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbying su 'dug
158b6(phal chen): pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa ni kun nas rmad du med pa 'jig rten gyi khes rang bzhin chos nyid kyi gnas pa'i dbyibasu 'dug pa na bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho tshad med pas kun nas bsgom
158b7(phal chen): ba ste// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gi snying po la gnas par mi mthun par 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dbyib su 'dug pa sha sta ga dang / 
158b8(phal chen): gzhung de bzhin du byang chub seMs dpa' rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi lag 'thil gi snying po la rab tu gnas par mying mthun pa thams cad dang nyan thos kyi lus kyi dbyingasu 'dug pa sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du la
159a1(phal chen): dang klu dang gnod pa sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang mi dang ma ma yin pa'i lag 'tshal gi snying po la rab tu gnas par myang mthun par thos cad
159a2(phal chen): tsa ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha sag gis yongs su bskor ba'i/ 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya ma mde ni sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi las rgya mtsho bcu rdul shin tu phrang srod kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o// 
159a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas gi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khos rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phrag
159a4(phal chen): 'i lA na dang ldan po// byang chub sos dpa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa'o// snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
159a5(phal chen): snying dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lho dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba rgya mtsho
159a6(phal chen): rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ra spu'i bu ga dang ldan pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba srid kyis zur dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rna
159a7(phal chen): par grol ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs bcu'i rdul shin du bri ba srid kyi brla dang la nu pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i rnam par thar pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba srid kyi byin pa' dang ldan pa'o// sos can gi
159a8(phal chen): khas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khas rgyam mo bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtsho de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gi smon lam
159b1(phal chen): smyig pa dang bzhi gas 'dag par na 'jig tur ga'ams mchi bu'i drin shin dun bskyed kyimadung pa dngu la nu bya'o// chub kyimam rjen ma 'jig can lam ma du rdzu shad pa zla ba
159b2(phal chen): sprin tshugs dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sman gi khams gang can mtshon par snang mdang kyi dbang ba rgyam tsho 'dri dus shin du phra ba med kyi phyag dang ldan do// de bzhin gshegs pa san gi las gang
159b3(phal chen): tshornam par snang ma dang kyi dbang ba rgya mtsha 'jig rten gi las rgya mtsho bcu rdul shin 'jig rten gi khams rgyamamo bcun rdul shin du bra snyed kyi rna ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas shangs kyi khams gang ni/ 
159b4(phal chen): mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi las rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi sna dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ljags kyi khams gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po 'jig rten gyi/ 
159b5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khams gang cen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o// 
159b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi khos gang chen mtsharnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi yid dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi pa rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad
159b7(phal chen): sku sprul pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten ga las rgya mtsho bcu rdul shin du za snyed kyi sna dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdud 'dul ba dang // nyan pos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul brgyam tsha sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas kyi
160a1(phal chen): pA thar pa'i sgo 'dzag rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o// chos kyi ro rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi sgom dang ldan pa'o// sems can yongasu sbyin pa
160a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zas dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste// 'di ltar 'jig rten gi khams/ 
160a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gi las rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun nas yog par khyebs pa'o// 'jig rten gi khams me tog gi sprin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon pa
160a4(phal chen): 'bab po/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i dril bu'i dra ba 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bris pa'o// 'jig rten gau khaMs rgya mtsho bla re 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rno par/ 
160a5(phal chen): bkram do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa ngan 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu khyeb pA bkang ba'o// 'jig rten gi khas rgya mchod na kha dog gyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig
160a6(phal chen): na ga khams rnam bcung rdul shin du ba bcud kyi stong ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin du gzugs dang s+thA dang d+h+r-i dang dang reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgyam ma dang 'jig rten ga 'ams rgyam N+Di rdul shin du chu bskyed kyi nga
160a7(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa'o// phyog sna tshogs kyi chu rgya mtsha 'jig rten go 'is rgya mtsho bcu rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin ga shis du na pa dang ska dang rba dang mus dang yid kyi chu rgya ma tshe 'jig rten ni las rgya
160b1(phal chen): rdum shin du phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// kha dog gi chu rgya mtsha re re nas yid kyi na rgya mtsha bar re re las kyang me tog srung bal dang pad mo dang ku mu dang // punA ta ri ka 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin / 
160b2(phal chen): pra ba snyed mngon par thon te/ me tog ud pa la de dag re re dang / me tog pun da ri ka de dag re re la yang me dog ud pa la'i 'khor dang me tog pun d+ha ro ka'i 'khor gyi bar du 'jig rten go las rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
160b3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dag dang ldan pa ste/ me tog ud pa la dang me tog pun ta ri ka'i bar de dag re re las kyang 'jig rten gi khes ri rab rnam par phye ba 'jig rten gi les rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon pa byung ba
160b4(phal chen): dag ste/ 'jig rten gi las kyi ri ra'i rgyan dang / 'jig rten gi khas kyi pad mo'i tshal dang 'jig rten gi smyig ma'i tshal mang po dag kyang mngon par 'thon pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnaMs la dog gi/ 
160b5(phal chen): chu'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba zhe na/ de dag tu sos can gang yang rung ste chu 'thung ngam khrus byed pa de dag thos cad kyis 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho 'di'i gzugasu snang ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am de ltar byung ba 'am/ 
160b6(phal chen): nang gi 'am phyi'i 'am/ che ba 'am chung ba 'am/ bzang ba 'am ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am thag nye ba yang rung ste// gang ji yod pa de dag thas cad khong na spang bas so so'i myig gi mngon par mthong bas de'i phyir kha dog
160b7(phal chen): gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos kyi rgya mcho ga kyang shes par bya'o// de'i phyir myig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tusas can gang yang rung ste chu 'thung ngam khrus
160b8(phal chen): byed po de nag thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi las rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gi las rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dag na gzugs snang ba 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am da ltang byung 'am phyi 'amache ba'am chu ga
161a1(phal chen): bzang ba 'am ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thes cad nang na snang ba rang rang gi myig dang gzhan gri myig gi mngon par mthong ba/ de'i phyir myig gi chu
161a2(phal chen): rgya mtsha rnams la myig gi rgyu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du ra ba dang sI dang lce dang lus yid kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i gzug paran 'jog rten ni/ 
161a3(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho ba nu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lun shin tu brgyan pa se se sems can gi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i dbye byang bzang po 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra snyed kyis rnam par gsal bar byas
161a4(phal chen): ba'i lus can no// chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho zab mo 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul phra ba snyed kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho mcho bo 'jig rten gi khams
161a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba 'byung ba'o// ci'i phyir na 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs
161a6(phal chen): pa'i phyag gi 'thil na rdul shin tu phra ba snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i nang nang na rnam par shes pa'i khos rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do de dag gi steng na chos kyi dbyings kyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten
161a7(phal chen): gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnaso// de dag gi steng ni mkha'i dbyings rgya mtsho mtshams yongasu chad pa med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khes rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi
161a8(phal chen): steng na me'i khes rgya mtsho drag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnaso// de dag gi steng na chu'i khams kyi rgya mtsho sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
161b1(phal chen): zlabasnyed rab tu gnas so// dri dag kyi sangs 'i khaMs rgya mtsho rin po che'i stong po can zhes bya 'jig rten gi rdzas rgya mtsho bcu rdul shin tu dz+nyA \u0f7fsad+ha rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na m+me tog mtshan ma med pa las skyes pa
161b2(phal chen): zhes bya 'jig rten gi khams rgya mche bcu'i rdul shin du phra bsed rab tu mngon cing / me tog de dgas so nas 'jig rten go rims rgya mtsho ba cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba srid kyi 'dzag rten gi khas rgya mamo rnam ga zag dang
161b3(phal chen): be dag so// de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho 'di gnas pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil
161b4(phal chen): snying po la rab du gnas pa'i 'dzag rten gi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khes rgya
161b5(phal chen): mtsha bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na yon tan ji snyed ni 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de na yod do// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de na 'jig rten gi khaMs ri rab kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyingasu
161b6(phal chen): 'dug pa 'jig rten gi khas ri rab 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ 'jig rten gi khams ri rab kun du bzang po de ni 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho'i sgo mngon par 'phags
161b7(phal chen): pa 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i ba rim chen po khri 'phang du 'dug pa/ 'dzag rten gau khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o// 'jig
161b8(phal chen): rten gyi khes rgya mtsho'i ngos 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o// ci'i phyir na 'jig rten gi khaMs ri rab kun du bzang po zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gau khaMs ri rab kun du bzang de na yongasu ma ngag
162a1(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gi khams gang yang med de/ der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thas cad chos gang dang gang la yongasasu smin par byed pa'i dmyig pa de dang des kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongasasu rdzogs pa
162a2(phal chen): 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'dzag rten gi khas ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o// 'jig rten gi khes ri rab de ni de ltar de dag la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pa dag dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten go
162a3(phal chen): zhes rgya mtsho de la yon tan ci snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni 'jig rten gi khaMs ri rab kun tu bzang po de na yod do// 'jig rten gi khams ri rab kun du bzang po de na stod gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi wA
162a4(phal chen): yongasu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lu'i lus kyi dbyib su 'dug pa/ stong gsung gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams mang po'i 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor
162a5(phal chen): kyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gsuM gi stong chen po po 'jig rten gyi khaMs yong su 'dzin pa de ni lha'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gi khes rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin du glu dang
162a6(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang myi 'am ci dang / lo 'phye chen po dang myi dang mi ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas so// sang
162a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin du byang chub ses dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gi khams
162a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnaso// stong gsuM gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khaMs yongasasu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba der sems cad gang ci snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang / 'du shes tha dad pa ma gtog
162b1(phal chen): par lom gyi rgyud tha dad pa med do// skye gnas tha dad pa med do// theg pa tha dad pa med do// spyod gsum gi snong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams yong su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir yong su 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ 
162b2(phal chen): stong gsum go stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams yongs su 'dzin par der sems can gang ci snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad la ngan song gi 'dzags pa'ang med/ theg pa dma' bar lhung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ 
162b3(phal chen): ser sAr lung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ tshul khrims ngan par lung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med mi bzod par lung ba'i 'jigs pa 'am med/ le lor ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ rnam par 'khrug par ltung ba'i 'jigs
162b4(phal chen): pa'ang med/ shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med pas de'i phyir yong su 'dzin pa'i stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams la yong su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gsuM/ 
162b5(phal chen): gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams yongasu 'dzin pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa mang po dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan song
162b6(phal chen): gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas yongasu 'dzin pa na yod do// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khas yongs su 'dzin pa de na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khas/ lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba 'phrul dag/ 
162b7(phal chen): lha'i dbyingasu 'dug pa/ stong gas kyi 'jig rten gi khams mang po 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskor ba yod do// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khaMs lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de na rtag
162b8(phal chen): tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rgya mtsho mang po dang mang po dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer dra ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// 
163a1(phal chen): rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor rgya mtsho dang mi 'bra'o// 
163a2(phal chen): rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu mu stegs kyi gnas thas cad phu dud du bya ba la rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu 'dud kyi las thos cad yongs su gcod
163a3(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khas lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ci snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
163a4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la tu gnas pa/ sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab
163a5(phal chen): tu gnas pa sha sta go// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir na lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'dzag rten gi khams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing 'dzi
163a6(phal chen): rten gi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'dzag rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi dbyings rgya mtsho ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad du rnam par spyod pas lhan cig spyod pa de la lan cig spyod pa zhes bya'o// 
163a7(phal chen): dag la sogs pa yod gnyis kyi 'jig rten pa khams lan nig spyod pa ni yin d+han dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdo na srung gAsumi ga sang na po'i 'jig dan gi 'am sa yong su 'don pa du yon ta
163a8(phal chen): ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni song gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lan gcig spyod pa drin yod do// stong gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams lha gcig spyod pa zhes bya ba ngan song gi 'jig rten gi khams kun tu
163b1(phal chen): spyod pa zhes bya ba dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa stong gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba yod de/ stong gi 'jig
163b2(phal chen): rton gi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya de ni bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gi khas kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'dzag rten gi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brnyan
163b3(phal chen): pa ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
163b4(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed gnas pa sha sta ga ste/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa nas ye
163b5(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du gnas pa mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gri khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sems can/ 
163b6(phal chen): rab tu yongs su smin par bya ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i tshul shin tu phra ba snyed la
163b7(phal chen): rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na stong gi 'jig rten gi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu/ 
163b8(phal chen): phra ba snyed dag na chos kyi khams rgya mtsho dang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khams rgya mtsho la/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ci snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nA/ 
163b9(phal chen): rnam pa'i srung bas kun tu spyong 'di la kun du spyod pa zhes bya'o// de lar de dag la sags pa song gi las kun tu spyod ba den yon tan chad med pa ldan pa ni/ mdong na sun gnyis kyi 'jig rten ga thams ldan cig sung ba
164a1(phal chen): yon tan gang ci yod pa de'i yon tan de dag ni song gi 'jig rten gyi khas kun tu spyod pa na yod do// stong gi 'jig rten gyi khas kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de na/ gling bzhi pa gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba mtshe ma'i la
164a2(phal chen): lus kyi dbying su 'dug pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khas kyi gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni snying po byang chub rgya
164a3(phal chen): rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rtal shin du phra ba snyed kyi rnam par brgyan pa ste/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan de dag re re la yang / seng ge khri rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu gnas pa
164a4(phal chen): seng ge'i khri rgyan de dag re re la yang byang chub seMs dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po 'khod pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams gnas kyi dam pa der sems can gang ci snyed skyes
164a5(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' kun du phra ba snyed yong sred bzang po'i lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sgo mtha' yas pa nas mngon par bsgrub pa'i mdor
164a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongasu 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thas cad kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na gling bzhi pa'i
164a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khas gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya zhe na/ song gsum gyi snod chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na sems can rnams kyi 'byung gnas dang / gnas su bya ba'i gling
164a8(phal chen): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khas gang ci snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'di mchog du bya bas na/ de'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag laso gas pa
164b1(phal chen): grong bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na song gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa yon tan gang ni spyod yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni gling bzhi gyi
164b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khas gnas kyi dam pa den yod de/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khas gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lA'i lus kyi dbying su 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i
164b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod do// gling bzhi byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba de ni rin po che'i ri'i khang pa brtsegs pa ltar 'dug pa rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho
164b4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gi dra ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun du khyab pa chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi
164b5(phal chen): khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mngon par brlan pa ste/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba der seMs can gang ci snyed skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi dam
164b6(phal chen): par gyur pa 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ theg pa tha dad pas 'byung ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mkhas pa chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho tha mi dad
164b7(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rnam par spyod pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan bya zhe na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na byang chub kyi
164b8(phal chen): shing na mkha'i rten ces bya ba byang chub kyi shing 'jig rten gi khaMs bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ der skad cig cig tu mtshan zhes cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
165a1(phal chen): phra ba snyed mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/ de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa
165a2(phal chen): pa ste/ mdor na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khaMs gnas gi dam pa de na yon tan gang ci snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na yod do// gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya
165a3(phal chen): bakhang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibasu 'dug pa grong rdal 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan ma'o// yod de/ grong rdul mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir
165a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho ba cu'i rdul shin du phra bsnyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho cum
165a5(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis yongasu bskor ba'o// ting nge 'dzin gi 'o bas rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongasu gang ba'o// de bzhin
165a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i zhi gnas gi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gi me tog ud pa la dang pad mo dang / ku mu d+ha dang pun d+ha ri ka 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
165a7(phal chen): yongasu gang ba'o// grong rdal mdzad mtha' yas pa de ni byang chub kyi sems rin po chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phag gu rgya mtshon 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed las brtsegs pa sa bcu'i 'ang
165a8(phal chen): brtsegs pa dang / gzhal med khang gi 'greng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu ni rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi rnam par bye ba ste/ grong dal mdzod mtha' yas pa dngams can gang ci snyed skyes pa de na thams cad
165b1(phal chen): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi sku dang ngang tshul rgya mtsho la rab du zhugs pa skad cig skad cig cing sems can gi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gi khes rgya mtsho bcu'i drug shin tu phra ba snyed yongasu
165b2(phal chen): mya ngan las zlo ba 'dzag rten gi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin phra ba snyed kyi sdug bsngal gi phung po rgya mtsho'i khur 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed bkur ba la yongasu/ 
165b3(phal chen): skyo ba med pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya zhe na/ grong rdal mdzad mtha' yas pa de'i sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu/ 
165b4(phal chen): phra ba 'am/ me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ na mkha'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho 'jig rten
165b5(phal chen): gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ma bzhag pa de lta bu gang yang med pas de'i phyir grong rdul mdzad mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni
165b6(phal chen): yon tan chad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni gling rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na yod do grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na bzang shing gi rab mya ngan
165b7(phal chen): dang bral ba zhes bya ba snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyingasu 'dug pa/ bza' shing gi rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod do// bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba den
165b8(phal chen): nags tshal chen po 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yod do// nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas kyang stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi rgyu las grub bo// 
166a1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi 'od rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
166a2(phal chen): 'bras bu dang ldan po// sems can gi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyob pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lo ma dang ldan pa'o// sems can gi khams yongasu mya ngan las zlog
166a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'dzag rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi grib ma bsil ba dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi las thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
166a4(phal chen): bri ba snyed la snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la rab gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gangs chen mtsho'i sngon gi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yal ga/ 
166a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa'o// rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i dader gyi lnga lI dang chun po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o// dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa'i gdugs dang rgyan mtshan dang ba dan dang
166a6(phal chen): rgya mche 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin du bsgreng ba'o// bza' shing gir ba mya ngan myed bral ba de ni rdzing rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu zla ba 'jig rten gi las rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba seMd
166a7(phal chen): kyis 'das su brgyan pa ste/ nga de dag ri ra zhing yang de bzhi gzigs brtson d+ha sa rgya na 'dab rte ky-i mas rgya ba tshwa btsu dum gon ba sa // rang dadag ri ri 'di yang de bzhin
166a8(phal chen): na dkyis rta yud pa la yang ma dang dran da ga gi ya rgya ma yi dran pasrid kyi kun bya mang pa// shing gi rgya da di sa / 
166b1(phal chen): cig 'dod ba de dag thos kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gangs cen mtsho'i sku deng thugs dang 'dzin la la mnyam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul na
166b2(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur pa sha steg ste/ dus gsum thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa rgya mchi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir
166b3(phal chen): phyir bzang shing gau ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhe na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de dang / 
166b4(phal chen): mthun pa'i rgyus grub pas de'i phyir na bzang shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba'o// de dag la sogs pa bzang shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni yon tan myed pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa
166b5(phal chen): na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i de snyed kyi yon tan ni bzang shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba na yod do// bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de'i nang na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas rma du med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gi khams rang bzhin
166b6(phal chen): chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyings su 'dug pa khang pa brtsegs pa 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa'i de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
166b7(phal chen): cad kyi yon tan rin po chen sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las byung ba'o// sems can gi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho bcu 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho 'jig
166b8(phal chen): rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rje su 'dong ngo // khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas slad du med
167a1(phal chen): pa der sems can ji snyed skyes pa de dag thas cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs cen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprul pa
167a2(phal chen): ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa ye shen/ sgyu ma rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shes phra ba snyed kyi pha rol du phyin pa dam pa thob pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho btsur
167a3(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshog su yong su bsgrubs pa gang ci snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi ba spu drug re re nas mngon par grub pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na'ang ba brtsegs pa kun nas snang du med/ 
167a4(phal chen): ba zhes bya zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te de'i phyir khang pa brtsegs pa pa kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa pa khang pa brtsegs pa
167a5(phal chen): kun nas smad du med pa de'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na mtha' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni bzang shing gi ra ba kun nas smad du med pa de na yod do// de lta bu'i pho brang khang
167a6(phal chen): pa brtsegs pa kun nas slad du med pa de na byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lhun dang ldan pa'i seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang ce na
167a7(phal chen): mtsho rnam pa snang ba ltar byung ba'i rang sangs mtshad 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing 'das pa dang / 
167a8(phal chen): ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor te/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i nyan thos kyi 'khor gi rnam pa
167b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing / de bzhin du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lA ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / maM 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa 'ang/ 
167b2(phal chen): pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bo snyed kyi kun nas bskor ba cing bzhug so// rnam par spyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya
167b3(phal chen): mtshoms mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba de dag las byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i 'khor
167b4(phal chen): rnams pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khrus rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs dang da ltar ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
167b5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyan thos pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du lA dang / 
167b6(phal chen): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya
167b7(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang de ltar 'khor dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig nas gcig du brgyud pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o byang chub sems dpa' rgya
167b8(phal chen): de dag nas ma~M dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed po de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang lus rnam par tha dad pa 'jig rte
168a1(phal chen): gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ lus rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du bre ba snyeng po de dag las lus re re la yang mgo rnam pa
168a2(phal chen): tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las mgo re re la yang mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad / 
168a3(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// de bzhin du rna ba dang sA dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar du yang 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yod/ 
168a4(phal chen): mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la dbang po ci snyeng
168a5(phal chen): cig yod pa de dag las dbang po re re la migi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// de bzhin du rna ba dang sA dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa/ 
168a6(phal chen): rtog pa rgya mtsho'i bar du 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho chen po bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// myig gyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khes rgya mtsho nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig/ 
168a7(phal chen): rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed po de dag la rje bar shes pa ci snyed cig yod pa de dag las rno bar shes pa re re la yang ye shes rno ba tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed po de dag la/ 
168a8(phal chen): ye shes rnam par tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khes rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la ye shes ci snyed cig yod pa de dag las ye shes re res kyang 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho mang po'i sangs rgya mtsho mang po'i sangs rgyas
168b1(phal chen): tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul du chos kyi 'khor lo rna pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab du skor ba byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ci lnga
168b2(phal chen): de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du nyan thos dang / de bzhin du lA dang glu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lA ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnaMs la'ang shes
168b3(phal chen): par bya ste/ ye shes la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thas cad la yang shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ci snyed cig yod pa dang / 
168b4(phal chen): snyan gi yon tan rnam par phye ba ci snyed cig yod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe'i byad bzang po'i yon tan rno bar phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / rgyan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ci snyed yod pa dang / gos kyi yon tan rnam
168b5(phal chen): bar phye rgya mtsho ci snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi myig gi yon tan rdul shin tu phra ba re re nas lus kyi rdul shin du phra ba re re zhing 'jig rten gi khams thams cad rgyas par
168b6(phal chen): 'gengs pa/ de dag ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du bstan cing brjod kyang zad par mi
168b7(phal chen): rung ngo // / 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdor sangs rgyas phal po che// bam po bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes gangs che
168b8(phal chen): mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis sku'i ba spu'i ba ga re re nas kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkye'o// 'od zer rgya mtsho de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pad mo
169a1(phal chen): rgyu mtshol bzhugs pa 'jig rten galas rgyamatsho bcur dul shin tu zu ba med mngon par byung ste/ sadus rgyas re de'i sla na d+hu de nas yang dag par stsal ba'i tshigasu bcang brgya mtsho 'angag rten gi 'ams rgyas
169a2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par mthon to// de dag las yang dag par skul ba'i tshogasu bcad pa rgya mtsho re re zhing yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams ci stong pa dang rdul shin tu phra ba snyed pa'i 'jig rten gi re re dang rdul
169a3(phal chen): shin tu pra ba re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / rang sang rgyas rgya mtsho dang / nyan thos rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lA ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
169a4(phal chen): dang 'phye chen po dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la yongasasu skul bar byed do// shar phyogs dang dang 'dra bar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad du yang de bzhin te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
169a5(phal chen): ci snyed dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ci snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs cen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis kyis yang dag par skul nas rang rang gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dag na/ 
169a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ci bzhugs pa de dag la zhus te/ gnang nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho re re dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang mi dang mi ma yin pa 'khor
169a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi 'brel gi snying po la rab tu na nas pa gang na ba der dong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar
169a8(phal chen): de dag la byang chub sems dpa' ci snyed cig yod pa dang / mi dang ma ma yin pa ci sred cig yod pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re re dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar nga dag re nang yang lus rgya mtsho 'dzag tan gi khams rgyam mo bdur/ 
169b1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha sA ga se/ lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yod pa de/ lus re re la yang mgo rgya mtsho 'dzag rten gi las rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu tha
169b2(phal chen): bsnyed yod pa/ mgo re re la yang kha'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ kha'i sgo re re la yang lce rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa sha stag go// de nas
169b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs can mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la lus re res kyang g.yas phyogasu bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten
169b4(phal chen): gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba byas te/ lag pa re re nas kyang me tog rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod nas de bzhin du mar me dang / spos dang bdug spos dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang gdugs
169b5(phal chen): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod de lce rtse re re zhing yang bstod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par bstod nas rang rang gi
169b6(phal chen): stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul gri sprul pa'i stan rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to// 'khod nas kyang lce re re zhing zhu ba rgya mtsho 'dzag rten gi khes rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongasu zhu ba byed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye
169b7(phal chen): shes gangs chen mchi rnam par snang mdzad des zhus pa de dag re re la yang shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bstan pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang mi dang mi ma
169b8(phal chen): yin pa'i rgya mtsho'i bar rnam pa de ltar 'dus pa de dag thas cad la chos rgya mtsho mang po rnam grangs du mar rnam par phye ba'o rnam par bkol la// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par bstan to// de nas shar phyog su 'jog rten gi khams rgya mtsho
170a1(phal chen): dren du sho sa par yang dag do dbang lag yang bdag yang lugapar ba yangs byung batshangs par snang ba mang dag par gan pa 'ang dag par ga cing byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rte pa 'amasakyis
170a2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu rje ba snyed la rab tu ston pa mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs pa sos can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
170a3(phal chen): rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku tshe'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sems can yongasu smyin par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho ci snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku yongasu bstan pa'i yon tan na
170a4(phal chen): par phye ba rgya mtsho ci snyed cig mnga' dang / chos bstan pa rgya mtsho yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi
170a5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gsungs te/ bstan kyang zad par mi rung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thas cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba de na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po zhes
170a6(phal chen): bya 'jig rten gi las rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du drang skad kyi 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho'i bdag pa la dang / mo'i dbang ba mod de 'jig rten gi khams rgya mchod dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gi mas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin duH
170a7(phal chen): bzhed kyi 'dzag rten ga'is rgya mtsho 'khor dang ldan pa gsas go// 'bar las skur ba'i rgyal ba rin can mang ba da'i 'arig rten pa 'angs rgya mdzar rin ma 'jig rten tshu na po na rgya mtsha 'dzag rten gyi las rgya che su rdzo
170b1(phal chen): phyin zla zad yod de/ 'dri ma 'dres rgyas kyi spyan mya na pa ma byam dang / de zhin du drangs rgyas kyi san dang shangs dang lhags dang / su dang thugs ran pa ma rgya ma dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang snga dang dus
170b2(phal chen): ro dang reg bya dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba'i bud med rin po che rgya mtsho dang / don thas cad dang grub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun du rnam par phye ba'i
170b3(phal chen): blon po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / na mkha' mtha' glo brta rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po che rin rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi dbyings rdo rje'i lte ba can gi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun du spyang bar byed pA/ 
170b4(phal chen): yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho dang / na mkha' rgyan gis 'gengs pa'i rdugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin gis dri ma med pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu'i rdul yab rin po che rgya mtsho dang / 
170b5(phal chen): shes rab kyi ral gri rin po che rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten thos cad kyis b.lar mi mthong ba'i spyi gtsug bsgribs pa med pa rgya mtsho dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam rin po che rgya mtsho dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par bzhag pa thas ca
170b6(phal chen): kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa po che rgya mtsho dang / chos gangs cen mtsho thams cad kyi glong dang ldan pa'i gzungs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de ltar de dag la stsogs pa 'jig rten khes rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten
170b7(phal chen): gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba sod de/ rin po che rgya mtsho de dag la rin po che ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las/ rin po che re re zhing yang las 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed byed pa sha stag go// 
170b8(phal chen): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu rgya mtsho kun kyang mi chen po'i mtshan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ 'od chen po'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgyam
171a1(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa lus dpe' byang bzang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis rab tu gsal bar brgyan pa phas kyi rgol ba'i sde 'jig rten gyi khams
171a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu 'jom pa/ sa bcu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul/ 
171a3(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyedang rab tu thob pa/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongasu gnon pa la mkham pa 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu
171a4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po de la bu mo rgya mtsho kun kyang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa'i
171a5(phal chen): bud med rin po che dang 'dra ba yid kyi lus 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
171a6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa chos kyi dbyings na mkha' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi las rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu/ 
171a7(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi 'bral ba dang ldan pa bas pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin tshugs dang ldan pa shes rab ye shes yangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
171a8(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed myig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra be snyed kyi rna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sdom pa chen po yang dag par blang ba rgya ma/ 
171b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra snyed kyi sna legs pa dang ldan chos kyi rgya mtsho rab du sgrog pa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pas
171b2(phal chen): 'dug par dgod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa sos/ 
171b3(phal chen): can thams cad kyi don yongasu bsgrub pas mi ngoms pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin/ 
171b4(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi nub ma legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos zab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gri khams rgya mtsho bcu'i khams rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa/ dmyigs pa thams cad yongasu bsal ba'i mthar thug
171b5(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yangs shing mi shigs la brtan pa 'dzag rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i bcu rdul shin
171b6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi sa zur dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad rim gyis legs par 'brel pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub
171b7(phal chen): kyi yan lag gi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang 'phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mdzad par thogs pa rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs
171b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin tu bzang po gyon pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
172a1(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyis legs par brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spos kyis lus shin du byugs pa dga' ba'i rgyan dang / 
172a2(phal chen): thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sed yod de/ de dag gi kha nas ye shes kyi rjesu
172a3(phal chen): 'brang ba'i chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo // de dag gi lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang snying rje'i rje su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gi spos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
172a4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra snyed 'byung ngo // spos rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos kyang 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khas pa rgya mtsho mang po yongasu rgyas par 'gengs te/ de dag gi dga' ba'i rgyan thab
172a5(phal chen): mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba'i sems can rgya mtsho gang ci snyed yod pas dri zhim po rgya mtsho de de dag tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim por rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcur
172a6(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba steng rab tu thod pa/ sems can gi khams dga' ba'i rgyan dang / thabs mkhas pa chen rgya mchos 'dul ba de dag gi gzugs gi yon tan nam bur bye ba rgya mtsho de dag mthong ba dag thams cad kyang de bzhin
172a7(phal chen): gshegs pa shes rab dang ma shes kyi sgra rnam pa dag paca las yong susan brgyam tsha 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtshab tsu rdul shin du zla ba sred rang du byung po// gang gis dbyangs rnam nas par gyur ba de dag thams/ 
172a8(phal chen): kya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa yongs su 'dzin pargya mtsho 'jig rten gi las rgya mtsho bcur rdul shin tu za ba snyed rab tu thob bo// gang gis lags bzung thos par kyang bA na dag thams cad byangs pa ma
172b1(phal chen): snying chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob po/ gang gis mthong la reg pa thams cad kyang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
172b2(phal chen): phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// gang dang stan cig la lan gcig tu 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub gi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyuraro// 
172b3(phal chen): gang gis kha dang khar phrad par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'ong po// gang gis pad du 'khyud pa de dag thos cad kyang de bzhin gaN+DI
172b4(phal chen): pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin phra ba snyed rab tu thob po// gang chos kyi dbyingasu bsten par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi/ 
172b5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ sems can gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i gang ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasu dag rgya mtsho la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gi rlabs 'jig rten gi khas
172b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongasasu dag pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bon rgya mtsho rab tu 'deb so// de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des
172b7(phal chen): yong dag pAr skul ba'i tshigasu bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed thos cad du khyab pa'i rnam pa rgya mtshos thos nas rdzu 'phrul gi stobs rgya mtsho tshogs pa med cing bsgribs pas de
172b8(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang ces rgya mtsho mtsho rnam par snang mdzad gang na der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo rgya mtsho'i spyi zos bdud te phyag 'tshal nas chos
173a1(phal chen): kyi dbyings rab tu sgrog cing lce'i dbang po rgya mtshos zhu ba yong su zhus pa bcom ldan 'das de gar yang dag par skul ba'i tshig su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho ba cu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed byung
173a2(phal chen): ba de su'i mthu las byung ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs can rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin cen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
173a3(phal chen): rgyal po chen po 'di nas nas nub phyogs log su 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das po na/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'jil gi snying po rab tu gnas/ 
173a4(phal chen): pa zhes bya' ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba de ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong do// chos ston to// yang dag pa'i tshig su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi
173a5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba la 'di yang de'i mthus byung ngo // de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thas cad kyi don gang chen rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad/ 
173a6(phal chen): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen rgya mtsho rnam par
173a7(phal chen): snang mdang kyi zhal bal ba dang des phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos nyan pa'i skad du mtsha'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems cad
173a8(phal chen): ma med kyi dag sa rgyam tsharnam par snang padang kyis rgyam pa na chen ring bal 'di ga bas papa'i med no// mam can pa dus la ba yang shes na 'phral gas/ ma
173b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni 'gro bar dga' ste/ der 'gro ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal bal ba dang de la phyag
173b2(phal chen): ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan par ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gi brlabs ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i rgyan snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi
173b3(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sred la rab tu gnas pas kyang bde blag du bya bar sba ba ma yin gi rgyal po chen po de la ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtshos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod na/ 
173b4(phal chen): de khyod kyis sngan cad mthong ngam/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs ni gang na 'dug 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas nye 'am ring / de na de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig bzhugs shing 'chi skyong ba dang chos
173b5(phal chen): chos ston pa mdzad pa shes sam/ rgyal po rin chen mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho de mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gi khas
173b6(phal chen): rgya mtshod 'di nas ni nye 'am ring zhig na mchis pa dang / da ltar de na de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang 'tsho skyong zhing chos son pa ni smos su yang ma mchis te// 'jig rte gi khas rgya mtsho de ni sngan chad bdag khri ma thos// de nas
173b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang rgya chen rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgya blo rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos 'tshams bzang po'i dbyangs gang na
173b8(phal chen): yod pa dang / 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho de ni 'di ni sa ci srid pa dang / de na de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhug zhing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa legs par soms shig/ de nas rgyal po rin cen mang pos 'jig rten gi
174a1(phal chen): khaMs rgya mtsho thams cad du yongasu gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten go khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag kyang 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de phyog
174a2(phal chen): gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de nas nye ba 'am ring ba dang de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa yang ma shes te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan mi / 
174a3(phal chen): tsam yang ma mthong ngo // de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po ting nge 'dzin gi rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi dron grangs can mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
174a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtshod mthong ba'am/ 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gi khos rgyas mtsho de 'di nas nyi 'am ring ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
174a5(phal chen): gang zhig da ltar de na bzhug shing 'tshe sbyong ba dang / chos ston pa la spos kyang ci'i tshal te/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thos cang
174a6(phal chen): da byangs ci mtshan mo par srungs dang sa/ rgyal ba na rten mang pa'i 'dris tsas bka' gyu'o// dA bus rgyal brnyan po nam grangs ngas cang 'dzag rten ga rdzas rgya mtshad pa'id gshegs par byag gi 'dza na
174a7(phal chen): ma pa'i rgyang chu mas da ma 'bras / da gra gshes pa ya gru bya na #na
174b1(phal chen): de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos de bzhin gshes pa sos can pa cad kyi don gang can mtsha ba snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ 'jig rten gi khas rgya mchad ni thogs
174b2(phal chen): gang na mchis/ 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni thag ci srid cig na mchis/ de bzhin gsheg pa ni gang zhig da ltar don bzhug shing 'tsho sbyong ba dang / chos son pa bstan du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegasapa
174b3(phal chen): sems can gyi don ba chen mtsharje bar snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi khas 'di'i nub byogs kyis 'ches kyi mtha' 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khas rgyamatsho
174b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khaMs glog gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtshos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thas cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang
174b5(phal chen): dag par bsgrub pa'i gang can mtshorna par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhug shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston to// de nas do skad ces bka' stsal kyang rgyal po rin chen mong po 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho de ma she ma
174b6(phal chen): mthong nas 'di swA~M du bas so// cig 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho de ltar nye na'ang bdag la'ang mthu'i khyad pa med na/ de bas ring ba lA ci smos snyam nas/ de la rjesu bsas te de'i tshe de bzhin gsheg pa'i byin gi rAng
174b7(phal chen): lag pA len pa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu bsgrib pa med pa la sog+sas pa ting 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la mnyaM pA gzhag go// de ltar mnye bar bzhag pa'i mdo la rgyal po rin chen
174b8(phal chen): mang po lce de'i tshe 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed na sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ci snyed cig bzhug pa de dag thos cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gri brlab rgya mtsho
175a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gi zhes rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis byin gyis brla pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das de dag gis de ltar rgyal po rin chen mang po la byin gyi brlang ba mngadam thag du dan
175a2(phal chen): mamodo la 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtshos mchis bzang po'i dbyangs dang de bzhin gsheg pa spyod pa thas cad dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rna par snang mdzad dang / 'jig rten gi 'aM/ 
175a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho de bzhin gsheg pa'i phyag gi 'thil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shre gang can mtsho rna pA snang mdzad dang / de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho// 
175a4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bo snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ci snyed bzhugs pa de dag thas cad de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyi ye shwe kyi stobs dam pa rgya mtsho la stsogs pa ye she rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khos rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul/ 
175a5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu shes so// dus gsuM kun tu blta ba rnaM par rgyu ba rgya mtsho la sogs pa mig rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu mthong ste/ 'di ltar dper na lag 'thil du
175a6(phal chen): skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag tu bzhag pa 'am/ me long shin tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la do snang ba bzhin no// de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
175a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi don gang cen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi 'thil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
175a8(phal chen): gangs cen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don gang chen mtshan/ 
175a9(phal chen): bar snang mdzad kyi rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i dus la da bab par shes na song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i skyes bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
175b1(phal chen): phra ba snyed 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la phul cig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i tshul shin tu phra ba snye/ 
175b2(phal chen): po de dag dang / bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed po de dag dang lan gcig ste/ bu re re zhing ni 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra/ 
175b3(phal chen): bsnyed dag dang lhan cig 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni 'jig rten gi khaMs ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho ba cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lan gcig 'jig rten gi kham
175b4(phal chen): ri rab kyi khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po re re zhing ni stong gsum gi snying chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gri khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig stong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig
175b5(phal chen): rten gi khaMs 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya mtsho re re zhing ni stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khaMs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan gcig stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khaMs kyi 'khor ma/ 
175b6(phal chen): sbyar ba'i rgya mtsho re re zhing ni stong gyi 'jig rten gi khaMs kyi 'khor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig stong gi 'jig rten gi khaMs kyi 'khor lor sbyar ba'i rgya mtsho re re zhing
175b7(phal chen): ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khaMs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya mtsho re ri zhing ni gling gcig gi
175b8(phal chen): 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig gling gcig gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya mtsho re re zhing yang khams kyi rgyal po 'jig rten gi khaMs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
