196a2(phal chen): ba'i bar drag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring dang tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gsar gyi mdag can zhes byab/ 
196a3(phal chen): rIg byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sem dpa' ro re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin
196a4(phal chen): tu ba snyed dang lhan cig du phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba bzhin thams cad
196a5(phal chen): na'ang rjod de// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag so so nas smra bar gyur to// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba mthu chen la// gang dag kha dog rigs kyis lA 'dod pa// mi nyams log par lta bar gyur pa ste// de dag rgyal ba'i cho
196a6(phal chen): nyid mi shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dbyibs dag ni// 'jig rten kun na'ang shes par nus pa med// gang gis bskal pa bye bar bsam byas kyang // mthu chen rnams kyi kha dog mtha' med do// de bzhin gshegs/ 
196a7(phal chen): la mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste// chos rnaMs thams cad mtshan nyid med cing dben// yan lag kun ldan ldan nyams med pa// bsam pa bzhin du kun na rab du snang // sangs rgyas chos rnaMs gzhal du yod pa min// gang rnaMs ci la'ang 'di'i
196a8(phal chen): tshul bshad de// ldan pa ma yin ma ldan ma yin pas// sangs rgyas chos rnams rang bzhin rab du dben/ de bzhin gshegs pa phung po 'jig pa med// 'byung dang 'jig par spobar mi mdzad de// mnga' brnyes mnga' sgyur rnam par gdon ma// 
196a9(phal chen): rjid du med pa brtan rnam par skyed// lus dang sems kyad mi nye par gyur ci// ma dang thor las rnam pa da pas na// rnaMs pa bzung du dring gis pa'i rnams// tshigs cad tsangs med pa ba ga shegs par 'gyur/ 6/ 
196b1(phal chen): rnanam gas dang // rlu sa ma sa gdun / yas dang byen padu ga nan grug/ yangs pa pa nga/ a rna dang ba bdu gyur/ 
196b2(phal chen): du zang/ ma pa byang rnams nga che/ sang du da padu hA/ nags gang nga da / rlu ma dun bsgru / da
196b3(phal chen): nga na dang // grobadunags rnam du dag nga / 'ad ga ma da pa sa gas pa 'a/ dag nam / bdag shanas shes na// byi rgyam pa na
196b4(phal chen): de nas 'od gzer de dag 'jog rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu snang bar byas pa nas// gzhung de bzhin du seng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu'i hA/ 
196b5(phal chen): du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas// 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khong su gang ci mang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag
196b6(phal chen): thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi bangan la bzhugs par zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin
196b7(phal chen): du 'jig rten gi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi bdan la bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas
196b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'os par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thas cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste// 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems
196b9(phal chen): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de/ ngas
197a1(phal chen): thams cad na yang byung drung thos dpa' 'ang mya pal zhes byab shaphrag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig ma jig ba de bzhin thams cad na'ang brjed de/ rna'i mchigasu bcad pa 'di dgas so nas smra bar gyur du/ shenas
197a2(phal chen): dpag mang chos rnams ma pa'i las p+na// l+r-ing ba rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa dag/ na ring nang med mnyam ma mtshungs med 'od / yon tan che mnga'adi dag sbyor 'da'o// klung gis sangs rgyas chos rnams mngon rtag kyi shing / 
197a3(phal chen): kun du brtags kyang mi dmas te/ dmyigs pa shes byed rnam par mi rtog pa// bsamasams pa 'di dag sbyor 'dir// sems can yul mos sems can 'du shos med// 'jig tshogs chos shes lam gyi rgyud dang bral// bas gtan nang / 
197a4(phal chen): dad sems la bcings pa med// chags med yid ldan de dag sbyor 'di yin// rtog mkhas rab dutu rtogs pa'i chos can rnams// mya ngan 'das spyod rigs la brtson pa dag/ thar pa'i lam brtson mnye ba nyid ldan pa// zhi ba'i thob pa de dang / 
197a5(phal chen): sbyor 'di'o// ded dpon rjes song sangs rgyas byang chub mchog/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos dbyings bzhin rtogs shing // bden 'jug mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dul ba// bde gshegs pas can 'di dag sbyor 'di'o// sangs rnas
197a6(phal chen): don tshigs rjesu shes byas shing // chags med blo yangs rtogs shing bsam gtan byed// kun du 'gro bas song bas rtsol spyod pa// rang 'byung spyod pa de dag sbyor 'di'o// nau kha'i dbyings dang sprul pa yid ldan rnaMs// gnas dang rang bani/ 
197a7(phal chen): mtshan nyid shes pa dag/ mya ngan 'das rigs spyod pa mkha' 'dra rnams// thob dka' thob pa rnams kyi sbyor 'di'o// zla ba zla phyed nyid dang nub bgrang zhing // lo dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin sus sems pa// 'jig rten 'dra zhing
197a8(phal chen): 'jig par 'gyur ba dang // grangs su sus rtogs de dag sbyor 'di'o// zhing gi sems can ci snyed skye 'chi ba// gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes 'du shes med// de dag ming dang gnas pa rtogs shes pa// bas gyis mi khyab
197a9(phal chen): rtogs pa'i sbyor 'di'o// 'das pa'i dus dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// ngag gi lam gyis gang na rtogs byed cing // dus gsum rang bzhin rtogs pa gang gyur pa// mnye med de dag sbyor ba 'di yin no// / de nas 'od zer de dag 'dzag
197b1(phal chen): sa da gnas 'dus sa// gang byab 'gas pa 'dug can kyi lams kyad zag na sang bar bya / gleng gzugs 'a gan gyi 'dus jug rgyu dang du snang bar byu / jig
197b2(phal chen): rdza TI byung rdzas brgya mas byung sa nga du sa 'a rnams da nga // gas pa snang pa ga
197b3(phal chen): d+ha/ de gang bcom ldan 'das sangs kyis kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sam dpa sangs rgyas kyi shing bsu dum shin du za bsad dang 'bas gcig 'ar snang bdi bzhin du/ 'jig rten
197b4(phal chen): re re'i gling bye ba phrag brgya dag kun na yang // de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gnal bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas// byang chub sos
197b5(phal chen): dpa' bcu cu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste// 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag
197b6(phal chen): thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams meng 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste// 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kya
197b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi 'am rang na tshangs pa'i smad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed do tshogs shes bya ba'o bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de
197b8(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa'o sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lan gcig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thas cad na yang
197b9(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de// gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na'ang rjod de// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag so so nas smra bar gyur to// 'das dus gang gis bsgrib dka'i
198a1(phal chen): ga nga pa pa rnam kyi da rgyu yin cig du ni/ ma kyis dang ma gyis
198a2(phal chen): spya byung chub ses dadun skyes d+ha ga ga 'din da / nA rnaM ma ban ca rang dzi d+he/ tshabs cang pa 'didag 'jis byas snar byu / ga nga 'byung pa
198a3(phal chen): med pa// mi gnas dam pa phul dang mchog gi rnaMs// drang srong chen po sred pa'i rgyud 'grel pa// yon tan kun lan rnam dag 'di yin no/ ka/ 'du 'dzin med cing chags pa mi mnga' la// 'du shes dngos med gnas pa med dr-i rnaMs/ 
198a4(phal chen): phun sum dge ldan smad pa mi mnga' ba// mgon po rnaMs kyi chos nyid thub par dka'// shin tu 'od snang dag par gyur pa'i rjes// brgal du glags med pa'i rnaMs// g.yo med mtha' ma rnam par spangs pa'i// byed gshegs
198a5(phal chen): rnaMs kyi shes tshul 'di yin te// lus dang sems la rnam par rtog med cing // bde gshegs chos la gang zhig 'jug 'gyur ba// de dag chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la// nam yang nem nur dbang du mi 'gro'o// 'jig rten dag/ 
198a6(phal chen): na rgyags pa pang 'das// de ga gnan pagan pa sa dz+nyA ne/ nga dag sbyi rnaMl med pas bstan ma du y-i// rang bzhin ga par 'gyur ba gang yang med/ dngas par bags pas rnas yang po dang / ma
198a7(phal chen): te/ sa m+b+ha bya chu 'a yang da / / byu ma sa / sa
198b1(phal chen): 'dog rten kun du sangs rgyas nying ni dang / shin du zhi ba'i chos nas rnam palas te/ mi gnas sams la rtog pa med pa'i/ can nan sangs rgyas byang chu bathob par 'gyur// sems kyin gyis drung de banan zhing gi rlams/ de ga dang
198b2(phal chen): bzhin ji bzhin partag byas na// gcig dang tha dad gyur pa ma yin te// de ltar sangs rgyas tshul 'di shes pa yin// de nas 'od gzer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te// shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
198b3(phal chen): snang bar byas pa nas// seng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi las bye ba'i bar du snang bar byas nas// 'dzag rten gyi khaMs re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan nas// 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten
198b4(phal chen): gyi khaMs de dag gi khongasu gang ci yang rung ste// gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing // byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
198b5(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang tha bas gcig par snang ba de bzhin du// 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bye ba phrag brgya kun na 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dge sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du'ang sangs rgya
198b6(phal chen): kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas// byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub seMs dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag soka/ 'di ltar 'jam dbul zhes bya ba nas// bzang po'i dpal zhes/ 
198b7(phal chen): bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khas mi 'di zhes 'dra ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di la gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// 
198b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' da dag thos pad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di 'as bya ba dag gi zhas ring na tshangs pa'i snang ba spyang ba dag ste/ 'di lang rig zung mgos bzlas bya banas/ dag gu sa
198b9(phal chen): ra dag go// byang chub seMs dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhod bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig phyin pa dag ste// gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thos cad do// 
199a1(phal chen): rdul zhugs che brtsams shing / nam yang zhum pa'i sem su gtong bar byed bA de// banal dkar brgal te bdag gis sos can kun 'dul zhes// seng ge'i sgra stog de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// !
199a2(phal chen): zhig 'dod dang sang pa 'byung zhing 'jug pa dang // ma rag gnol ba gti mug rang bsgribs 'jigs can rnams// sems can rang bzhin bdag med brtan pa bzod par 'jug/ bdag kyang 'jig rten mgron myur zhes pa/ 
199a3(phal chen): de yul 'di/ 'jig rten sems can gang zhig 'dod dgas 'dam byang ba// med pa'i chos la rtag pas sug bsal thod gyur nas/ sangs rgyas stong yum chos la bag yang gang srud cing // bdag gis sems can ldan
199a4(phal chen): bskal de dag spyod yul 'di// sngon mtha' shes dka' chad med brtan pas mthong gyur cing // bdag rten sems can pha rol mtha' yas 'khor gyur to// de dag rgyal bas theg bzhi pa mchog la bkod// bdag gis de 'dra'i chos
199a5(phal chen): brtan de'i spyod yul lo// sems can khams rnams mgon med nad kyis gzer gyur cing // ngan song gzhol bar 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gdungs// me lce 'bar phung 'dzags gzugs mi bzang bsregs gyur pa// 
199a6(phal chen): mthong nas dgrol phyir zhugs pa de dag spyod yul 'di'o// lam gol lam mayin pa'i rkyen la spyod gyur cing // mun pa chen po rtol bar dka' rnyed 'gro mthong nas// snang ba chen po bskyed de sangs rgyas chos bstan ces/ 
199a7(phal chen): 'di skad tshig brjod de dge spyod yul 'dzi yin no// srid pa'i mtshos g.yongs sems cad rab du mong bdag/ mtha' ma mi mthong med de zhes mi dga' ba// mthong nas brtson 'grus stobs bskyed chos kyi gru sbyar cing // be ram
199a8(phal chen): 'tha ras da nga sa 'di ra// sems na mdus gnas sum sa dun// g.yang sa na pang 'du du gas rna da / sa shA // da
199a9(phal chen): gyis su sna de dag spyod mu 'dos/ shin du dag pa'i brtson rang mug sasal sems car rnams// nad dang rnams pa zer cing mtshan gyis mnang pa dag// mthong nas bdag gis rnas kyi chos rnams bran ma te/ 
199b1(phal chen): sems can kun dgrol sems dpa' de dag spyod yul 'di// sangs rgyas chos rnaMs thams cad thos gyur the tsom med// chos dbyings spyod yul phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas bkang ste// 'di dag thams cad brtags na gsog
199b2(phal chen): kyang mi 'jigs shing // sems can kun la snyoms byed de'i spyod yul lo// de nas 'od gzer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te// shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi bye ba phrag brgya snang bar byaso// 
199b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khas bye ba snod snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya snang / 
199b4(phal chen): bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khas bye ba khrag khrig sod snang bar byaso// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag song snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams
199b5(phal chen): gzhal du med pa snang bar byas so// 'dzag rten gyi khas grangs med pa snang bar bya so// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khas bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas/ mu med pas mtshams med pa
199b6(phal chen): dpag tu med pa/ brjid du med pa dag kyang snang bar byaso// 'jig rten gi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa// na mkha'i mthas gdugs pa thams cad kyang snang bar byaso// gzhung de bzhin du lho phyogs dang // de bzhin
199b7(phal chen): nub phyogs dang // de bzhin du byung phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang // de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lo nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nung byung gyi phyog
199b8(phal chen): mtshams dang // de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten khaMs bye bar snang bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams stong snang bar byaso// na mkhom
199b9(phal chen): mthas gtugs pa'i bar gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar byas so// de ltar phyogs bcu shin du rgyas par byas nas// chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi
200a1(phal chen): khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ gzhung de bzhin du 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khong su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs/ 
200a2(phal chen): gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi bdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du tha snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de
200a3(phal chen): bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyog/ 
200a4(phal chen): bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go// / 
200a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khas ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces pa nas// 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de
200a6(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems
200a7(phal chen): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhong bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yA/ 
200a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'dum dpal zhes d+ha bA sha sa ga don 'di nyid rjo / nga'i tshigs bcang ba 'di drug kyang seM sonas smra bar gyur to// bsngal bganas mas pas kyis rgyun sems kyi tsags// gang gis mthang
200a9(phal chen): bsums med 'gro dang dngos pa'i tshul med pa'i// lam du rab du 'jug pa de ni thams cad shes byung te// stobs bcus tshul 'di dza lar mabyen pazhin 'jigs med sangs rgyas 'gyur// grags pa stan rang phyongs rnams kun du/ 
200b1(phal chen): mtshungs med grags gyur cing // bgegs rnams kun las 'das te chos nyid 'di dag dgar spyad de// chad med thams cad so sor rtogs zhing don rnams kun rtogs pas// de phyir phyogs rnams kun bkang bde gshen/ 
200b2(phal chen): chos nyid 'di bstan to// dgongs pa ji bzhin de ni snad ba'i 'bras bu 'thun pa ste// 'jig rten don 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yangs byas shing // de dag thams cad so sor 'thun par ye shes rnams bsdus
200b3(phal chen): pas// sems can dam pa sangs rgyas rnam 'drul 'di 'ang phyogs btsud sa ni// thog mar nyan 'dod bla ma bsnyen bkur bzod pa des byas shing // rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab rtog pas gtan bsnyen byed pa// bde/ 
200b4(phal chen): gshegs nyid ni rtogs 'gyur 'gro ba rnams s+ho seMs tshim byed// chos nyid de 'dra spyod pa myur du bde gshegs thob par 'gyur/ snying nas 'dri zhing phyogs rnams rgyas byed rtse gcig thub byed cing // rgyal ba'i yon
200b5(phal chen): tan mos las mi zlog spyod pas che ma byed pa// dngos dang dngos med da thams cad shes byas spangs shing dngos zad pas// sangs rgyas bdag med dpe med mthong ba de dag lus 'di yin// bzang po'i spyod yu
200b6(phal chen): zan gyi sems kyis phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // zhing rnams thams cad chos kyi gter gyis khyab byas tshim byed de// dzA bzhin chos gnas chos nyid mtha' la tho tsom med pa'i chos// stobs bcu ci'o
200b7(phal chen): de bzhin gyur pa'i lus ni 'di dag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang der brjod pa la 'jug byung cing // chos kyi 'khor la ji bzhin palta dkara' gzhal yas rtag skor ba// da da ni gshegs
200b8(phal chen): gsung kun byang chub yan lag rtogs// de ltar 'jug pas rtag tu sangs rgyas sku rab 'di dag mthong // mthong yang mig gi rnam shes tshul du rdul med mthong ba med// rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin bsam myig stong
200b9(phal chen): stobs bcu mi mthong ngo // 'du shes thams cad rnam rtog yin par sangs rgyas mthong ba myen// shin tu tshogs med de ni rgyal ba mthong ba yin// sems can las mang bstsags pa de dag shin tu blta dka' ste/ 
201a1(phal chen): gnang dang bu dang dbyabs dang mdog du phyogs bcu kun na med// de bzhin rang 'byung smra ni gzhal yas phyogs rnams kun 'gangs pa// shes rab dka' ba 'dren pa chen po bsgribs pa med pas brnyes// menga'i ngas
201a2(phal chen): la zhing rnams bye ba dngos por gnas par snang // de nas 'ad ba med cing phyogs bcu kun du 'gro ba med// tshig cing gnas par 'gyur yang de dag tsa la 'ang gnas pa med// de bzhin rang 'byung rnams kyi sgra ni mkha' dbyings rtag tu
201a3(phal chen): 'gengs// // shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gzer las rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste// bcu bzhi pa'o// / 
201a4(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal ba'i sras rang bzhin gcig pa'i sems la bye ba phrag tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'dra/ 
201a5(phal chen): lnga ste/ bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan song du 'gro ba dang / dbang po tshang ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / skye ba mthun pa dang / skye ba mi mthun pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bde ba myong ba dang / sdug bsngal myong ba snang ba/ 
201a6(phal chen): dag la ltos// las kyis ni sems mi shes so// sems kyis ni las mi shes so// tshor bas ni rnam por smin pa mi shes so// rnam par smin pas ni tshor ba mi sheso// sems kyis tshor ba mi shes so// tshor bas ni sems mi
201a7(phal chen): shes// rgyus ni rkyen mi shes so// rkyen gyis rgyu mi shes so// dngos po ni dmyigs pa mi sheso// dmyigs pas ni dngos po mi shes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'dzun
201a8(phal chen): dpal la tshog su bcad de smras pa// sems can bstan par bya ba'i phyir// gang 'di yongasu dris pa dag// chos rnams chos nyid 'di 'dra ga/ 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis/ chos rnams 'di dag g.yo ba meng // 
201a9(phal chen): shin du dngos po med pa sa// de phyir gzhan gis gzhan dag gi// ngo bo nyid kyang mi shes so// 'dzi ltar chu klung rgyud kyi rnams// gzhan dang gzhan du 'grogs rgyu yang // gcig gis gcig na mi shes te// chos kyi chos / 
201b1(phal chen): da da du// ltung 'ab shA du gyu/ dA shA kA du dang gzhan 'phrogs kyang / gcig gis gca sakyichos nyid de panan/ nga drun ldan mas gyis// gzhang dang ga smra
201b2(phal chen): gis gcig nam shes / sa nas nyid de 'a du/ sa/ la gcig dag myur byung / gtsug stsag na nam shes te/ med pa / 
201b3(phal chen): dang rang sna ba dang / la dung lus dang 'ang rnams// 'di ga lam d+hA pa'i kyang / byed pa po ni gang yang meng // 'byung de'i rang bzhin med pa yas// 'byung banye bar bsun byas kyang // bsan pa
201b4(phal chen): pa gang yang med// bstan pa la ni dngos medo// myig ni rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // rna bas yang rang bzhin gyis// lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyang // med de yongasu brtags pa yin// gang zhig rang bzhin dngos
201b5(phal chen): med par// tshul bzhin rab tu rtogs byed pa// de'i myig la 'khrul pa med// chos myig bis gyis mi khyab bo// yang dag pa dang yang dag myin// bden ni 'on te rdzun yang rung // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten kun
201b6(phal chen): tshig kyi lam gyis brjod po'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gis// byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can thams cad seMs can med mod kyi
201b7(phal chen): 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'dul ba'i dus la ji ltar bab pa dang // sos can gyi tshe ji lta ba dang // lus ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lte ba dang // mtshan ma ji lta ba dang // bsam
201b8(phal chen): pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / seMs ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnaMs kyis seMs can 'dul ba'i phyir mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa'
201b9(phal chen): 'ja dpal la tshig su bcad de smras pa// gang rnaMs rab du zhi spyod cing // thos dang ldan pa'i sa 'odi yin// 'di don ci 'dra de bzhin du// 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis// bdag gi lus la su gnas shes// 
202a1(phal chen): gang gis nang ni rab shes pa// yang dag yod dam med pa'i don// des ni rab tu shes pa min/ lus kyi rnam par dgod pa ni// phyogs na mi gnas brjod pa yin// de bas shes pa de gnas la// nam yang chag
202a2(phal chen): bar byed do// rus ni nam par sbyang ba las// dngas pa kun kyang rnam par bsgoms/ sems ni phyir log mi 'gyur te// dngos po kun ni brtags pa'o// gang gi man rdzaswa 'brang // gang gichen phyir log 'gyur/ 
202a3(phal chen): ji ltar mgal me'i 'khor lo yi// thog ma tha ma dgon pa bzhin// dngos po thams cad mi rtag par// skye ba gang rnams rtog pa yang // lus la bdag kyang med pa'i phyir// 'du shes phyir yang ldog par 'gyur// bdag med
202a4(phal chen): rmi lam lta bu'i// lus ni kun tu rab tu 'byung // rnam par sbyin pas rab tu 'byung // phyi ma de bzhin sngon de bzhin// sems ni dbang byed yin par bshad// dad pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du// tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ 
202a5(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad ston par byed// ci snyed 'jig rten mardo' yod pa// de dag thams cad brtags pa ste// chos nyid de ni nam du yang // chos gcig la yang mi gnas so// rkyen rnaMs la ni rten bcas te// chos rnaMs so sor rab
202a6(phal chen): du 'byung // de dag log par de bzhin 'gyur// phyi ma de bzhin sngon de bzhin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can
202a7(phal chen): kye'abyung ba chen po ba'i rnams yongasu 'dzin pa med cing bdag gi med la mnyam pa yin yang // 'on kyang bdi ba'i tshor ba bdag kyang snang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba bdag kyang snang / yid du'ang bar byed pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar
202a8(phal chen): byud ba dI / rang du byung ba dang / phyib du byed pa dang / rab chub ba dang / tshur ba che ba dang / tshe 'dil myong ba dang / gzhan myong ba dag kyad snangs/ chos kyi rgyas pa na meng dur ba'i/ yang rdzas 'a
202a9(phal chen): 'di bya de nas byang chub sasas dngo ri can dgram tshus byang chub po sa pa 'ang ma dpapal che gsung cang dasbas pa// ngag man pas rgyas byung ba/ de bzhin zu thur gyi// da pa byed pag nas
202b1(phal chen): 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// shin tu phyis pa'i me long la// do ni ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin// nga la de ni de bzhin snang // chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar zhing dang sa bon dag/ gcig gis gcig ni mi shes kyang // ra
202b2(phal chen): bzhin nye bar ston pa byed// lus kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// sgyu ma byed pa mams bzhag// lel po cher ni song 'dug ste/ gzugs rnams ston par byed pa bzhin// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar shing ni 'khrul 'khor na/ 
202b3(phal chen): sna tshogs sgra meng rjod byed kyang // de ni bdag dang bdag med min// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar bya rnams mang po yi// sgo nga'i sbubs ni phye ba las// sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan 'gyur ba// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhino// 
202b4(phal chen): dza ltar ma'i mngal du yang // bu ni 'pho bar mi 'gyur ba// 'on kyang dbang po sna tshogs 'gyur// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin// ji ltar sems dmyal 'jigs pa na// gshin rje'i rigs gtogs sdug bsngal pa// de dag la
202b5(phal chen): ni 'ong ba med// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar rin chen mchog rnams dang ka lA'i bu rnams kun ldan yang // 'pho bar snang ba gang yang med// de bzhin las kyi rang bzhin no// ji ltar 'jig rten la le dag/ bsam gyis
202b6(phal chen): mi khyab 'bar gyur kyang // de dag 'ong ba gang yang med// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// 
202b7(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig mngon par sangs rgyas nas// 'on kyang chos tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston// zhing chad med pa yang rnam par ston// sems can tshad med pa yang / 
202b8(phal chen): du ston/ gsung tshad med pa yang shin tu sgrog// su tshad med pa yang shin tu ston// bsam pa tshad myed pa yang thugasu chud// rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston/ 'dzag rten gyi khams tshad med pa yang
202b9(phal chen): shin tu skyed// rgyan tshad med pa yang byin gyis rlob/ spyod yul tshad med pa yang shin tu son la// chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam pa thu dang du mi snang ba 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems yon tan dpal gyis/ byang chub
203a1(phal chen): sems dpa' 'a ma dpal la chi bsu bcad de smras pa// gnas 'di shes par dga' 'di// rgyal ba'i sras kyis bdag la dris// de ni mkhas pas rnam par shes// yon tan mos pa smod par byed// de ska
203a2(phal chen): ni btsun du rang / ga nga da // sangs kyis padzin no// de kA ba n+d+ha s+yAd d+hA mA / d+he/ ban kun kyang 'brang // rdul me ba dang byung // sangs rgya nyid na na/ 
203a3(phal chen): rgyam tsho gcig du las// chu klung chung med 'ang 'gyur kyang // de la chu'i byen pa med// rangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji lar drung ni gcig du yang // 'jig rten kun du rgyu 'di 'ang // de la gcig dang zla dang med// sangs / 
203a4(phal chen): chos nyid de bzhin no// sprin cin rnaMs ni 'brug bsgrags shing // sa rnaMs kun kyang ngoms par byed// de'i char la bye zag myed// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar sau ni gcig pu yang // myu gu sna tshogs 'byin cing son
203a5(phal chen): sa la bye brag 'byed pa med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji wA ra sgrib mod nyi ma ni// phyogs bcu kun du snang bar byed// de la 'od gzer tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar na mkha'i zla ba ni// 'jig
203a6(phal chen): rten kun la rab tu snang // gnas nas 'gyur ba gang yang med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar tshangs pa mi mjed bdag// stong gsum na ni 'dug mod kyi// de la lus ni bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de
203a7(phal chen): bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' myig gi dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gcig kyang / 
203a8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sems can rnams gzugs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / rigs sna tshogs dang // dbang po sna tshogs dang // long spyod snas tshogs dang // dbang po sa/ 
203a9(phal chen): dgas dang / 'khor sna tshogs dang / phyag dbul sna tshogs dang / yon tan gA tshogs dang / shes rab pa tshig su yang snangal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gdil yang mi mnyam pa'i ga// tha rang du dgas pa ga
203b1(phal chen): byung sa nga ga / da / na // 'an su pa'in rgyun na// 
203b2(phal chen): mas bzod/ sangs rgyas ya nul de bzhin no// de slar chu ni ro gcig kyang // da kyi byung gyis rnam par 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas sngon phul bya// rlu rnarnams la rnam par 'byu/ AR+Sha ts+tsha
203b3(phal chen): mkhas pa ni// rtag tu 'khor kyang mgu bar byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul be// shin du sbyangs pa dga' bar byed// dza lur mkhas pa'i rgyal po dag/ 'gro ba mang ba shes par byed// de bzhin sangs rgya/ 
203b4(phal chen): yon thul ba// ji ltar bskyed bzhin shes par byed// ji ltar dri med ma 'ong la// dzaM 'dra'i gzugs rnams de bzhin snang // de bzhin sems can bsam tshul du/ sangs rgyas yon phul rnam ngag 'gyur// ji ltar
203b5(phal chen): dug la sman pa'i sman// drug nad thams cad sos par byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// nyon mongs dug ni chen po sel// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba ni// 'gro ba 'di dag snang bar byed// mun pa dag kyang rna par
203b6(phal chen): sel da// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar zla ba dri ma med// kun tu mnyam pa nyid byas te// sa ni rab tu snang bar byed// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar chu'i stobs shugs kyis// sa ni thos
203b7(phal chen): cad g.yo 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin du// srid gsum 'gro ba rnams kyang spyod// 'bar dang 'od 'phro bcas pa'i me// thas cad dag tu sreg pa'i dngos// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// 
203b8(phal chen): 'du byed thams cad sreg par byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal la 'di skad ces smraso// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i bas
203b9(phal chen): pa gcig na// thams cad lta ba 'thun pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur/ de dag kun la yang gzugs ni gzugs nyid du zad/ tshor ba yang tshor ba nyid du zad/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes nyid du zang
204a1(phal chen): 'du byed nas kyang 'du byed rnas nyid du zad / rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa nyid du zad/ 'dod pa'i khas nyid kyang 'dod pa'i khas nyid du zad/ gzugs kyi khas kyang gzugs kyi khas nyid du 'ang / 
204a2(phal chen): gzugs med de'i khas kyang gzugs med pa'i khams nyid du bang / ma rig pa'ang ma rig pa nyid du dang / sred pa'ang sred pa nyid du zang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang phan par byed pa'am gnad nga
204a3(phal chen): byed pa ma yin na de ci'i phyir// de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshogasu bcad de smras pa// de ltar khyod kyis gang dris pa// la la myur du rnam grol zhing // 
204a4(phal chen): la la dkar bar 'grol 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas sras bos bdag las nyon// 'di ni dpag tu med pa'i// sangs rgyas bstan gyi nyes ma yin// dad dang brtson 'grus nan tan gyis/ rtag tu khyad par 'gyur ba yin// ji ltar
204a5(phal chen): rtsa dang shing gsher ba// mer bcug shin tu nyam chung bzhin// ring por mi thogs 'chi ba 'gyur// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ ci ltar gtsub mas gtsubs pa'i// ma byung ba ni myur bteg na// myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba
204a6(phal chen): bzhin// de ltar le lo'i bstan pa la// nyi ma'i nor bu lci ba la// yang dang yang bzhag bteg pa ni// de la me byung mi 'gyur te// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i tshe// byis pa rnams ni mig bcus
204a7(phal chen): shing mi mthong ci phyir zhes smra ba// de bzhin le lo bsan pa la// rka lag med par skyes pa'i mi// dza ltar sgrog mnga' kha bug gis// sa ni dbug par 'dod pa bzhin// de lar le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar byis pas
204a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho las// yang dang yang du bcu byas shing // bsam par la la 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar bum pa chus bkang zhing // bskal ba'i men byung ba'i che// la la bsad par 'dod pa
204a9(phal chen): lhorate/ de bzhin la lo'i bstan pa lo// ji ltar la la phyogs bcu'i// namakha' ji snyed tha mal ba'i// gzugs kyis rgyas par gang sna ba// de bzhin lalo bstan pa la// de nas byang chub sems dpa
204b1(phal chen): 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' dpal la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal ba'i sras kyi tshul nyon mongs pa thams cad skyems pa 'di nyid// blangs kyang sems can la la 'dod chags kyi dbang du
204b2(phal chen): 'gro// la la zhi snang gi dbang du 'gro// la la gti mug gi dbang du 'gro// de rgyal gyi dbang du 'gro// 'chal ba'i dbang du 'gro/ 'khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gro// thal dog gi dbang du 'gro// ser sna'i dbang du
204b3(phal chen): skya'i dbang du 'gro// g.yo'i dbang du 'gro la// chos de dag kyang sems med par bzung du'ang mi nus te// nyon mongs par gdags pa kun kyang rnam pa kun du sems pa'i rgyud du zad na// de ji lta bu de nas byang
204b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' chos dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// gang gi don du dris pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas sras po de la nyon/ yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa
204b5(phal chen): 'di/ thos pa tsam gyis mi 'grub bo// la la stobs med chu klung gis// nan gyis khyer bar gyur pa dag/ skom zhing shi bar gyur pa bzhin// ma bsgoms chos kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'gro ba mang po la// 
204b6(phal chen): zas dang skom dag sbyin byas kyang // bdag nyid bkres pas shi ba ltar// de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o// ji ltar sman pa la la zhig// sman rnams thas cad 'dog bzhin du// lto ba'i nad kyis shi ba bzhin// 
204b7(phal chen): chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar dbyig gi mdzod dag du// rin chen mang po 'grang byed kyang // nam phyed tsam yang mi 'thob pa// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar bde ba kun ldan pa'i// rgyal
204b8(phal chen): po zang 'khor skyes kyang // zas dang gos kyang dag mi bdog bya// de bzhin chos la mA bskams par// ji ltar 'on pa rol mA'aM// sil snyan klu la mkhas pa zhig/ gzhan dag de yis dga' byed pa// rnaMs
204b9(phal chen): ma bsgoms de bzhino// ji ltar dmus long ri mo mkhan/ tshong dus dbus su 'drir 'jug kyang / bdag nyid gis ni mi mthong ba// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// dzaM ltar mtshan chen mnyam pa zhig/ 
205a1(phal chen): skye bo mang po sgrol byed kyang // bdag nyid de'ang 'chi 'gyur ba// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar lam gyi gzhi mdor yang / phun sum tshogs pa kun rjod cing // bdag gis thob par mi 'gyur ba/ 
205a2(phal chen): chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
205a3(phal chen): snyan pa ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin na// de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la la la ni sbyin pa brjod pa mdzad// la la la ni tshul khrims// la la la ni bzod pa// la la la ni brtson 'grus// la la la
205a4(phal chen): ni ba sam gtan ka la la la ni shes rab brjod pa mdzad// la la la ni byams pa// la la la ni snying rje// lo la la ni dga' ba// la la la ni btang snyoms brjod pa mdzad kyang / bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
205a5(phal chen): chub tu ni chos gcig 'gas 'byung bar mi nuso// de nas bya ba chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// sems can gzhan gyi bsam shwe da
205a6(phal chen): de mtshar rmad du byung ba ste// de ltar gang gi don dris pa// sangs rgyas sras po bdag las nyon// smra ba'i mchog ni gang yang rung // chos gcig gis ni byung ba med// gang yang byung ba yod pa min// 'byung bar 'gyur ba de
205a7(phal chen): bzhin med// sbyin pa gang la gnas pa'i// bsam pa rnams ni mkhyen mkhyen mdzad cing // gang la tse dag tshul mthun pa// de bzhin chos kyang bstan pa mdzad// ster sA can ma sbyin pa brjod// tshul khrims ngan la tshul
205a8(phal chen): sa nams// tsA ba bla dan na bas dra dang dug+sa/ brtson 'grus 'a ba stsan 'al// rnam par thAgasul gas ma gtan brjod/ shes rab 'byung gags med 'i// gadrug d+hA'i sems la byams pa bad/ 
205b1(phal chen): khyim gyi ngos la rim pa yin// de bzhin sbyin dang tshul khrims dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar 'gro// rgyal po'i gnas dang grong rdal rnams// rung ba'i phyir ni ra ba ste// de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus
205b2(phal chen): dag// byang chub sems dpa' rub phyir ro// ji ltar gdugs gcig rgyal po ni// sa rnams thams cad skyong bar byed// de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs bzhin no// 
205b3(phal chen): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni// bde ba thams cad ster ba ltar// de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas rnaMs kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba 'byin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub
205b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i bzang po'i dpal la 'di skad ces smraso// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs kyi 'byung ba gcig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na spor ba rnams pa tha dad pa dag 'di
205b5(phal chen): ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang // seMs can 'dul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang // tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa dang // rdzu 'phrul
205b6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor tshogs pa rnam pa dad pa dang / bstan pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang // chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam pa tha dad pa dag ci'i phyir snang bar gyur// sangs rgyas kyi chos
205b7(phal chen): thams cad yongasu ma rdzogs par ni// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nuso// de nas byang chub sos dpa' bzang po'i dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
205b8(phal chen): dpal la tshogasu bcad de smras so// chos kyi rgyal po'i chos nyid ni// 'jam dpal rtag tu gcig pa ste// bsgribs pa med pa gzigs pa yi// 'byung ba de yang gcig pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad sku gcig ste/ 
205b9(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku// shes rab thugs kyang gcig pa ste// mi 'jog stobs kyang de bzhi no// sngon cad byang chub zhugs pa'i tshe// ji ltar yongasu bsngo mdzad ma// 'khor du chos rnams bstan pa dang
206a1(phal chen): de dag zhi yang de bzhin 'gyur// zhing gi phun sum gang yod pa// sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad 'grub// sems can ci ltar sbyangs pa'i rnams// de'i rnams pa de ltar mthong // ji ltar sangs rgyas
206a2(phal chen): chos nyid du// kun gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ste// sangs rgyas zhing dang sku dag dang // 'khor du chos bstan de bzhin// gang rnams smon lam kun lon zhing // stan cad bas pa yongs sbyangs pas// thams cad gzigs
206a3(phal chen): ba'i tshul gyi rnams// ji lta ba bzhin thams cad mthong // sems can bsam 'ji bzhin dang // las dang stobs kyang ji bzhin pa// de ltar de ltar mthong gyur te// sangs rgyas rjes kyi rje 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas
206a4(phal chen): zhing la rtogs mi mnga' // de dag byams sdang yod pa minata bsam pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du/ srog chags rnams kyis de bzhin mthong // rnam pa tha dad 'jig rten khams// de ltar snang bar gyur pa de// drang srong chen po kun gzigs
206a5(phal chen): pa'i// nyes pa'i skyon las gyur pa med// 'a gang du 'dul ba yod pa'i// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// skyes bu drang srong nams kyang snang // de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
206a6(phal chen): kyis// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam 'phel la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cad gis rang rang gi spobs pa bstan pa rnams smras pa yin na// da khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul rtsom
206a7(phal chen): ste// stobs par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gang // sangs rgyas kyi tshogs ni gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba ni gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa ni ji la bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes/ 
206a8(phal chen): ba ni gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rje su 'gro ba ni rgyas gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul shin du bstan pa ni gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul shes par bya ba gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul rtog pa ni gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni
206a9(phal chen): daM na du/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ji tsam du yang sa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' de dag thams cad ma chog su bcad de smras pa// nam mkha' yul dang 'drang na
206b1(phal chen): kun tu 'od la 'dra ba med// sems can thams cad 'jug pa ste// chos nyid la ni 'jug pa med// tshogs rnams thams cad bstan par ni// bskal babye bar mi nus te/ ji snyed rgyal ba'i tshogs mnga' ba// dam
206b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas yul yin no// blo gros seMs kyang ci bzhin du// sems can thams cad rab du 'jug// de la bstan pa thogs pa med// de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// 'jig rten thams cad 'jug pa dang // 'jig rten
206b3(phal chen): rgyu ba grang yod pa// de dag kun la ye shes gnas// gzugs med snang ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas ye shes chags med de/ dus gsum kun la chags pa med// nam mkha' 'byung dang mtshungs pa yin// de na ye shes
206b4(phal chen): yul yin no// chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dang // sems can khams rnaMs rtogs par mkhyen// dbyings rnams thams cad rab tu mnyes// de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// smrar gdags ci snyed yod pa dang // sems
206b5(phal chen): can kun gyi sgra skad du// sgra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang // rnam par rtog pa gang yang med// rnam shes rnam shes bya ba med// sems kyis brjod dag pa'ang ma yin te// ye shes rang bzhin shin du dag/ sems can
206b6(phal chen): rnams la rab du bshad// nyon mongs med cing las med de// dngos po med cing gnas pa med// snang ba med cing rgyu ba med// 'jig rten dag du'ang mnyam par spyod// sems can kun gyi sems kyi rnams// dus gsum du
206b7(phal chen): tu ra ba yangs pa// sems gcig la ni rab 'jug pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'jug// de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gi khams de dag na sems can kyi rgyud cing snyed pa dang // las kyi rgyud ci snyed pa dang // / 
206b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi rgyud ci snyed pa dang // lus kyi rgyud ci snyed pa dang / dbang po'i rgyud ci snyed pa dang / skye ba'i rgyud ci snyed pa dang // tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ci snyed pa dang / tshul khrims log pa'i 'bras pa'i rgyud ci
206b9(phal chen): med pa dang // yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ci stong pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ rab tu snang bar gyur te// dzaM lar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rab tu snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig sa
207a1(phal chen): kyai khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya song chad med pa/ dpag du med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun du mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzham du ma dang / 
207a2(phal chen): brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ namakha'i dbyings kyis mtha'as gtugs pa thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyud ci sred pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ci snyed pa'i bar de dag
207a3(phal chen): mas cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur to// de bzhin du zugs dang / de bzhin du ru thugs dang / da ba na bying phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shad kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'i nar thugs
207a4(phal chen): dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pa tshad med pa/ 
207a5(phal chen): dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mtshungs pa med pa/ kun du mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa// namakha'i dbyi/ 
207a6(phal chen): kyi mtha' sa gtugs pa dag na/ sems can gyi rgyud ci snyed pa ci zhes bya ba nas/ zhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ci snyed pa zhes bya ba na/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ci snyed pa'i bar du// de dag thos
207a7(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rab tu snang bar gyur to// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa'as dris pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u sa/ bco lnga'o// 
207a8(phal chen): 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba// bam po bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis// byang chub
207a9(phal chen): sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin// kha na ma tho ba med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma
207b1(phal chen): ba med pa'i yid kyis las dang ldan pa yin// lus kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ lus kyi las ma smad pa yin/ ngag gi las ma
207b2(phal chen): smad pa yin/ yid kyi las ma smad pa yin// lus kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ lus kyi las mi zlog pa yin/ ngag gi las mi zlog pa yin/ 
207b3(phal chen): yid kyi las mi zlog pa yin/ lus kyi las mi zlog pa yin/ ngag gi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ lus kyi las bsngags pa yin/ ngag gi las bsngags pa yin/ yid kyi las bsngags
207b4(phal chen): pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par dag pa yin// yid kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ lus kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin// ngag gi las nye bar nyon mong ba med pa yin/ yid
207b5(phal chen): kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ ngag gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rus phun sum
207b6(phal chen): tshogs pa yin/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dran pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rtogs pa phun sum
207b7(phal chen): tshogs pa yin/ dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo phun sum tshogs pa yin// blo gros mchog du gyur pa yin/ blo gros dam par gyur pa yin/ blo gros rab du gyur pa yin/ blo gros chad med par gyur pa yin
207b8(phal chen): blo gros grangs med pa yin/ blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ blo gro mtshungs pa med pa yin/ blo gros gzhal du med pa yin/ blo glos brjod du med pa yin/ rgyu'i stobs can yin/ bsam pa'i stobs
207b9(phal chen): can yin/ sbyor ba'i stobs can yin/ rkyen gyi stobs can yin/ dmyigs pa'i stobs can yin/ dbang po'i stobs can yin/ rnam par lta ba'i stobs can yin/ zhi gnas kyi stobs can yin/ lhag mthong
208a1(phal chen): stobs can yin/ nges par rtogs pa'i stobs can yin/ phung po la mkhas pa yin/ khams la mkhas pa yin/ skye mched la mkhas pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ 
208a2(phal chen): 'dod pa'i khams la khams pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la khas pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la khams pa yin/ 'das pa la mkhas pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa yin/ da ltar byung ba la ma'/ 
208a3(phal chen): yin/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ 
208a4(phal chen): dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ rab du byang ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin // ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ btang snyoms yang da / 
208a5(phal chen): byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ stong pa nyid yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ mtshan ma med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ smon pa med pa yong su bsgoms pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ tshul khrims
208a6(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
208a7(phal chen): yin/ snying rje'i pha rol du phyin pa yin/ dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
208a8(phal chen): dang / da ltar byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ dbang po dang brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba gcig nas gcig du brgyud pa khong du chud pa yin/ khams du ma'i/ 
208a9(phal chen): shes par bya'i khong du chud pa yin/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa dri ma shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ kun du 'gro ba'i lam shes par bya khang du chung ba yin/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / 
208b1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa shes par bya khong du chud ba yin/ bsgribs pa med pa'i rje su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ 
208b2(phal chen): lha'i mig chags pa med pa shes par bya ba khong mongs pa du chud pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pashes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ klu'i
208b3(phal chen): dbang pos yong su bzung ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gyi dbang pos
208b4(phal chen): yongasu bzung ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos yong su bzung ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ 
208b5(phal chen): lha'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ klu'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ dri zi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lA ma yin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos bkur
208b6(phal chen): in/ mi 'am ci'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin/ skyabs
208b7(phal chen): su gyur pa yin/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin/ mgon du gyur pa yin/ sgron mar gyur pa yin/ snang bar gyur pa yin/ 'od du gyur pa yin/ 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongasu 'dren par gyur pa/ 
208b8(phal chen): yin/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog du gyur pa yin/ gtso bor gyur pa yin/ thu bor gyur pa yin/ rab tu gyur pa yin/ dam par gyur pa yin/ phul du gyur pa yin/ bla na med pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dzaM ltar/ 
208b9(phal chen): na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod de/ ltar skyed
209a1(phal chen): rang bal ban pa dang / skye bo mang po la 'de dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang 'de dang / bde bar rnam par gzung sbyong ba'i phyir zhugs shing de lar ljong
209a2(phal chen): 'din dun gnas dag yong su rjorje bams pani/ rgya mams seg sa lags/ la pa'i sas byang chub sem sa dpa'adag gi sems kyi las med sa byung ba'i phyi pa gang dang yin pas byang dub
209a3(phal chen): dpa' rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs 'a med pa'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da lang byu
209a4(phal chen): ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mi gdong ba'i sems kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / chos thams cad rdol ba bzhin du rje bar blta ba yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i
209a5(phal chen): chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / kun tu bzang zhing kun tu mdzes pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang sbyar ba'i srog
209a6(phal chen): chags thams cad la ston pa/ gnyis par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas yon tan gyi khyad pa
209a7(phal chen): 'di dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad rang / 
209a8(phal chen): bzhin shes pa dang lhun bas/ khyim gyi thobs bos pal gyis ma non par gyur cig sems bskyed/ pa ma dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad skye ba thams cad yongasu bsru pa
209a9(phal chen): sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bu dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad med shin du thal bas dga' ba dang rnam dga' ba dang rnam par bral bar byung
209b1(phal chen): tsam thams bskyed do// 'dod pa ya tan dang 'gags pa'i / byang chub sa ras dpa' sems can thams cad yon pa gyi ba rol tu thun pas 'dod pa'i gsal shid rnam par sel par gyur cig rnas dus
209b2(phal chen): pa rnye phyogakyis sems pa spyad do// rung ba 'dzir ba rangan 'dug yang / byang chub bams dpa' sems can thams cad 'do 'jigs ma shing dang tha ma gang 'phags pa'i bar rung bar gyur cag
209b3(phal chen): sems bskyed do// rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad srid par 'byung ba 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khur por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khang tog tu phyin pa'i tshe// 
209b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing chos kyi khang stengasu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sbyin pa gtong pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
209b5(phal chen): cad bdag gir bya ba med de/ yong su 'dzin pa'i sems med cing / bdag gi thams cad yongasasu gtong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ma bral zhing 'grogs pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
209b6(phal chen): cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar phyin te/ 'dra ba dang shin du bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// btsan ral kha na mtho bar mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad gnas mang ba la snang / 
209b7(phal chen): tsa / gang du dga' bar gyur 'dod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khyim nas khyim med par 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sems bcings pa dang grol ba med cing chags pa med ji/ 
209b8(phal chen): mi dgos pa dang thal bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun gyi ba'i mtshams 'da' ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad 'gal ba mang ba'i chos dang ldan zhing 'thun par 'gro ba mang dang
210a1(phal chen): ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'khan po dang slob dpon gyi drung du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos la btson zhing chos la mkhas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
210a2(phal chen): rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad bar chad med cing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gos dkar po 'dor ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
210a3(phal chen): dpa' sems can sdig pa la brtson pa spangs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do// sku dang kha spu 'dreg pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad shin tu/ 
210a4(phal chen): mnyam par gzhag cing nyon mongs pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gos dung smigs gon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thas cad drang srong chen po'i sems dang ldan zhing rnyog pa med
210a5(phal chen): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab du 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs can thams cad skye bo yongasasu bskyad ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du byung bar rab du 'byung bar gyur cig ces
210a6(phal chen): sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dge ba la mos pa mngon par skyes pas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung mo 'chang ba'i don du brtson par gyur cig
210a7(phal chen): chu sbyin gnas dang payi ni nga rnams da / ga yang gA yi sa
210b1(phal chen): yin pa'i las la spyod cing / tshul dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mkhan pos bstan pa'i tshe// byang chub seMs dpa' sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par
210b2(phal chen): gzhal zhing mi skye bo'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bsnyen por rdzogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos thams cad gyi khyad par gyi pha rol du phyin to// 
210b3(phal chen): thabs mkhas po'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gtsug lag khang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad mi 'phrogs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ bla na med pa'i bam/ 
210b4(phal chen): la rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// stan pa ding ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing legs par bkod pa'i chos can du gyur cig/ 
210b5(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// 'dug pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sa sems can thams cad mi gnas pa'i sems kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug par gyur cig ces sos bskyed do// skyil mo krung 'cha ba'i tshe/ byang chub
210b6(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad mi g.yo ba'i sa la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// zhi gnas yongasu sbyong ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thos cad/ 
210b7(phal chen): ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa la brtson zhing zhi ba dang / dul ba la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lhag mthong yongasu sbyong ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thas cad shin du/ 
210b8(phal chen): nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ chos yang dag pa dza lnga ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur cig ces sos bskyed do// skyil mo krung 'jig pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad
210b9(phal chen): shin du mnyam par bzhag cing / 'du byed thas cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig par rnam par mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang 'thi gzhog pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad
211a1(phal chen): sems rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig ces sems bsnyed do// rkang 'thil 'deg pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa
211a2(phal chen): tho ba ste/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying bar las 'thon par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// smad g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang
211a3(phal chen): ldan zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ska rags 'ching ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du 'brel pa/ 
211a4(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bla gab gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad chos thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste/ gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba thog
211a5(phal chen): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// skar ma gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ thabs dam pas mngon par bkab bar gyur cigs ces sems bsnyed do// 
211a6(phal chen): so shing len pa'i tshe/ byang chubo sems depas sems can thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dngos po thob pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// so shing za ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
211a7(phal chen): dbas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa shin tu bcom ste/ sems dul zhing sems rnam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dben par 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang / 
211a8(phal chen): zhesdang dang gti zug spangs te/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad sangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu ngog su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la shin du
211a9(phal chen): chung zer byar cig cas sems bskyed de// gcang ga'i las byang thaM/ byang chub sams dpa'i sems na rnams shin tu dag pa'i dngas pas gcang 'angangs pa dang lda bar byung tsab 'i rnyed
211b1(phal chen): lag pa khru ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bzung zhing bcang ba'i phyir/ kra shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
211b2(phal chen): ngo bkru ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa dang bral shing / chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khar ba len po'i tshe/ 
211b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sa sems can thams cad mchod sbyin byas shing / lam ston par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lhung bzed len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba thos
211b4(phal chen): cad kyis mchod par 'os shing snod du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// spyod yul du mngon du zhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad gnas ga med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing / sangs rgyas
211b5(phal chen): kyi spyod yul la mngon du phyogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyod do// lam du zhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad phyin ma lus par 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs par gyur
211b6(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed do// 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad shin tu rno bar dag pa'i chos bsgribs pa med pa grub pas/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dpung med pa khong du chud par gyur
211b7(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyod do// lam mthong ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thos shin du zhum pa med de/ khas gsuM las gyen du 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam dma'
211b8(phal chen): ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du bstan zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad shin tu 'dud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lamanyam nga ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang du/ 
211b9(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad la ba yo zhing mi drang ba dang bral te/ lamanyam nga ba yongasu spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam drang po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad
212a1(phal chen): g.yo med cing sgyu med la/ sems drang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sos bskyed do// lam rdul chen po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad rdul med pa'i chos yang dag pa thob ste/ 
212a2(phal chen): 'dod chags par gyur pa'i chos las rnam par 'grol bar gyur cig ces bskyed do// rdul med pa'i lam mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sa sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongasasu bsgoms pa dang ldan zhing sas
212a3(phal chen): 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// g.yang sa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med par rtogs par khong du chud cing sdig pa'i chos thams cad bsal te/ dge ba'i chos la/ 
212a4(phal chen): rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'khor mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thos cad dus gsuM du rtogs pa'i chos bstan pa dang / thun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ka ba mthong ba'i
212a5(phal chen): che byang chub sems dpa' sa sems can thams cad khro zhing khon du 'dzin pa dang bral te/ khengs pa dang 'khrug pa dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces sems can thams bskyed do// nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
212a6(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad lnga dang 'jig rten du bcas pas phyag bya ba'i gan su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ri mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thos cad thob par dga' ba dang thib po med par rab du thob cing / 
212a7(phal chen): dge ba rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing tsher ma can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpaseMs can thas cad 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug med cing tsher ma dang bral bar/ 
212a8(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// me shing lo ma can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thos cad bsam gtan dang / rna bar thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis yog par gyur cig/ 
212a9(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// me tog mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems can thos cad chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas pas me tog lta lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// me tog gi shing mthong ba'i tshe byang chu
212b1(phal chen): sems dpas gzhol zhing sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi me tog shin tu rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed// shing tog mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sas can thams
212b2(phal chen): cad snying po byang chub tu gzhol zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba thos cad 'bras bu yod de 'bras bu dam pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu klung mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can tham
212b3(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyam su myong ste/ chos kyi rgyun la mnyam par bzhag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lu ma mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thas cad
212b4(phal chen): ro gcig pa'i phyir se gol gtog pa tsam gyis khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rdzing bu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi tshig shin tu bstan pa la mkhas shing / chos thams cad
212b5(phal chen): kyis rgyas pa'i tshig gi las dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khron pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos thams cad 'byor pa dang ldan zhing spobs pa mang bar gyur cig ces sems
212b6(phal chen): bskyed do// mtsho mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub seMs dpa' sems can thams cad gong nas gong du dmyigs pa la rab du brtson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// zam pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
212b7(phal chen): sems dpa' sems can thams cad skyong thams cad yong su basprul pa la zam par red par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// yur ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi sems nga
212b8(phal chen): bsam pa la mkhas shing bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas 'khor ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / 
212b9(phal chen): reg la sred pa rab tu byang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mya ngan med pa'i nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa shin du med cing / mya ngan med par rab tu thob par gyur cigs
213a1(phal chen): ces sos bskyed do// bza' shing gi ra ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongasu mi gtong ba la shin tu brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed/ 
213a2(phal chen): sems can brgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan suM nu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyan med pa'i sems can/ 
213a3(phal chen): mthong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thas cad sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas rgyan med pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dga' ba mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe// byang chub seMs
213a4(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad dga' zhing mos dang / spo bas dga' bor mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mi dga' ba mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dus byas kyi da
213a5(phal chen): po thams cad la mi dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can bde ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad rab tu thob pas shin tu bde bar gyur
213a6(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thas cad ye shes kyi rtsa ba rab tu thob ste/ sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nad med
213a7(phal chen): pa ma yin pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ye shes kyi shin tu mya ngan med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ tha dad pa med pa'i chos khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
213a8(phal chen): sems can sugu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub seM sa dpas sems can thas cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mos pa mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mi sdug pa'i sems mthong ba'i tshe/ 
213a9(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba la mos pa rung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// drin gzo ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
213b1(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzad pa shes par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// drin bzo ba med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems na thams cad mi
213b2(phal chen): dge ba'i lta ba la drin du gzo ba med par gyur cig ces pa sems bskyed do// dge sbyong mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing zhi ba dang / dul
213b3(phal chen): ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bram ze mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad tshangs pa dam par gyur to// sdig pa spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dka' thub
213b4(phal chen): can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing 'aka' thub la shin du gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// brtul bzhugs la zhugs pa mthod
213b5(phal chen): ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongasu mi gdong du'i phyir rdul zhugs dam por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// go gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
213b6(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad rang 'byung gi chos yong su btsal ba la go cha bzang ba shin du bgos par gyur cig ces sems spyad do// gom gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
213b7(phal chen): thams cad mi dge ba'i las bya thams cad la go rtson pa med gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rdol ba'i sems canam pang ba'atsho// byang chub sas dpa' sems can thams cad pas kyi nom pa thams cad ra 'bang
213b8(phal chen): lalas snrums bgyu pa/ 'tsham sems canam byung chub sems dpas sems sa rnams nga spyod ldan 'anas pa seM nga / ma 'dag ga sa bsgyud/ 
213b9(phal chen): byang chub sems ribs sems pa mas pa rnags pa mad pa' chos kyi ma sa bkar pa chos kyi rgyal bar gyi gapas sems babyung ba/ rgyal po'i tha mam pa na/ zung du 'i se ma
214a1(phal chen): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sras chos las skyes pa chos kyi sprul par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khyim bdag mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thas cad gdon mi za ba'i blo can du gyur te/ 
214a2(phal chen): grong gi chos spongs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// blon po mthong ba'i tshetshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la bzang po yid la byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
214a3(phal chen): grong khyer mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thos cad gdul dka' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ mthu bo che'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyal po'i gnas mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
214a4(phal chen): dpas sems can thas cad yon tan gyi rje su 'brang bar 'thun pa la mos pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nags tshal gyi mang ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thas cad lnga dang
214a5(phal chen): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsngags par 'os par gyur cig ces sos bskyed do// slong du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi dbyingasu chud par gyur cig ces
214a6(phal chen): sems bsnyed do// sgor phyin pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thas cad kyi sgor phyin par gyur cig ces sems bsnyed do// nang du phyin pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sos
214a7(phal chen): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dus su du mnyam pa nyid kyi nang du phyin par gyur cig ces sos bskyed do// mi sbyin no zhes ma byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thas cad bsod nas kyi pha rol du phyin
214a8(phal chen): pa'i thob cing phyir spangs pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mi sbyin no zhes byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
214a9(phal chen): 'jig rten las phyir spangs pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lhung bzed stong pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis stong par gyur cig ces ses bskyed do// 
214b1(phal chen): lhung bzed gang bathong ba'i tshe/ byang chub seMs dpas sems can thas cad chos dkar po thams cad kyis yongasu rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rim gro byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thos
214b2(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la rim gror byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rim gro ma byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas seMs can thas cad kyi mi dge ba'i chos mchod pa thams cad la
214b3(phal chen): rag ma lus par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khrel yod pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dbang po dben pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod par gyur cig ces
214b4(phal chen): sems bstod do// ngo tsha med pa'i sems can mchod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thas cad byas pa la gnas shing ngo tsha med pa yong su spangs par gyur cig ces so sa bskyed do// kha zas gsod/ 
214b5(phal chen): pa thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thas cad zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing smon lam thas cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas mi gsod pa tho ba'i
214b6(phal chen): tshebyang chub seMs dpa' sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin hom su bde ba thams cad thob par gyur cig ces bskyed do// kha zas snyam pag thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams can snying rje chen
214b7(phal chen): po yongasu bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sman bag med po'i kha zas thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi sred pa dang / 
214b8(phal chen): bral te/ snum bag med pa'i semasasu gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas za ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bas yongasasu rgyas shing bsam gtan
214b9(phal chen): gyi zas za bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ro myong ba'i tshe/ byang chub seMs dpa' sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros ngoms par gyur cig skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par gyur cig
215a1(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// zan zos pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin cing bya ba byas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos ston pa'i tshe// / 
215a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing spobs pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// phyir byung po'i tshe/ byang chub sems
215a3(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad nas byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu 'bago ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la
215a4(phal chen): 'bog par gyur cig ces sems bsnyed do// khrus byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'od mtha' yas pa dang ldan zhing / lus dang sems dri ma med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dro ba la
215a5(phal chen): smod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpos sems can thas cad mu med par phyin te/ yongasu gdung ba bsil bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bsil ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thas cad
215a6(phal chen): shin du bsil bar gyur te/ bla na med pa'i bsil ba'i dngos po khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bsnyed do// chos thos par byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjesu
215a7(phal chen): 'gro zhing chos kyi dbyings dang 'dres par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dang 'grogs pa rab du thob ste/ bsgribs pa med pa'i mig dang ldan
215a8(phal chen): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// myig mi 'gegs par lta po'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kun mdzes pas kun tu bzang por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// tshod rten mthong ba'i che
215a9(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os shing / mchod rten lta bur gyur cig ces seMs bskyed do// lwa ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
215b1(phal chen): gyis zan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// spyi bas gtugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis spyi gtsug lar mi srung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed/ 
215b2(phal chen): g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du don dang 'thun par gyur cig ces skyed do// lan gsum du bskor ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
215b3(phal chen): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub du mos pa'i rab dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa de'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad yon tan
215b4(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yon tan mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mtshan rnams brjod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la gzhol zhing yan lag dam
215b5(phal chen): phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang pa khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dri ma med pa'i mthar phyin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces
215b6(phal chen): seMs bsnyed do// lus slong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam pa la rnyog pa med cing / lus kyi 'du byed shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bsnyed do// / 
215b7(phal chen): gnyid sod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyogs bcu thams cad du mthu chen po thob par gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas gyur
215b8(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan thams cad/ 
215b9(phal chen): kyang thob par 'gyuraro zhing lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / skye dgur bcas pa dang / lA dang dri za dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
216a1(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten da / nyon thos dang rang sangs rgya su bcas pa rnams cad kyis ma 'ardzogs par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi las yid la byed bya'i stor ba rnams// shin du \u0f7f
216a2(phal chen): ba'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ spyod yul yongasu dag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // 'phags pa shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas ngal po che zhes bya
216a3(phal chen): bam po bcu rgyu ba'o// / yon tan yangs pa'i spyod yul yongs dag pa// de skad skad nas sems can dri med pa// 'byam pa'i dbyangs kyi byang chub yon tan rnams// sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal/ 
216a4(phal chen): la dris// spyod yul yongs dag rgyal bas spyad pa'i rjes// bdag gis rgyal sras rnams la 'dir bshad do// yon tan spyod pa ci snyed gang yod pa// rgyal sras rnams la da ni khyod kyis shong/ bzang po'i dpal gyi smras pargyal
216a5(phal chen): sras nyon// yon tan mtha yas de dag yon tan las// mtsho las thigs pa ji bzhin nyung shas shig/ mgo' smos tsam du cung zad brjod par bya// byang chub don du rang 'byung 'gyur bya zhes// thog mar byang chub sems skyes gyur/ 
216a6(phal chen): pa'i// yon tan brjod pa'ang mtha' yas dpag du med// dpe' zla med pas brjod kyang zad ma gyur// pha rol phyin dang sa'i yon tan la// bskal ba mang por skyed pa ci zhig smos// de dag yon tan chu bo thams cad ni// phyogs
