216a7(phal chen): bcu'i rgyal bas bstan kyang zad mi 'gyur// yon tan mtha' yas rnams la yon tan las// dpa' tsam cha shas cung tsam brjod par bya// mkha' las mdang tshogs laM ltar shin tu chung // sa chen ldan las rdul phran gcig kyang / 
216a8(phal chen): 'dra' rta byang chub yon tan bas pa'i sems ste pa// rgyu med ma yin gyi na 'byung ba yin// rgyal ba rnams dang 'ang gshegs chos rjes dang // dge 'dun rnams la dad pa bskyed pas skye// de yang 'dod pa skyed ba rgyal snying dang/ 
216a9(phal chen): bdag pada'i don dang grags dang snyan phyir tshun// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi ba'i phyir// 'jig rten phan skyed sems ni yongasu skye// de ni sems can rtag tu 'dedzin dang // 'di sbyangs sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa'i drur/ 
216b1(phal chen): yong su chos 'dzin byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing // ye shes rnam par spyod pa'i sems skye'o// rgyal ba kun dang chos dang dge 'dun// de bzhin tha mar gyur pa thos cad la// dang dang mos pa dga' ba skyed byas te// sring zhur mchod/ 
216b2(phal chen): byas byang chub sems kyang bskyed// rgyal ba bde gshegs chos la yid ches nas// rgyal sras spyod pa rnams la yid ches te// byang chub bla na med la yid ches shing // skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi sems skye'o// dad pa sngon 'gro/ 
216b3(phal chen): ga ma lar skyed pa ste// yon tan thams cad yongasu sbyong zhing 'dren// nem nur rnam sel nad las rab tu stsol// dad pa bde ba'i grong du phyin par byed// dad pa sems gsal rnyog pa med pa ste// nga rgyal rnam spangs sri zhu'i rtsa
216b4(phal chen): ba yin// dad pa spyod mchog nor dang rter yin te// lag pa lta bur dge sdung rtsa ba yin// yongasu btang la dad pa dga' bar byed// rgyal ba'i chos la dad pa spro ba skyed// yon tan ye shes khyad par dad pa byed// sangs rgyas lam
216b5(phal chen): la'ang son pa rnyed par byed// dbang po rno zhing rab du gsal ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub dngos la dad pa stobs// nyon mongs thub pa'i med la gnas yin te// dad pa rang byud yon tan tshol ba yin// dad pa chags pa'i sgo yA/ 
216b6(phal chen): mi 'grogs te// mi khom spong zhing 'du 'dzi med par byed// dad pa bdud kyi lam las zlog pa ste// thar pa dam pa yongasu bstan pa yin// yon tan rgyu yin sa bon ma rul bzhin// dad pa byang chub shing rab rnaM bar skyed// 
216b7(phal chen): ye shes byed par sgo nam 'bal bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba rnams kyi ston pa yin// rabs dang mos khyad par dga' ba la// spyod pa rim gyis rnam par 'arjod par bya// chos tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten rnams na dkon// rin rma/ 
216b8(phal chen): seng ge'i rgyal po ji bzhin no// dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gar byed pa// de dag tshul khrims slob pa mi gtang ngo // tshul khrims srab pa gang rnams mi gtong ba// de dag yon tan gnas pas yon tan ldan/ tshul
216b9(phal chen): byang chub shes rab ston par byed// bslabs pas sa'i yon tan legs la brtson// tshul khrims bsram pa yong su ma btang na// rgyal ba rnaMs kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'os// dad pas sangs rgyas sde zhu gang byad/ 
218a1(phal chen): de dag rgyal ba'i mchod pa yangs par byed// rgyal ba rnaMs la mchod pa su byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas mos pa bsam mi khyab// dad pas chos la bu dud gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms nyam/ 
218a2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngom su nyanaM// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mas// dad pas dge 'dun bu dung su byed pa// de dag mi lag dge 'dun rnams la mos// maM ldog dge 'dun rnams la su mos pa// de dag
218a3(phal chen): dad pa'i stobs kyi phyir mo ldog/ dad pa'i stobs kyis gang rjes mi ldog pa// de dag dbang ba ring gsal zhing rdo// gang rnaMs dbang po rab du gsal nog// des da ni sdig pa'i grags po rnam par spangs// de dag
218a4(phal chen): chos kyi bshes gnyen yongasu 'dzin// chos kyi bshes gnyen gang rnaMs mi gis yongs bzung ba// de dag dge ba rgya chen yongasu spogs// dge ba rgya chen yongasu gang stsogs pa// bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyu mthun ldan// 
218a5(phal chen): bdag nyid che ba rgyu mthun gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par yangs pa thob// mos pa yangs pa'i khyad par sus thob pa// de dag rgyal bas rtag tu byin kyis brlabs// rgyal ba'i byin gyis gang rnams brlabs gyur/ 
218a6(phal chen): de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skyed// byang chub don du gang gis sems skyes pa// de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson// drang srong chen po yon tan su brtson pa// de dag sangs rgyas rigasu rigs ldan skyes// 
218a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas rig su rigs ldan gang skyes pa// de dag 'du dang 'jal ba rnam par spangs// 'du dang 'bral ba gang gis rnam spangs pa// de dag bsam pa dang zhing rnam par dag/ gang gi bsam pa dang zhing rnam dag ka de dag / 
218a8(phal chen): lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i mchog/ lhag pas dam pa'i mchog dang su ldan pa// de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin la spyod// pha rol phyin la rtag tu su spyod pa// de dag theg pa chen po 'di la spyod// theg pa chen po 'di
218a9(phal chen): la su spyod pa// de dag nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas mtshad// nan tan dam pas sangs rgya su mchod pa// de dag sangs rgyas rdzas dran phyed pa med// sangs rgyas 'dren pa gang la mi byed do// de dag rtag dusangs rgya/ 
218b1(phal chen): zas ma yas mthong // rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas su mthong // de dag rtag du sangs rgyas mi 'grogs med// rtag du sangs rgyas mi 'grogs su ma yin// de la chos kyi nub pa rnanam yang med// gang la chos nu
218b2(phal chen): nam yang med 'gyur ba// de dag spobs pa bsgribs pa med dang ldan// spobs pa bsgribs pa med dang su ldan pa// de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas yang // gang gis chos rab bstan pa mtha' yas pa// 
218b3(phal chen): de dag 'gro la byams pas phan pa tshol// 'gro la byams pas phan pa su tshol po// de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan// snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba su brtan pa// de dag chos kyi dga' bas dab de po 'ag
218b4(phal chen): chos kyi dga' bos dbang po su dga' ba// de dag 'du byed nyes la btang snyoms so// 'du byed nyes pa gang gang snyoms pa// de dag nga rgyal rlom sems bag med spangs// nga rgyal rlom sems dag/ 
218b5(phal chen): med sus spangs phrag de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson// bdag dang gzhan don rtag du su brtson pa// de dge 'khor bas yongasu skyo ba med// gang la 'khor bas yongasu spyo med pa// de dag
218b6(phal chen): brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang ldan// brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa// de dag mngon shes rnam dag mngon par skyes// gang gis mngon shes hUM dag mngon smos pa// dadag spyod
218b7(phal chen): mchog gi rnga bar zhugs// spyod mchog dra bar gang rnams zhugs gyur pa// de dag 'gro ba yongasu sbyin par mkhas// 'gro ba yongasu sprin bor su mkhas pa// de dag 'gro bsdud ye shes tshul la mkhas// 
218b8(phal chen): 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la su mkhas pa// de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson// bsdu dngos bzhi la gang rnams brtson gyur pa// de dag 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas byed// 'gro ba'i don med mtha' ya
218b9(phal chen): su byed la/ de dag shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog ldan// shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog su ldan pa// dpa'o de dag bla med lam la gnas// tha med lam la dpa'o gang gnas pa// de dag
219a1(phal chen): bdud kyi dpung gis thub pa min// gang rnams bdud kyi dpung gis thub mun da// de dag bdud lam bzhi las yongasu 'das// bdud lam bzhi las yongasu su 'das pa// de dag phyir mi ldog gis
219a2(phal chen): ni gang gis byin gyur pa// de dag mi skye'i bzod pa thob pa yin// mi skye'i bzod pa gang gis thob gyur pa// 'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung yang bstan// 'jig rten ston ma rgyal bas lung bstan pa// de dag rgyal
219a3(phal chen): kun dang mngon du gnas// rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas// de dag rgyal ba'i 'phrul la gsal la mkhas// rgyal ba'i 'phrul pa gsang la su mkhas pa// de dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs pa yin/ gang rnams
219a4(phal chen): rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis brgyan// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyi su brgyan pa// de dag bsod nas dam pas lus kyang sbyangs// bsod nams dam pas gang gis lus
219a5(phal chen): sbubs pa// de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar// gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba// de dag mtshan rab su bcu gnyis dang lAn// mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang su ldan po// de dag dpa' byad bzang pos lus kyang brgyan// 
219a6(phal chen): dpa' byad bzang po gang gis lus brgyan pa// de dag lus 'od kun tu mtha' ya so// gang gis lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas pa// de dag 'od gzer rgyan kyang bsam mi khyab// gang la 'od gzer bsam yas rgyan yod pa// 
219a7(phal chen): de dag 'ad las padam mang ba b+h+ring // gang gi 'ad las pad mi mang byung ba// de dag rgyal ba'ang mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// sngon cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig tan kun du yang / ngan 'ang rnam par skad cing sems can 'du
219a8(phal chen): nga rnams rgyal ba pad mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang // don yod na me spyong sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yang ya saM// gang gi mngon shes na/ 
219a9(phal chen): 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing tu sems can bsam gyi mi khyab dgar byed pas// bsam gyis mi khyab zhing na rnam par spyod// gang rnam bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // dzas
219b1(phal chen): thams cad dga' dang su byud da// dbasam pa bzhin 'angs rtenan// shA dang yang dag shes mabyas sems can 'dus// tha dang yang dag shas pa ma shes mthum/ zas pa ra byan na sems can su
219b2(phal chen): dag lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su// ye shes sngon du 'gro bar shin tu 'byung // gang gis lus dang ngag yod rtag dusu// ye shes sngon du 'gro bar 'byung ba// de dag smon lam stongs kyis ci dga' ba// sems can
219b3(phal chen): rgyud du gzugs mang yongasu ston// smon lam stobs kyis gang rnams ci dga' bar// sems can rgyun du gzugs mang son// bar byed// de dag tshig du brjod cing ci smra bang // sA la dbyings kyi yan lag bsam mi khyab
219b4(phal chen): chog du brjod cing ci sgra yang // gang gi sgra dbyangs ba sam yani lag bsaM yas pa// de dag 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi// bsam pa'i sems rnams yul gyis rnam par shes// gang gis ma lus 'gro ba thos cad
219b5(phal chen): kyi// bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam shes pa// de dag skye dang 'chi 'pho nam yang med// nyon mongs rgyu ba 'ang de bzhin skye ba med// skye dang 'chi 'pho gang la med gyur cing // nyon mongs rgyud kyang de bzhin skye// 
219b6(phal chen): med pa// de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyi spros par 'jig rten kun tu spyod// yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus ldan zhing // chos kyi smos par 'jig rten su spyod pa// de dag sa bcu rnam dang dbang bcu'i// pha rol
219b7(phal chen): byin mchog rnam par thar la spyod// gang rnams sa bcu dbang rnams bcu po'o// pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar spyod pa// de dag mngon shes rgyun gyis rnam par 'phrul// tong 'dzin dam pas rnam par spyod pa thob// mngon pa
219b8(phal chen): shes pa'i rgyan gyis rnam 'phrul zhing // ting 'dzin mchog gis rnam spyod su thob pa// de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang skur rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu nod// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba
219b9(phal chen): las// dbang skur rgyan rnams thams cad nod byed pa// de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi// phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang yang skur/ gang rnams spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi// phyag mchi/ 
220a1(phal chen): bdud rtsis mngon par dbang bskur ba// de dag ma lus namakha' rgyas byas shing / phyogs rnams kun du mthu brtan gnas pa byed// gang rnams namakha' ma lus bkang zhing // phyogs rnams kun du mjug
220a2(phal chen): gnas byed pa// dpe ma de dag spyod yul shes pa ni// 'jig rten lnga dang bcas pas mi nus// dpe mang gang gi spyod yul shes bya bar// 'jig rten lnga dang bcas pas mi nus pa// de dag brtson 'grus thams ca
220a3(phal chen): don kyang yod// mthong dang ming thos spobs pa don yod do// gang rnams brtson 'grus thams cad don yod cing // mthong dang ming thos spobs pa don yod pa// skyes chen de dag sbyin bdag gtong ba'i// sbyin pa'i gnas de
220a4(phal chen): thams cad don kyang yod// skyes bu dam pa yang dag byin mthu yis// dam chos tshul ni mi 'jig brtan par gnas// dge ba'i las lam dam pa mchog rnams kyang // rin chen 'dra mthus kun na rgyu zhing gnas// rdo rje/ 
220a5(phal chen): sdug po'i rin can tshogs yod pas// de'i mthu yis rgya mtsho'i rin cen rnams// mi zad 'phel zhing 'gribs pa gang yang med// de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yon tan mtsho// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing rnam ga
220a6(phal chen): yod paka/ de dag kun du byang chub sangs rgyas ston// phyogs rnams gang na dam chos med 'gyur ba// de dag kun du'ang chos kyi gtar ston to// de dag mi rtag rnam par mi rtog ste// ldan gyis grub par phyogs rnams
220a7(phal chen): thams cad du// zla ba lta bur gzugs brnyan ston byed cing // thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag skad cig re rer byang chub du// rnam par sangs rgyas phyogs bcu kun tu ston// 'khor lo skor dang mya nga/ 
220a8(phal chen): 'das zhi dang // sku gdung rgya chen de bzhin dpa'o ston// mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyal sa// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgyun rnams mtha' yas pa// yongasu ston cing bskal ba bsam yas su// theg pa gsum gyi stonas
220a9(phal chen): sems can 'dul gyi khye'u dang bu mo de bzhin bud med lus// skyes bu la dang lA min klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin gri buM ga phye chen po'i gzugs// mos pa thams cad tshul khams yongasu ston// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i snga ngas na
220b1(phal chen): 'gro ba'i gzugs mang rgyud ni ci snyed dang // cha byad spyod pa sgra dbyangs tshul gyi rnams// thams cad ma lus dpa'o ston pa byed// de dag zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste// phyog bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad mchod pa byed// 
220b2(phal chen): de dag 'od gzer mang pos bsam mi khyab// sems can 'grel ba'i ye shes mtha' yang yas// de dag tshig gi rnam 'phrul ye shes rnam 'phrul dang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul pa snam gyis mi khyab ste// sbyin pa tshul 'am/ 
220b3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul ba dang // bzod pa brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag bsam gtan shes rab rnam 'phrul dang // thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas tshogs kyi rnam
220b4(phal chen): 'phral bas mi khyab// yon tan kun gyis rno 'phrul mtha' yang yas// de dag rdul phran 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin rnams// rdul phran kun la mngon par bsgrub byed cing // rdul phran gtse gcig bsam yas zhing gi
220b5(phal chen): rnams// ston pa byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med// rdul gcig rtse 'di sangs rgyas bzhugs zhing dang // sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing yang de bzhin ston// la la kun nas nyon mongs rnaMs dag dog pa dang // yangs
220b6(phal chen): shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston// zhing rnal la 'dzag cing 'du ba dang ka la la spyi'u tshugs rim gyi gan pa ston// la laM spel zhi sdig rgyu la bu ste// de bzhin gzhan rnams mig 'phrul lta bur ston// de dag
220b7(phal chen): rdul cig rtser sngon ji bzhin du// ma lus rdul rjes kun la de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// mtha' yas grags pa'i rna thar de 'dra'o// de dag rgyal ba mchod pa rje 'phrul ting 'dzin// rgyal
220b8(phal chen): ba kun la mngon par bsgrub byed kyang // lag pa'i mthil gyi stong gsu rgyus bkang zhing // skyes bu chen po rnaMs la mchod pa byed// phyog bcu kun na me tog 'phreng ba dang // spos dang byug pa ran chen rin chen kun// 
220b9(phal chen): de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa'i// rgyal ba mchod phyir lag pa'i 'thil nas 'gyed// na bza' phye ma rin chen ci snyed dang // rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs dam sna tshogs dang // gser gyi rgyan dang rin chen zla re dag
221a1(phal chen): lag mthal de nas char du mngon par 'beb// phyog nas tha' yas kun gyi yo byad nas// drang srong che la mchod par gang 'os pa// de dag lag mthil de les char du 'bebs// byang chub shing drung rgyal/ 
221a2(phal chen): ba mchod pa byed// rol mo'i rnam pa phyogs na ci snyed pa// rnga chen rje rang pi bang sgra brnyan dang // rol mo bdud dkrol gling bu sma rab nas// de dag lag mthil de nas sgra yang sgrog/ phyogs bcu'i dpe med ji snyed bzhugs pa ni/ 
221a3(phal chen): bde gshegs yon tan legs pa sna tshogs dang // bstod pa'i tshig ba cang bsgru pa sna tshogs dang // lag mthil de nas sgra rab snyan par 'byung // de dag 'od gzir las dgos yongs bsag pa// lag pa g.yas nas/ 
221a4(phal chen): yongasu 'gyed byed cing // rgyal ba'i zhing rnaMs spos chus ma lus par// kun du btab cing 'jig rten sgron ma mchod// 'od gzar yid 'od snang zhing rgyan ldan pa// lag pa'i mthil bkye pad ma bas mi khyab// pad ma rgyun
221a5(phal chen): 'phyang mtshan sdug du ma'i gzugs// mang po bkye zhing rgyal ba mchod pa byed// 'od gzer me tog rgyan rnam rab bkye zhing // me tog rgyan dang me tog bla re dang / me tog sna chog kun kyang yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid/ 
221a6(phal chen): che ba de dag rgyal po mchod// 'od gzer spos kyi rgyan rnaMs rab bkye zhing // spos kyi rgyan dang spos kyi bla re dang // sna tshogs spos kyis kun du yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od gzer phye ma
221a7(phal chen): rgyan nas rab bkye zhing // phye ma'i rgyan dang phye ma'i bla rer dang // phye ma sA chog kun du yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od gzer na bza'i rgyan rnaMs rab bkye zhing // na bza'i rgyan dang na badz+ram
221a8(phal chen): b+hA ra dang // na bza' sna tshogs kun du yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od gzer rim can rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // rin chen rgyan dang rin chen bA ra dang / rin chen sna chog kun du/ 
221a9(phal chen): yongs bkang zhing // bdag cid tsha ba de dag rgyal ba mtshad// 'odag par pad mo'i rgyan rnaMs rab bkyi zhing // pad mo'i rgyan dang 'ad mo'i bla re dang // pad mo snga chog kun tu yongs bkang zhing / bdag nyid tshe da sa/ 
221b1(phal chen): rgyal ba mchod// 'od gzer 'thad pa'i rgyan rjes rab bkye zhing // 'phreng ba'i rgyan dang 'phreng ba'i tha ra dang / 'brang ba sna tshogs kun du yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal mchod// 'od gangs
221b2(phal chen): rgyal mtshan mchog rgyan rab bkye zhing // de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser pa dang / sngo dang sna tshugs rnas mang rgyan cin gyis// rgyal ba'i zhing rnaMs kun nas brgyan 'byed// de dag bde gshegs dbu
221b3(phal chen): la gdugs kyi mchog// rin chen dra ba sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa// dar gyi lA lI ba dan yongs sbyangs shing // dril 'phreng rgyal ba'i gsung // sgrog 'dzin pa byed// de dag lag pa'i 'thil nas bas gyis mi khyab pa'i// 
221b4(phal chen): mchod pa rgyal ba gcig la byed pa wAr// ma lus rgyal ba rnaMs la 'ang de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rje 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// de dag 'gro ba yongs sdud ye shes kyis// rnas par 'phrul ba 'ang ting 'dzin
221b5(phal chen): mngon pa sgrubs shing // bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du// bas mang stob kyi sos can 'dul ba byed// la la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang // sbyin pa bsaM gyi mi khyab gtong ba'i sgo// sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun
221b6(phal chen): kyi tshul khrim sgo// bzod pa mi zad mi sprul sgo dag dang // la la brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson 'grus sgo// bsa~M rtan rab du zhir gnas sgo dag dang // don rnaMs rni pA 'byed pa'i shes rab s+ho// tshul rnas kun ldan
221b7(phal chen): thabs kyi sgo dag dang ka tshangs pa'i spyod pa dag dang mngon shes s+ho// bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan 'tshal sgo dag dang // bsod na saM yongasu bsags dang ye shes sgo// bde brten pa'i rje thar sno ga dang // la la stong dang
221b8(phal chen): dang po lam gyi sngo// nyan thos theg pa rna grol sgo dag dang // rang rgyal theg pa rnaM par dag pa'i sgo// thog pa dam pa rnam 'phrul sgo dag dang // la la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal s+ho// la la bdag med srog med sgo dag/ 
221b9(phal chen): dang / mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral ba'i sgo// la la zhi 'gog ting 'dzin sgo dag du// 'gro ba'i spyod sgo ci snyed yod rgyu ba// de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te// de dag kun gyi sgo'i sgo dag nas// bsam
222a1(phal chen): pa ji bzhin 'jig rten seMs can 'dul// gang rnaMs kun gyi sgo'i sgo dag nas// bas pa ji bzhin sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mtshan bzung bar mi nus te// ting 'dzin rje 'phrul tshul ni de 'dra'o// deng/ 
222a2(phal chen): dga' ba ni rgyan gyi ting 'dzin mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad yang sbyin byed mthun pa/ dpa' bde spro bar rab dga'i kun ldan pas// bsam gyi mi khyab yongs sgron sems can 'dul// gang tsha la nyes thos cad
222a3(phal chen): dkon 'gyur ba// de tshe 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad rnaMs// thas cad bas pa rdzog par bya ba'i phyir// sbyin pa yongasu gdong zhing 'gro don byed// de dag zas mchog skom dang ro gcig dang // gos dang dga' ba rin cen sa
222a4(phal chen): tshogs dang // rgyal srid nor dang bdag sdug yongs btang bas// sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed// de dag mtshan rab kun gyis lus brgyan cing // gos dang rgyan mchog yongasu bgos btags te// 'phrong
222a5(phal chen): bas rdo brgyan spos kyis bska byas pa'i// gzugs yongasu bstan pas sems can 'dul// mthong bas dga' bde rab du mos pa la// de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang cha byad mdzes// gzugs kyi
222a6(phal chen): dam pa yongasu ston byed cing // gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag ka la bing ka'i sgra snyan dang // ko ki la ku nal dang pa'i sgra dbyangs dang // rnga dang tshangs pa'i ming dang ci'i smras// mos pa thos cad
222a7(phal chen): tshul bzhin chos kyang ston// de dag sod drug brgyan rtsa bzhi po// gang gis rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o// chos kyi sgom de dag gis// bas pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag 'de dang sdug
222a8(phal chen): stsal thogs kyang byed/ don dang ngan med gros mod don kyang de bzhin te// sems can dgos la 'gyur byas shing // grogs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul// sdug bsngal rgyas s+ho// 'dus byas skyon gyi
222a9(phal chen): sngags kyi ngan dung dag pazang bar byed// 'gro'i kunas pan dang ba don du// de dag thog su ma bdanyam su lan// gang na 'byung ba med cing chos mad/ dan pam yon tan 'arab ma dbyin pa// ngo dag gus/ 
222b1(phal chen): rgyal srong che spangs shing // zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung // de dag khyim gyi gcon sreg gnas pa'i// 'gro ba thos cad yongasu dgrol ba'i rgyur// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par// mngon
222b2(phal chen): bar 'byung zhing thar pa yongasu brjod// de dag spyod pa bcu rnaMs 'arjod byed cing // sgras chen nas kyi chos la de dag spyod// drang srong spyod ba thas cad ma lus par// yongasu sgom 'ang 'gro ba'i don kyang byed/ gang sos can
222b3(phal chen): chang mod che ldan pa// bde ba phun lAn nyon mongs chung yod pa// de dag kun du nan gzir nang bu can// bdag la dbang med tsam gyi dbong sbyar ston// 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang 'bar gyur te// gti mug rgyu las 'jig can
222b4(phal chen): ma 'bar zhing // rga shi nad kyis rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i// 'jig rten bstan cing sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi// chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnaMs kyis kyang // sangs rgyas
222b5(phal chen): bdag nyid che ba brjod byed cing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnaMs kyi 'gro don byed// de dag yongs ston rdzu 'phrul rjes ston cing // gzugs rjes byin rlom mthu yis mthu che ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing // 
222b6(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul rni per 'phrul bas seMs can 'dul// de dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba'i don du 'jig rten rim gror byed// 'jig rten mi chags chu la pad mo bzhin/ dga' ba mos pa skye ba rnam par rjodade/ 
222b7(phal chen): de dag rjod byed rjod pa'i rgyal po byed// gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan// mdzes shing sdug par bzhang gar byed pa dang // sgyu mkhan gzugs mad kun du ston pa byed// grong khyer grong dpon khyim bdag
222b8(phal chen): de bzhin te// rgyal po blon po mda' rab pho nya dang // smad pa mi 'dzags gtsug lag mkhas pa byed// de dag nags tshal sdong po chen por 'gyur// sman dang rin chen mi zad gter dag dang // yid bzhin nor bu 'dod
222b9(phal chen): pa'i byin shing dang // laM go la 'khyis la de bzhin lam ston 'gyur// 'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes 'gyur cing // sems can las kyi tshul la mi shes pa// de dag kun la rmongs thabs tshod thabs dang // 
223a1(phal chen): sna tshogs bzo' rjes kun kyang rjod pa byed// 'tsho med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams// seMs can bde'i skyed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa// rig mthu sman dang gtsug lag sna tshogs rnams// 
223a2(phal chen): kun kyang drang srong de dag rnam par brjod// drang srong rnams kyi stong pa dam pa mchog/ gang la ltar bcas 'jig rten dang gyur dang // brtul zhugs dka' spyod dka' thub mchag gnas// kun kyang mkhas pa de dag ston par/ 
223a3(phal chen): byang // de dag rgyu mu dang kun rgyu mu stegs can// dka' thub spyod yul mi smrar spyod pa dang // sgren mo gos med ri'i dge sbyong la// mu stegs can gyi mkhan po mkhas pa byed// de dag yongs 'tsho chas la spyod pa dang // bla na yod dang / 
223a4(phal chen): bla na med pa'i rnams// ral po ring dang byis pa'i rtul shugaso can// de dag du yang de dag mkhan por 'gyur// nyi ma'i rjes 'brang dka' thub lnga ldan dang // khyim dang brtul zhugs ri dwags spyod// gle'u can stegs ba nu sum/ 
223a5(phal chen): spyod pa'i rnaMs// de dag kun du'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// lha rnaMs ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang // mu stegs khrus byed yul du rgyu ba dang // rtsa ba 'bras bu chu la spyod pa'i rnam so// chos sems nang na de dag dam
223a6(phal chen): por 'gyur// gnas bteg gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang // tsher ma rtsa dang thal ba'i mal can dang // dbyig pa'i mal can gcig tu spyod pa'i rnams// de dag kun du'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// phyi rol mu stegs
223a7(phal chen): can rnams ci snyed pa// de dag bas pa mos pa rdzogs byas shing / bsgrubs dga' me bzang drag shul dka' thub kyi/ mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bas 'dul// 'jig rten la bas 'khrugs pa shes byas na/ 
223a8(phal chen): ba'i ngan pa'i mu sags cam// kun la b+hA ba'i tshig dang thabs rgyal gyis// bde ba sngon de dag kun du byeng // la le nga byi la'i sngags tshig du/ shin du gsang ba'i tshogs bden paskon/ la ma ngag la gsal 'o / 
223a9(phal chen): dang tshig gis/ lal ngag la la'i gsang tshig gis// la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang // don ngas rtogs pa rdo rje tshig nas dang / rgol ba 'dul ba'i ye shes tshig nas// bskun pa thub sad thar pa'i tshig rnaMs kyi
223b1(phal chen): nganas byas sa na/ dran la 'dug pa N+Dig d+hAs hU~M gnas dang // la la dgas mam tshas dang sa tshig rnaMs/ klu'i tshig ngas gang tsun tshag rnams kyi// la dag ma thun pa 'byung ba dang / dza rna
223b2(phal chen): 'phye chen po'i tshig/ mi ci'i lha min na mkha' lding tshig gis// bden pa bstan cing thar par 'dren par byed// de dag bden pa'i nges tshig tshul shes bzhin// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos chos ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bas
223b3(phal chen): tshig lam shes pas ston// de dag ting 'dzin rje 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag 'gro badre'i mchog gi ting nge 'dzin// 'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // 'od gzar bas gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste// 'od gzer bkye nas / 
223b4(phal chen): can de dag 'dul// 'od gzer mthong na legs par rab bkye zhing // sems can ci snyed 'od gzer de shes pa// de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te// bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu// sangs rgyas bstan te chos
223b5(phal chen): rnams yongs bstan nas/ dge 'dun bstan nas mi rnams lam bstan te/ rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan pas na// des ni mthong na legs pa'i 'od gzer grub// lha'i 'od gzer zil gyi mi non / 
223b6(phal chen): 'od zer 'od byed rab tu 'gyed byas shing // mun pa kun dang rdul rnaMs kun gsal te// 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab du snang // 'od des seMs can yongs bsul ba// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar 'dzin// 
223b7(phal chen): rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar bzung byas pas// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzada'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'bru mar gyi ni me mar dang ka/ shing dang rtsa dang smyig ma swa'i sgron// spos dang ro mchog rin chen sgron ma dag/ rgyal ba
223b8(phal chen): rnams gsol 'od byed de thob bo// 'od gzer sgron zhes bya bar rab bkye zhing // smos can ci snyed 'od gzer des bskul ba// de dag sred pa rjes yangs srid pa'i mchor// sems can bsngal don gocha brtan pa
223b9(phal chen): gyon// gang rnaMs sred pa rna yangs srid pa'i mtshor// sems can bsgral phyir go cha brtan gyon pa// de dag chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba byed// mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong yang ston// stegs dang za ba gcig min byas 'das
224a1(phal chen): chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru byin te// 'dus byas sun byung zhi ba bsngags pas nas// des ni sprul pa'i 'od gzer de grub bo// 'od gzer sgom pa sel ba rab bkye zhing // sems can ci snyed 'od zer nges
224a2(phal chen): bskul pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan sgom pa rab spangs shing // chos kyis rna grol ro la don du gnyer// 'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te// chos kyis sprul ba'i ro la don gnyer bas// sangs rgyas bdud rtsi'i
224a3(phal chen): char de 'bebs par 'gyur// 'jig rten sred pa'i skom pa rnam par sel// rdzing dang chu klung khron pa lu ma dang // mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de// 'dod pa rnams spang bsam gtan bsngags pas na/ 
224a4(phal chen): skom pa rnam sel de ni des grub bo// 'od zer dga' bar byed pa rab bkye zhi// sems can ji snyed 'od gzer des bskul ba// dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed// 
224a5(phal chen): thugs rje mnga' ba rnaMs kyi sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa// pad ma'i bdan la ba dan la bzhugs shing byas bsgrubs shing // rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan brjod pas na// dga' ba byed pa'i 'od ni nges bsgrub bo// 'od zer/ 
224a6(phal chen): mos par byed pa rab byed pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od gzer des bskul pa// de dag thas cad sangs rgyas mos pas dga'// chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos pas dga'// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas
224a7(phal chen): mos dga' ste// chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos dga' bas// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun dang // rtag tu 'grogs 'thob bzod pa bla med 'thob// sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang chog mchog la// 
224a8(phal chen): sems can mang po bskul zhing dran byas to// byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pas na// des ni 'od zer mos par byed pa grub// 'od gzer bsod nams bsags pa rab bkye zhing // thams cad ji ste/ 
224a9(phal chen): 'od gzar des bskul pa// bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing / sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma yongasu gtong // de dag mchod su ni lug pa byed pa'i tshe/ spangs mo pa'i bas 'ardzogs byas te// bsam pa zu/ 
224b1(phal chen): tshul ston pa byin byas na// des ni 'od gzar bsod nams bsags grub bo// 'od zer ye shes ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul pa// chos gcig stonas gcig min pa
224b2(phal chen): chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis rje su shes// chos kyi bye brag sems can 'dzin btsud de// des rtogs don gyi ye shes rnam phye zhing // chos kyi tshig rnaMs brjod pas byas pas na// des ni ye shes ldan pa'i
224b3(phal chen): 'od zer grub// 'od zer shes rab sgron ma rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul pa// stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung ba'i// rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu bdug/ 
224b4(phal chen): bdag po med chos spyong pa byed med pa// sprin dang smyig rgya chu zla 'dra ba'i dngos// rmi lam lta bu gzugs brnyan rang bzhin rnams// bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo// 'od zer chos kyis rje 'phrul rab bkye
224b5(phal chen): zhing // sems can ci snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// mi zad gzugs kyi mdzod rnams rab thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzad kyang 'dzin// chos 'chang rnams la yongasu phan btags te// drang srong rnam la chos
224b6(phal chen): kyis bsrung shing // 'gro ba kun la chos bzhon pan btags pas// 'od zer chos kyi rna 'phrul de gru bo ta 'od zer gtong dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can 'jungs pa ji snyed des bskul pa// skyid pa mi brtan mi
224b7(phal chen): rtag shes gyur nas// de dag rtag tu sbyin mos dga' bar 'gyur 'jungs pa phul ka'i sems can ma dul dang // nor rnaMs rmi lam smin tshul shes gyur nas// dga' ba'i yid kyi sbyin brje spel bas// gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od ze
224b8(phal chen): des bsgrub bo// 'od gzer yongasu gdung med rab bkye zhing // tshul ngan sems can ji snyed des bskul ba// tshul khrims rje dag rab du gnas gyur te// rang 'byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do// gtong dang ldan pa'i nga
224b9(phal chen): dge ba'i las lam yongasu dag pa dang // tshul khrims bzang la sems can mang bskul cing // byang chub sems la yang dag bskal byas pas// yongasu gdung ming 'od zer nges grub bo// bzod pas rje brgyan 'od zer rab bkye
225a1(phal chen): maM bzang sems can ji srid des bskul ba// khro ba'i tha ba rgyal yongs spangs shing // de dag bzod mos rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// sdig sas ldan pa nyes pa bzod byas te// byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas shing / 
225a2(phal chen): ya dan tag tu brdad byas pas ga/ ris ni bzad pas rna brtan gruba'o// 'dagazang badzi dang ldan pa rab bkyi dang // mama'i bams par gyi mengangs bskul pa// dgas par bkran ring dkor bachag gsuman
225a3(phal chen): snad pa skyon med mchong par 'gyur// rigs par btsun pas dkon mchog gsungs la// sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi lam las yongs 'das te// myur du byang chub bla med rang du thob// sems can ma
225a4(phal chen): po brtson 'grus bskul byas te// dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas// tha ma'i du su dmo chos yongs bzung bas// des ni brtson ldan 'od gzer de grub bo// 'od gzer zhi bar byed pa rab bkye zhing ka rnam 'khrugs sems can dza/ 
225a5(phal chen): snyed des bskul pa // de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rjes// nyam su mi gnod ma nye bzhag semasu 'gyur// sdig ngo'i grog po nyes ldan spyod pa can// 'du 'dzi yongasu rnaM par spangs byas te// bas gtan zhi ba'i dgon par rab bsngag/ 
225a6(phal chen): ba/ des ni zhi byed 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer shes rab rna rgyan rab bkye zhing // shes rab 'chal ba ci snyed des bskal pa// shes rab 'od gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang // bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnaMs dang / 
225a7(phal chen): dbang po'i rgyas la rtogs par shes par 'gyur/ bden dang rten dang d+hU thar tshul rnaMs dang // dbang po'i rgyus la gtogs par shes gyur cing // nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas// shes rab 'od gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar/ 
225a8(phal chen): dang // rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs btang ste// byang chub don du chos rnaMs gang btsal bka/ de dag rim gror rab du brjod byas pas// shes rab rna brgyan 'od gzar de grub bo// 'od gzar sangs rgyas ldan par rab brtse
225a9(phal chen): nong // sems can ci snying 'ong bar des bskul pa// sangs rgyas pasa~M gyis mi khyab shin du mang ba'i nas/ bang mo mchog la bzhugs par rab du mthong / sangs rgyas bdag nyid mi dang rnaMs thar dang // sangs rgyas rje 'phrul man
225b1(phal chen): da sa// sku rgyas na sa dang rdzu 'phrul brjod rnas pas// smras rgyas bang das gyu na// 'ang pa ma 'jigs kun par kyi / 'jigs ma dmas can cig / 
225b2(phal chen): ba gar 'a dang bsad pang 'dag pa dang / nad kyis na rab du 'grol/ ma 'jim ston pas sems cad bsgrub pa dang / thas gcad pas las mamos rgyud byer btsug cing / 'dzags pas skyabs cas rnas la skyabs kyi
225b3(phal chen): pas// 'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa des grub bo ka/ 'od zer thams cad bde bang rab bkye zhing // nad pa na ci snyed des reg pa// thos cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rje bar grol/ bas gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnas kyang thob// nang mas
225b4(phal chen): 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang // rin chen mchog spos dang drug pa dang // bu mar snang ci 'o ma mar dag/ dang / 'bru mar bas snyom byin pas de grub po// 'di zer sangs rgyas ston pas rab bkye zhing // che zad mthar na tsa med des 'askul pa/ 
225b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de dag shi 'bas sangs bzhugs shing 'grog 'amachi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te/ dkar 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing / 'chi gar sangs rgyas rgya
225b6(phal chen): btang byas pas// sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer ngas thab po// 'od zer chos rab brjod pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji srad 'ang nges bskul pa// chos nyan brjod cing de bzhin dri ba byed/ chos la mos pas rtag du dga' ba rdzus
225b7(phal chen): chos kyi mu ge'i dusu chos brjod de// chos tshol rnaMs kyi bas pa rdzogs byas shing / mos pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis shes// brjod pas chos rab brjod pa des thob bo// sangs rgyas sas rnaMs yongasu bskul ba'i phyir// 'od gzen
225b8(phal chen): dbyangs dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // khaMs gsuM sgra rgyud ci snyed yod pa dag// kun kyang de bzhin gas pa'i gsung du thos// gsal ba'i dbyangs skar drang srong che bstod de// rol mo sgra can dril gyi sbyin pa rnaMs// 'gro ba kun la
225b9(phal chen): rgyal ba'i gsung don du// yongasu btang bas 'od gzer dbyangs ldan thob// 'od gzer 'chi med sbyin pa rab bkye zhing // sos can ci snyed 'od gzer des bskul pa// bag med spyod pa thams cad na spangs te// yon tan kun la rnam
226a1(phal chen): 'byor nyi su len// 'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste ka sdug bsngal 'cha ba mang pos yongasu gang // 'gog pa rtag tu bden pa dga' zhes// brjod pas 'tsha med sbyin pa des thob bo// 'od gzer khyad par ldan / 
226a2(phal chen): pha bkye zhing / sems can ji phred 'a gamar des bskul pa/ rdul zhims khyad per ting 'dzin khyang bar dang // shes rab byung bar rgyal ba rnas lanyen/ tshul khrim 'phags pa'i ting 'dzin 'phags pa sa/ shes raba' 'grus pa/ 
226a3(phal chen): thub pa rgyal can zhes/ byang chub don du bsngag shod bstod byas pas// des ni 'od zer khyad par ldan pa thab// 'od zer rin chen rje brgyan rab bkye zhing // sos can ci snyed 'od zer des bskul paka rin chen gter mang mi zad/ 
226a4(phal chen): thab gyur te// drang srong che la rim can dam pas mchod// rgyal ba rnaMs dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// rin can phul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs la// rin chen bsdud de rin chen sbyin btang bas// rin chen rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od gzer grub
226a5(phal chen): 'od gzor spos mchog ldan pa rab bkye zhing // seMs can ji snyed 'od gzer des bskul ba/ ka/ mi la med pa'i spos dri tshor gyur nas// sangs rgyas yon tan rjes la nges par 'gyur// mi dang lA'i spos dang byug pa yis// mi'i gtso la mchod
226a6(phal chen): pa rab byas te// spos kyi rgyal ba'i gzugs la mchod rten dag/ byas pas 'od zer spos mchog snang ba grub// 'od gzer sna tshogs rjes brgyan rab bkye zhing // gdug dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshog// rol mo sgra snyan spos dang / 
226a7(phal chen): drug spos dang / bzang ngam pa yongs brgyan ma chog 'gyud// sman cad rgyal ba rol mo sa bsu byas te// me tog byug sa 'dug sngos byem dang / gzugs dang rgyal mtshan pa ngan mchog dag gis// mchod pa byas pas
226a8(phal chen): sna chags rgyan thung po// 'od bar shin du dang byed rab bkye zhing // se rnas lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed// mchod rten drang srong gnas rnaMs snang byas pas// dus ni 'ad thar shin du dang byed grung // 'od gar chen
226a9(phal chen): sprin na dang dkyi'ang / rdzas kyi thebs ston nas kun nas gsas/ mtshad can gama'i mas tshus 'dis bta // 'dag cang bye nga nan pa rab tu // 'od par na pa ma na brgya dang/ 
226b1(phal chen): gos yod rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur/ gos dang mgo babreng ba sna tshogs dag/ yongasu btang bas la bltab rnaM brgyan grub// 'od zer blo mchog ldan pa rab bkye zhing // bkres pa kha mas ro mchog thob par 'gyur// 
226b2(phal chen): zas dang phra ma dang mchog sa mtshogs rnaMs/ sbyin par mchog len pa'i 'od kyang thob/ 'od bzar nong snyan rang du dkyis byas shing / 'ongs la rin chen gter rnam thob par 'gyur// gnas dang gtar rnaMs na rung
226b3(phal chen): dkon mchog gsum/ gsol bas nor ston 'od gzar de thob bo// 'od gzer mig spyod rab du dge byas shing // long ba de che sna tshogs gzugs mthong 'gyur// rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchog rten la// mar me gsolas
226b4(phal chen): mig spyod 'od zer grub// rna ba rnam spyod 'od zer nges bkyo zhing // rna ba nyis dga' sgra mang thos par 'gyur// rgyal ba rjes dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// sil snyan phul bas rna ba rje spyong thob// 'od zer sna spyong rab du rgyas byas shing
226b5(phal chen): stan chad ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur// rgyal ba rnaMs dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// spos zhim gsol bas sA spyod 'od gzer grub// 'od zer lce sbyong rab du dag byas shing // sgra snyan yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas bstod// mi snyan
226b6(phal chen): brlang bar swa ba ra d+he spangs te// 'jam par smra bas lce spyod 'od zer grub// 'od gzer lus spyod rab du dge byos shing // dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnaMs dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// lus kyis rab
226b7(phal chen): bdud lus spyodab 'od zer slob// 'od zer soso spyod rab du dge byas shing // smyos pa thas cad rang bzhin sa su gyur// ting 'dzin rjesu sos 'gror rab byas pas// des ni sems spyod 'od zer de grub bo// 'od gzer gzugs spyas
226b8(phal chen): rab tu dge byas shing // bsam yas sku mnga' mi'i dbang po mthong // sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang // mchod rten rgyan byas gzug spyod thob par gyur// 'od gzer sgra spyong rab du dge byas shing // s+thA ni sgra min stong par rab tu shrI
226b9(phal chen): rkyen las byung bas sgra snyan 'dra'o zhes// sgra rnaMs bstan pas 'od gzir de grub bo// 'od zer dri spyod rab tu dge byas shing // dring thams cad dri zhim mchog du 'gyur// spos mchog rab chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag/ khrus byas
227a1(phal chen): na da nga/ 'ad bang narang gdung ga zupags du pa drug mad pa cig zug/ sangs rdzu nyan mas bcas dang pas// tham tshas mas cad rnam pa 'an/ 
227a2(phal chen): reg byung rang du dag zung shi / rag ma dang thams cid 'jam pa dang 'gyur/ dri shul mdung dang ras gyi mang ra rang/ 'breng ba ying 'ang srung bal pa mar 'gyur/ gos mang 'jam par ga na 'de' ba'i nas/ 
227a3(phal chen): bgashegs pa'i lam du bting ba ma / na nas drug pa na 'ba' 'jam dang // phreng ba thar gzal ba 'ad yin// 'dra bar chos stong rab dung rgya byas shing / spu kun nas 'dzag rten pa na mdzad pa 'i/ sa
227a4(phal chen): yas chos mang 'byung ba thos par 'gyur// mos pa'i le tshul bzhin du dga' bar byed// rkyen las byug bsam skyed rang bzhin yin// rgyal ba'i sku ni chos kyi sku yin te// chos nyid namakha' bzhin du rtag gnas shes
227a5(phal chen): rjod pas chos spyod 'od zer de thob do// 'od zer sgo mo de dag la stsogs pa// drang srong rnaMs kyi ba spu'i sgo gcig nas// 'ga' 'ga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'od gzer 'byung // kun kyang tha dad las kyi tshul can no// 
227a6(phal chen): de ltar ba sgra gcig nas// 'od zer 'ga' 'ga'i bye snyed yongs byung ba// de bzhin ma lus sku rnams thos cad nas// drang srong ting 'dzin 'phrul de 'dra'o// yon tan gang gis 'od zer glu 'gyur ba'i// yon tan
227a7(phal chen): dul ba sang phyogs smras byas pa// de dag 'ang gzer de dag nyid kyang 'byung // drang srong ting 'dzin ni 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag bsad nas bstong grags byas pa la// rje su yid rang gisol ba sus bad 'dzin
227a8(phal chen): bdags ma sa dag pa pas na gyur pa// de dag phan kyang 'od ma nga dag shes/ bad+ma gis kyi song rnaMm byas shing dag pas klas te/ sang sa rgyas mang dang yang du du mchod zas shing // sangs sas
227a9(phal chen): sa da / rangs rnas yang ming dngas sem nga da/ 'a na
227b1(phal chen): rang rang so so'i las la 'jug/ de bzhin skyes chen 'od gzer de dag kyang // med pa ma yin kun du 'phros pa ste// de dag mos pa log pas mnar ba yin// bal gyis mi mthong blo gros yangs la mad// rgyan dang non

227b3(phal chen): ches mos pa skyes gyur na// bdag ni yon tan chen po rgyal mtshan du// mi 'gyur snyam du nem nur des mi bskyed// de dag 'khor ba'i rgyan du rno 'phrul bar// ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par rab bsgrubs shing // phyogs bcu
227b4(phal chen): kun du dpe zla med pa'i// rgyal sras 'khor rjes yongasu ston pa byed// de dag pad ma mdzes pa stong gsum tsa ma~M// 'od kyis rje brgyan byin gyis brlabs byas shing // lus gcig dkyil mo krud kyis pad mo de// yongasu rgyas
227b5(phal chen): ston ting 'dzin rna bar 'phrul// de dag zhi bcu'i rdul snyed pad mo gzhan// 'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlab byas shing // rgyal sras kun gyis kun nas yongs bskor bar// de dag ting 'dzin med par spyod// drang srong
227b6(phal chen): des ni yongasu smin byas te// rgyal ba'i legs pa yongasu gang bsgrubs pa ka de dag pad mo chen po'i 'khor byed cing // kun kyang thal mo sbyar te ngor yang lta// skyes bu chen po'i chos nyid de dang 'dra// gang rnas ting 'dzin
227b7(phal chen): rje spyod zhugs gyur pa// kun kyang rang rang slob mas bskor gyur te// zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba bzhin// de dag ci ltar phyogs cig 'jug byed cing // sangs rgyas sras kyi 'khor nas ston byed pa// de bzhin ma lus
227b8(phal chen): phyogs rnaMs thams cad du// ston te ting 'dzin rje 'phrul de 'dra'o// bcu drug ting 'dzin rab rjes mngon bsgrub cing // phyogs kyi dra bar spel gzhir spyod pa byed// la lar mnyam bzhag la lar rno langs par// rang rang lus
227b9(phal chen): kyokyang phyog rnams kun tu ston// de dag shar gyi phyog su mnyam bzhag cing // dpa'o de dag nub kyi phyogs nas ljang // nub kyi phyogasu de bzhin mnyam bzhag cing // shar gyi phyogs nas bdag nyid che ba ldang // de bzhin
228a1(phal chen): phyogs bcu kun tu 'jug byed de// phyogs rjes gzhan du mnye bar gzhag byas shing // ye shes yon tan mang po gzhan nas ldang // drang srong ting 'dzin rje 'phrul de 'ja'o// shar phyogs zhing grangs ci snyed yod/ 
228a2(phal chen): pa'i rnaMs// ma lus de dag kun kyang rang 'byung gi// spyan lnga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la// zhi bar rnam par spyod pade dag snang // der ni mnyaM bzhag sems can bstan byas nas// nub kyi zhing rnaMs kun nas dbang po rjes// 
228a3(phal chen): langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na// mchod pa rjes mang du ma byed par snang // nub kyi zhing rjes ci snyed pa'i rjes// ma lus de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi// spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la// zhi bar rno bar spyod pa de
228a4(phal chen): dag sang \u0f7fder naM mnyaM bzhog sems can bsun byas nas// shar gyi zhing rnaMs kun nas dpa'o'i rjes// langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snyan// mchod pa rno mang du ma byed pa snang // phyogs bcu'i zhing du 'jug pa de 'dras
228a5(phal chen): phyogs rnaMs kun tu ma lus dpa'o bo'i rnas ka la la mnya bzhag la la rnam par langs// 'jig rten sgron ma kun la mchod byed srung / de dag mig ga le la mnyaM bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba gzugs kyi la las ldang // 'jig

228a9(phal chen): ma nga / 'dzi ngas sa / nam ma / rnanas bya la zu / mangs bya pa
228b1(phal chen): de dag yu'i lam la mnye bzhag cing // zo mchog kun gyi laM la ltung bar byed// bdag nyid tshe ba de drag zo mchog shes/ 'jig rten lhur bcas de la mos par 'gyur// tho'i mchog la mnye bar bzhag byas shing // danas

228b3(phal chen): zhugs/ 'jig rten mA ri bcas de lamos par 'gyur// reg gi li mnye bar bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa lus kyi lam las ldang // lus ni ma skyes ma babyung rang bzhin te/ song pa byed pa med par ston pa byed//

229a1(phal chen): gnod sbyin lusu rnaM par ldang // 'phrul tshon gnod sbyin lusu mnye bzhag cing // 'byung po kun gyi lusu rnaM bar ldang // 'byung po kun gyi lusu ma nyaM bzhag cing // spu rtse gcig sgo nas rna bar ldang // spu rtse gcig

229a8(phal chen): ya su d+ha bstan pa mdzad kyang zad par mi rung ngo // rgyal ba kun gyis de skad ma gsungs myin// 'gro ba kun gyi rnam smin bsam mi khyab// klu'i rje 'phru' sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang // bsam gtan pa'i rnam

229b9(phal chen): sgro snyan ldan pa 'dod chags zhe sdang can// brtul zhugs grub la dbyangs kyi rje su 'brang // 'jig rten yid 'ong smras kyang tshom par byed// ye shes yon tan med pa cir mi ston// sngags kyi tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang/ 
230a1(phal chen): bzugs pang skad da rgyang / nyin tan yang dang zlaba'i brgya dang / ma san tu mdzes pa san/ dang mam+ba'i gang ldan sgyu ma kha pa yang / l+h+wam

230a3(phal chen): bzhon pa theg pa gdugs bcas par/ go cha gyon bzhin 'jigs pas kun tu byer// lha dobang de dag 'dod chag sAng ldan yang // lus kyi bas 'phrul pas kyis mi khyab ston/ dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang la gnas pa'i
230a4(phal chen): dbang po rnaMs// lus kyi rna 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i glang po shugs ldan pa// 'phrul chen dbang po'i ni 'khor gyur pa// mgo mang suM bcu rtsa gnyis sprul pa byed// mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba
230a5(phal chen): drug drug ste/ so rnaMs re re kun la'ang rdzing gi rnams/ bdun dang bdun bcus rgyas yongasu sprul ba byed// rdzing rnaMs re re kun tu pang po rjes// bdun bdun rgyan gyis rnam brgyan sprul pa byed// pad mo re re la yang lnga'i
230a6(phal chen): bu mo dag/ sgyu rtsal kun mkhas bdun bdun sprul pa byed// de dag rtsed mo kru gar kun la mkhas// sum cu rtse gsuM dbang po de dang rtse// glang po de yang klu'i lus btang zhing // lha rnaMs kun dang mnye zhing 'dra 'ardzu/ 
230a7(phal chen): spyod pa'i tshul ding long spyong kun dang 'thun// glang po mchog kau rnaM 'phrul ci 'drar ltos/ da ni 'dod chag zhe sdang gti mug can// 'od kyang da 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul son byed na// shes rab thabs kyi spobs la byang chur rna / 
230a8(phal chen): da 'dzin brgyas kyang ci rab 'phrul mo byed/ swA gcan ci dag nyi tshul du lus rdzan/ rdo rje'i bzhi la ting pa'i 'thal pong zhing // rgya mtsho'i gzangs ring zhi bar byor tsam rnyed// ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi man yang / 
230a9(phal chen): ngan 'a dang chags na snang gti mug can// 'on kyang de 'ja'i rdzu 'phrul son byed na/ 'jig rten sngon ma bdun nas yongs 'dul ba rdzu 'phrul mtha' las dzes rab nan ma byed/ khas la brgya byin 'thul
230b1(phal chen): rje shA a k+sha rungs 'gyur smra/ n+d+he kyang mtshas mas sa// 'dzag pa'i gzugs kyi mig gang ra 'dun// dardzam 'a bar garapa gsas sa lus lag sa N+Ti rjo
230b2(phal chen): 'o// brgya byin ma nga ras lnga'i min dbang po 'byud// don bsad na su phul gyi stobs dang mthus/ 2 rgyal don du rdo par 'phrul byed na/ 'gro ba ma lus kun ma kyi mgon gyur ba'i// 'amang nas mi 'a
230b3(phal chen): bgron cing mo'u phrul// lha nas skal ba'i lha rdza su rnga yod pa// lha'i las rnams rnam par sbyin pas byung // lha rjes bag med spyod par shes gyur nas// mkha' la rnga'i dbyangs kyang rab tu srog// 'dod pa thos cad mi rtag/ 
230b4(phal chen): mi brten to// 'jig cing mAM gnas dbu ba'i rang bzhi 'dra// sgyu ma smyig rgyu chu'i bzhin// srid pa kun kyang rmyil ma smin gyi dngos// bag med thams cad gcugs can mya ngan ldan// tsam gyo la yin 'chi med la ma yin/ 
230b5(phal chen): ci snyed bag med rnaM par spyod pa'i rnams// bdud kyi chu srin chen pos zos pa yin// yongasu 'dzin pa thas cad sdug bsngal rtsa// skye ba thams cad 'phag pa kun kyi smad// 'dod pa'i yon tan mthar zad rang bzhin/ 
230b6(phal chen): gyis// chos la mos par rtag tu dga' bar gyis// brgya byin lngar bcas rnga'i sa bskul byas nas// kun kyang chos bzangs mdun sar dong byin te// lha mang kun la chos gtazhi ba'i rnaMs// 'dod chag bral dang
230b7(phal chen): rjesu 'thun par rjod// rnga rab da ni gzugs med mi mthong yang // don ce rnga'i sgra ni sgrog byed naka/ bas pa'i tshul bzhin gzug mang ston byed pa// 'gro ba kun gyi don can cir mi byed// lA dang lA min 'jab par gyur pa'i che// 
230b8(phal chen): lha'i bsod nas khyad par mthu stobs kyis// lA rnaMs skul ba'i lha rdzas rnga'i mchog/ lha rjes 'jigs re zhes sgra yang stag/ rdzas bskul lha rnaMs yongasu de gnya ba skye// 'jig med stobs dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur// 
231a1(phal chen): lha min dbang po 'dzag shing dngos gyur nas// de ma thag tu 'dzag shing kun du byed// de bzhin rnga 'dra 'chi'ang med stobs pa'i rnaMs// 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang dbang gyur te// bdud dang nyon mongs
231a2(phal chen): bcom pa'i snying rje can// zhi ba'i sgra sgrog nyon mongs rab du sel// dbang po'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te// dbang po sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur/ gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin rtse bar shes// gcig kyang lha
231a3(phal chen): mo kun kyang de bzhin no// lha mo kun dang dga' bar gnas snang yang // chos bzangs mdun sa kun na'ang de bzhin du// lha rnams kun la chos rab ston pa yang // brgya byin skad gcig gcig gis rno bar 'phrul// badz+ra
231a4(phal chen): byin 'dod chag zhe sdang gti mug can// sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnaMs dga' byed naka/ 'gro don mau smyo spyad pa ci'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'dzag rten dgar mi byed// bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba// de'i dbang
231a5(phal chen): du sos can 'di kun 'dod// las dang nyon mongs kun du 'khri zhags kyis// so so'i skye bo bdud 'khrug des kyang bcing // de ni 'dod chag zhe sdang gti mug can// 'gro ba mang po bdud kyi dbang byed na// dbang bcu'i dbang thob
231a6(phal chen): gyur pa ci rab ste// 'gro ba thas cad rang gi dbang mi gzhog/ stong gsuM bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang / stong gsuM kun gyi tshangs pa'i gnas rnaMs na// ma lus kun du 'dug bar du snang // tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'o/ 
231a7(phal chen): rnaMs kyang sgrog/ de ni 'jig rten pa'i tshangs lam gyi// ngas gtan mngon par shes pas rnaM par 'phrul// 'jig rten yongs 'das bla na med pa'i// bas gtan rna thar gnas pa cir mi 'phrul// dbang phyug chen po'i ye
231a8(phal chen): rdo 'phrul ldes// rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char rnaMs rab bkyeb/ skad cig gcig gis thos cad bgrang ba byed// thigs dga'i bar kyang ma lus des shes na// bskal pa bas gyis ma khyab tshul bslabs te// sang
231a9(phal chen): rgyas mi shes tha na med ma rnaMs/ cirang 'gro ba lus mas cang tsag/ skang cig gcigs sems pazugs pa 'gyur/ mas can pab sbyin pas tsas ma sa// zung las 'dog tan thas pang yangasu byung/ 
231b1(phal chen): rgya mtshar dang la'i gzhal mad khang // sa bon rje mang de las byung // rlung las sngon byung char pa kun du 'bab// sngon mang zhi bar 'gyur ba rlung gi 'gyur// la tog rna bar 'phel ba yang rlung gi ste// 'jig rten phul la/ 
231b2(phal chen): rlung ni bde ba spyad// de ni pha rol phyin lam bslabs te// don pha rol phyin la ma bslab te// sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gri bslab min na'ang // 'jig rten rnam grub mtha' yas ston byed na// rang nyam thob 'dza rab sa rnam/ 
231b3(phal chen): byed rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi tshul tshog ni// bya skad rnaMs dang ji snyed ri dgas skad// khye'u dang bu mo bud med skyes pa'i skad// thas cad sgra bzhin 'gro la rno bar sgrog/ de bzhin smra bstan rang bzhin spras shes nas
231b4(phal chen): bsgribs pa med pa'i spobs pa rab ldan pas// 'gro ba kun du sgra brnyan brjod byas shing // 'jig rten thas cad yid 'ong smra tshim byed// rgya mtsho 'di la ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// 'gro ba thas cad mnyaM snang zhing // chu dang 'byung
231b5(phal chen): rin chen yod mi zad// chu rnaMs bzung bas yong su nges pa med// de bzhin de dag 'gro kun rgyar gsal te// bsod nas pas gtan rnaM thar zad mi shes// shes rab ye shes yon tan de bzhin kun// bsod nas yon tan/ 
231b6(phal chen): tshags kyis ngoms pa med// rgya mtsho'i klu ni rna par rtsa byed na/ sa'i gzhi nas dbang sbyar gnas kyi bar// gling bzhi bcas par sprin cen rgyas par 'gengs// de dag kun kyang brgyan mang sna tshogs ldan// de ni dbang sbyar gnas
231b7(phal chen): 'dzam bu chu klung gi// gser gyi mdog du sprin mang rnaM bar smrab// 'phrul dgar mu tig dam mo'i mdog lA ru// dga' ldan gnasu kha ba ba mo'i mdog/ mche mar mthon ting bai dU ru'i mngag/ sum cu rtsa gsuM du ma swA gas
231b8(phal chen): 'jug rgyal chen gan su shel gyi mdog lta bu// rdo rje mo byed sa mdog rgya mtshor// mi'i gnasu dang ba spos mchog 'dres par sa// klu'i gsu pad mo'i mdog lta bu// gnod sbyin gan su dang ba chu slar mdog/ 
231b9(phal chen): ri lo mdag du lA mini gnas su'o// byang du gser gyi kha dog 'od ston to// gling rnaMs gzhan du'ang sna chog rgyan du'ang ston// 'dzam bu gling du ri gnag 'dra bar te/ sprin rnaMs gang nas ji ltar grub pa bzhin// dbang snar
232a1(phal chen): gnas gsar gyi sprin bstan nas/ nyi ma'i mdag 'dra srog kyang ra' du 'gyed// 'phrul dga' gan su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang // dga' ldan gan su 'dzam bu gser mdog ston// kha ba ba ma'i mdog du mtshe mar te/ 
232a2(phal chen): sum cu rtsa gsum gnasu gser mdog tu// rgyal chen gnas dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ mu tig dmar po'i mdog du rgya mtsho ro// ma ci gan su mthong ting bai dUr+ya// klu'i gnas dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ gnod sbyin gnasu shes
232a3(phal chen): gyi kha dog ste// a sma'i gdog du lha min gan su'o// byang du dang gri snang ba'i rin chen mdog/ gling rnaMs gzhan du'ang rnam phye gzhan dang gzhan/ 'dzam bu gling du 'od 'phro an da rnyil// sprin gyi mtshan nyid tsha'o 'thun klog
232a4(phal chen): kyang 'gyed// de tshe tshangs pa'i dbang sgyur gan su tshad dbyangs// 'brug sgra sgrogs khyed 'phrul dga' rnga'i dbyangs// rol mo'i sgra yang dga' ldan gan su ste/ lha mo gan su mtsho ma dag du'o// suM bcu gsuM du mi 'am ci'i skad du
232a5(phal chen): ste// rgyal chen gan su dri'i skad du'o// ri 'thab dbyangasu rgya mtsho kun tu ste// mi 'am ci'i gan su gling bu'i sgra// klu'i ga na su thal mo brdags pa'i sgra// gnod sbyin gan su klu'i bu mo'i sgra// lA min gan su lA rdzas rda'i
232a6(phal chen): smra/ rgyal mtsho shug skar mi'i gan su'o// dbang sgyur gnas su lha rdzas gsung zhim pa'i// me tog sna tshogs rgyan mad char yang 'bebs// zla ba bzang po'i 'od 'dra 'phrul dgar te// me tog man da ra ba'i 'phreng ba'i char
232a7(phal chen): 'beb so// dga' ldan gnas su rin chen chen po 'char/ rgyan gyi dam pa cha rin can sna tshogs dang // gtsug gi rin chen zla ba 'dra ba dang // gser 'od bzang po'i char pa rang du 'bebs// rgyal mtshan gdugs/ 
232a8(phal chen): dang bya dun bzang po dang / 'brang ba byug brgyan gyi dam pa dang / mu tig dmar po la ltung btag mdog du// rol mo yid 'ang cha ba 'che mdu 'babs// suM bcu gsum du rin chen sna chags te// can tan das/ 
232a9(phal chen): ma mas das lags lur su mag sa mardzas tam pa/ ba cu'i rgyan dang ma 'i jas mer 'ang ga/ ma du 'gyur ba'i la tshas gyinas/ 'a ga nim ngo na dge de rkyen
232b1(phal chen): 'i 'dus la dasas pa sh+tha sa dre du tshud du na Sh+Ta sa / nga na sa
232b2(phal chen): mdu// da 'du gA / byang du na da / me sa ba ga sam ma 19/ nga / nga nas
232b3(phal chen): 'dzi char pas tshogs// 'jam bu gling du chu'adang rab gsal ba'i// cher rnaMs chos bzhin shin du rdza bar 'bebs// me tog 'bras bu sman dang spos dang shing // lo zas de bzhin 'jig rten bde 'phel byed// de ltar sprin
232b4(phal chen): rnams pas sgo mi khyab dang / gr-ig dang 'brug dang char pa ni byed kyang // khyim na khyim g.yo rje pA rtog pa med// klu'i 'phrul yang de ltar bas mi khyab// de lar chu'i rgya mtsho gnas pa'i// kwa'i rno 'phrul bas ya sngon byed na// 
232b5(phal chen): chos kyi rgya mtsho zhug pa'i yon tan bdag/ mtha' yas rna 'phrul mang po cir mi ston// dper bya de dag kun gyi mgo smos ci// skyes bu de dag brjod byas te// dpa'o de dag dpe dang rno bar bral// de dag de 'dra'i rna thar
232b6(phal chen): dbang sgyur ro// mtha' yas blo gros yangs pa'i blo gros can/ mnor bro gros mtha' yas blo gros can// ye shes mchog dang khyad par blo ldan pa'i// rna thar de pa de 'dra'i tshul du bshad // gang gri rna thar 'di dag thos gyu
232b7(phal chen): yid chos 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog pa ni// ngo mtshar skad kyi chos dang de ldan te// maM yul kun na de ni dga' ba byed// 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa// so so'i skye'o'i tshogs na'ang shin tu dkon// dge bas
232b8(phal chen): bsod nams bya pa dngas na// chu'i ba gyis 'dil yid mes 'gyur// gang nA nyan tho theg la yang yid mam pa'i// ma 'jig rten kun na dgan pas// da ba rang rgyal zag la dad pa dkon// na chen dang byang / 
233a1(phal chen): shA shin tu dkon/ ga rten 'di sa zhugs pasod pa ste// 'di 'dra chos la dang bshin du dkon// 'dzin cing snrel byed smos kyang tsa gwa ta/ yang dgas dang 'jug papa smos ma dgas// la lang zung gsur nga
233a2(phal chen): mang zangs pa/ bsal pa 'dzin cid dmag yo khyer rnyed na'angs 'ad 'dra chos la dang bzud pa 'o// de 'drang mi dka' bar brtsib ma yin / la las gang gsum rdul snyed seMs ca rjes// dang 'akun gyi bskal par ban
233a3(phal chen): bkur na'ang / 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa'i// bsod nas ci 'dra de 'dra de la min/ la la zhing bcur re dang mtshor bcas pa// lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha' dbyings 'dzin kyang / 'di 'dra'i chos la yid chas dang / 
233a4(phal chen): byed pa'i// dka' ba de 'dra de la yod pa min// la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can nas// bde ba kun gyi bskul bar bsnyen bkur kyang // 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa'i/ bsod nas ci 'ang de 'dra de la min// la las
233a5(phal chen): gang po nu rdul snyed sangs rgyas rjes// bskal du bde ba kun gyis bsnyen bkur te/ la lA le'u 'di yong su bzung byas nas// bsod nas 'di ni de las khyad par 'phags// rjes thar de dag yongasu bstan pa'i tshe// phyog bcu'i zhing rje
233a6(phal chen): thas cad g.yos pa gyur/ lha dang bdud kyis gnas rnaMs zil gyis mnan// 'on kyang bkye bas ngan song rab du zhi// phyog bcu kun gyi ma'i seng ge rnaMs// thas cad kun gyis mngon par zhal bstan te// phyag brgyad mtha' yas yon
233a7(phal chen): rkyen mang ma dga' mab 'i la dpal gyi mgal bzhag par gyur/ phyog sa mnil gyis mgal thug ma da / sangs kyis de dag kun gyi gzung brjod pa/ man dag kyang kyis pan 'i shad kyis// legs par ya
233a8(phal chen): rjesrung dad dgyes// / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba las/ bzang po'i dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu bdun par// shin tu rgyas pa' chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas
233a9(phal chen): la ba che zhes bya ba/ bas pa nyi shu pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thas cad dang de bzhin du la phyogs dang / rub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi thug sa dang / 
233b1(phal chen): mu macoms mas dang / rlub phyogs mtshams dang / nub byung thobs canas dang / 'og mra grwa dang / gang gaphyogs kyi 'jig rten rgyalam thas cad du blang ban pa 'di las grags pablang ba'i pa sa
233b2(phal chen): na gshegs par dag bzhin du rmugs par dang // byang chub sos dpa' da dag kyang da bzhin gshegs pa ni sbyi gyi rnabs kyi can pa cing dra bzhin gsheg pa'i nad tu rlung na labad pas mams
233b3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa des 'dul bar byang chung kyi shing dru na rab kyi rtse ma ma ma'i dbang ba da byin gyi khang pa ni bar rgyal ba gang na ba der gshegs par snang ngo // 'di lar
233b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa 'di ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khaMs thas cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyi rla snga ma dag kyang mnyam
233b5(phal chen): bar snang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rno bar rgyal ba'i khang pa log su mngon par gshegs brgyang ring po nas mthong nas/ rna bar rgyal ba'i khang pa'i nang du ring ba'i gzugasu rdzu 'phru
233b6(phal chen): gyi rang bzhin seng ge'i gdan// phyogs rnaM bar snang ba'i snying po can pog re stong phrag bcus brgyan pa// gser gyi dra ba stong phrag bcus kun tu bres pa// gan yol stong phrag bcus bla re bres pa/ gdugs stong shin
233b7(phal chen): tu bzung ba/ dar gyi ljang ldi stong phrag bcu rab tu sbyangs pa// mu tig gi se mo do stong phrag bcus dga' dga' ltar byas pa/ gos stong phrag bcus mngon par dkab ba/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcus mdun du byas pa// tshangs/ 
233b8(phal chen): pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'od gzer stong phrag bcus shin tu snang bar gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das kyi bdan du bshes so// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnaM par
233b9(phal chen): rgyal bar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan pa shes pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gi khaMs thos cad kyi ri rab rtse mo dag du yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag gis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdan
234a1(phal chen): dag nam na 'jab dang brtan da 'ang dang shes par gyur to// de nas ma dbang po 'anadu phyin gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyi bdan sangag 'dzab shes nas/ rjes dang mamatshan pa bcom ldan 'das pa/ 
234a2(phal chen): na ba dang tham ma sbyar te// phyag 'tshal nas/ bco ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegasu gsol/ 'der bar gsheg pa gshes su gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcob yangs
234a3(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs ni gsol to// de nas bco ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi spyan drangs nas/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs so// dzaM ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa
234a4(phal chen): de bzhin du// 'jig rten gyi khams thas cad kyi lha'i khang pa dag du yang gshegs par snang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi khang pa thos cad du// glu dang rol ma
234a5(phal chen): dang sil snyan brgya phrag mang po dag btang ste zhi bar byas nas/ yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas snga ma rnaMs la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rje su dran nas/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// kra shis de ba gang
234a6(phal chen): zhig gis// thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od srungs rig skyes pa/ rnam par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang kra shis legs gyur cig/ kra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// gser thub bsgrags pa med par rab du/ 
234a7(phal chen): gzigs pa de// rin chen sna tshog gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang kra shis legs gyur cig/ kra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ bsod bskyabs gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba de// rtse mo mchog du gshegs gyur pa// des ni
234a8(phal chen): 'dir yang kra shis legs gyur cing // kra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ thas cad mnga' ba dgra tsom dri ma gsuM sel ba// mtshad spu'i rtse mo gshegs gyur pa// dwe ni 'dir yang kra shis legs gyur cig// kra shis daM ba gang zhig/ 
234a9(phal chen): sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgongs pa zil ldem non pa/ rin chen sna tsho ga gshegs gyur pa'i// des ni 'dir yang wa kyis legs gyur cig/ kra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// rnam par gzigs pa skyes bu'i zla ba mi'i 'dzin/ 
234b1(phal chen): rin chen rgyan du gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang kra shis legs gyur cig/ kla shis de ba gang zhig gis// shin du rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing brtan d+ha de/ ma la ya'i rtser gshegaso// des ni 'dir yang 'acoM
234b2(phal chen): lags gyur cig/ kwa shis de pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas ston mchog thogs pa mi mnga' ba/ dri med zla bar gshegs gyur ba// des ni 'dir yang kra shis legs gyur cig/ kra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 8r+tha/ 
234b3(phal chen): badz+ra ma mod par gshegs gyur pa/ des ni 'dir yang kra shis legs gyur cig/ kra shis rno ba gang zhig gis/ mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' bde// 'od gzer 'dra bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir/ 
234b4(phal chen): yang kra shis leg gyur cig/ ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa/ glur blangs te tshigasu bcad pa de bzhin du// 'jig rten gyi/ 
234b5(phal chen): khaMs thas cad ni yong sangs rgyas kyi mthus lnga'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa dag glur len cing // tshig su gcod/ 
234b6(phal chen): par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rna bar rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs nas// skyil mo grung bcas te bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das ci ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thas cad na yang de bzhi
234b7(phal chen): gshegs pa dag ba dan de la bzhugs par sna // bcoM ldan 'das de ltar bzhug ma thag du// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnaM par rgyal ba'i khang pa de yang suM cu rtsa gsum thams cad kyi khang pa dang // lha'i ris tsam du ches
234b8(phal chen): gyur te// 'di na ci lta ba de ltar 'jig rten gyi khaMs thas cad na yang de bzhin no// // shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mo gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ 
234b9(phal chen): bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyog bcu nas/ byang chub ses dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khas sangs rgyas kyi zhas
235a1(phal chen): rdul shin du phra ba zed kyi pha rol nas 'das pa sha sa ga ste// byang chub sas dpa' re re zhing yang / byang chub sos dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan cig tu phyin par gyur to// byang chub
235a2(phal chen): ses dpa'i de dag thos cad kyang tshad 'di nas bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar chos kyi tha za'i dang // zas pa tha gros dang // dpal gyi blu gas dang / yon tan thA gras dang / btsun 'grus tha gros dang / dag bal khri zas dang / 
235a3(phal chen): ye shes zla gros dang / bdan pa'i blo zas dang / mchog gi tha gros dang / dam pa'i blo gros dag go// byang chub sos dpa'a'i ri dag zas cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khas ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa ste/ 'di ltar/ 
235a4(phal chen): dbang po'i me tog dang / pad mo'i me tog dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / ud pa la'i me tog dang / rdo rje'i me tog dang / spos kyi me tog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i me tog dang / 'od zer gyi me tog dang / ldum bu'i me tog dang
235a5(phal chen): ni mkha'i me tog dag go// byang chub sos dpa' de dag thos cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar zla ba gzhan ma yin pa dang / zla ba ma nyams
235a6(phal chen): ba dang / zla ba mi g.yo ba dang / zla ba mi skul pa dang / zla ba chu'i lha dang / zla ba thog pa med pa dang / zla ba'i 'od gzer dang / zla ba rdul med pa dang / zla brna par grub pa dag go// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' de
235a7(phal chen): dag rdzas cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang nas// gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogasu bstan te/ seng ge'i khri rna par snang ba'i snying po can dag mngon
235a8(phal chen): par sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khas 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la byang chub sems dpa' rjes lags pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khaMs thas cad kyi gling bzhi pa thas cad
235a9(phal chen): dang lce'i dbang po'o khang pa kun na yang de bzhin te// byang chub ses dpa' mang de skad ces bya ba sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khas kyang de skad ces bya ba'i nas 'ongs pa sha stag go// de bzhin gshegs/ 
235b1(phal chen): pa yang mtshan de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa sha stag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs kyi mthe bo gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba phrag stong bkye ste/ phyog bcu thas cad snang bar byas nas
235b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khas thas cad kyang bstan to// byang chub seMs dpa' de dag thas cad kyis kying 'jig rten gyi khas de dag thas cad dang / ri rab kyi rtse mo thas cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rna bar 'phrul pa yod pa
235b3(phal chen): thas cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// de nas byang chub ses dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rno bar 'altas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// snang ba dri ma med la ltos// ri rab
235b4(phal chen): mo thas cad la// mgon po dag ni rab du snang // rna par rgyal ba kun na bzhugs// lha'i rgyal po thas cad kyis// spyan drangs shing ni gshegs par gyur// kun kyang sangs rgyas bcu dag gi// rab du gsheg pA mngon
235b5(phal chen): par ston// kyang kyi 'khor kyang gcig pa ste// byang chub seMs dpa' mang po lhags// phyog bcu dag nas 'ongs gyur cing // yid du 'ong ba'i stan la 'khod// kun gyi ming yang 'di nyid de// ji ltar nged la btag pa bzhin// 
235b6(phal chen): 'jig rten khas kyi ming dag kyang // de skad dag nas kun kyang 'ongs// 'dzag rten khas rjes thos cad na// drang srong chen po'i mtshan kyang de// de na tshangs spyod bla med la// the tsom med par de dag spyod// kye ma rgyal sras khyed
235b7(phal chen): sa cig tu drang srong chen po'i byin gyi rlabs// 'dzam bu gling rnaMs thas cad nA// rgyal ba 'di na bzhugs ma byed// bdag cag rnas ni 'di snye du// ri rab rtsol 'deg shes ste/ 'jig rten pos rjes kun na'ang // sangs
235b8(phal chen): rgyas ngomachar ma tshe// 'jog tan las rnas thams cad na// byang chub mchog tu ses btang 'ang // de dge smon lam 'di btab ste// byang chub sbring par 'du spyod// 'dag radage na chung meng pas// gang theg mtshag na nan
235b9(phal chen): byed byeng // chom kyi dbyings la ma chags te// de nag lus kyang mi shes so// gang gis 'jig rten mun lal cing // thams cad dus rnaMs snang ba// de la 'dra ba gang yang med// de ni shes par ci ltang rung / de nas bya'i
236a1(phal chen): smrang sa hU~M phyung smra smra// gas da pa dag sna/ 'dzi panan ma nasan// brnal pa ya ba byu / 'ang tan pa na gyu
236a2(phal chen): dag go// chos nyid de ni shes pa min// mtshan ma dag la spyod pa'i rjes// gti mug 'dra ba 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas gang gis ma mthong ba// 'khor ba'i brtson rang mdongs pa yin// chos rjes 'di dag pa/ 
236a3(phal chen): byas na// rang bzhin shes par mi rung ste// skye dang 'chi 'phor gyur pa ri rjes// mying ce du ni bstan pa yin// chos rnaMs gang yang 'pho ba med// gang yang de bzhin skye ba med// chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur na// sangs rgyas
236a4(phal chen): kun na rab du snad // gzung du med cing bltar med de// chos kyi rnaMs ni rang bzhin gyis// dngos po med pa'i mtha' shes na// sangs rgyas rjes la tshad kyang med// tshad med pa'i chos rjes kyi// rang bzhin gang gis yongs
236a5(phal chen): shes pa// des ni ci zhig yod ces par// mthong bar gyur pa gang yang med// gang rnaMs mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang ba// de dag byis pa'i chos nyid de// de phyir mtshan nyid kun med pa'i// sangs rgyas rnaMs kyang mi mthong ngo // 
236a6(phal chen): dus gsum byung ba'i thub pa rnaMs/ mtshan rab kun dang ldan pa ste// mi gnas tshul du bzhugs pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings la g.yo ba med// la la dgal chos kyang brjod// gang la the tsam mi mnga' ba// yang dag sa / 
236a7(phal chen): rgyas de ring mthong // sangs rgyas rjes kyi chos nyid 'di// chos kyi blo gros 'dis brjod de// de thos nas kyang bdag cag gis// sangs rgyas byang chub mas yas shes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi blo gros kyi/ 
236a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnas par bltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso/ kye ma sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba// ye shes shes rab shin tu che// de la 'jig rten shin tu rmongs// sangs rgya/ 
236a9(phal chen): chos ni ba sa mi khyab// tshul bzhin ma yin 'du shes kyis// byis pa rjes ni sos byed pas// de phyir 'du shes kun sbyangs pa'i// sangs rgyas rnaMs ni mi mthong // shes rab chung ba thos cad ni// phung po'i 'du shes rnaMs la gnas
236b1(phal chen): rna pa rgya sgru ga/ nga bzhidu gsheg pa sa ma dzad / dngos med dang su bshad pa ni// dag gi dngas gas bya yin// sa nas thas pa das kyis shing/ rgyas ba rnam par snang mang las// stan cang rung du
236b2(phal chen): bzhin du// ma 'ongs rjes kyang bun ma ga// ma 'ongs pa'i tshul shes pas// sangs rgyas pas kyis mi khyab 'os// dza ltar snang ba mang ba'aM// mun pa'i nang na gzugs ma snang // de bzhin chos rnaMs ma bshad pa ma
236b3(phal chen): gre bA ma rung ngo // dza ltar dri ma ldan mig gis// bsal ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba// de bzhin sos ni ma sbyangs pa// sangs rgyas chos ni mi mthong ngo // ji ltar nyi ma bsgribs med pa ka/ rab rib can gyis mi mthong ba// de banim
236b4(phal chen): phug na gnas sems kyis// sangs rgyas dag ni mi mthong // de bas mig ni rno bar spyongs// gzugs kyi 'du shes rno bar sgoms// chos rnaMs mthong ba med pa yis// 'ong mdzad rab du mthong ba yin// ji ltar sngon thos
236b5(phal chen): kun bshad cing // bdag gis ji ltar thos pa bzhin// sangs rgyas byang chub mi bstongs pa// rna bar snang mdzad rab du mthong // de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan blo gros gyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyog bcur
236b6(phal chen): rno bar ltas te ka/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcang ba 'di dag smra so// gnas med pa'i chos rnams la// gnas ni yongasu brtag pas na// de phyir srid pa'i brtson ra na// byis pa rnaMs ni rab du 'khod// brjod pas brjod du mi rung / 
236b7(phal chen): b+h+rUM gzhan rnaMs kyis rno bar brtags// des ni yongasu bsgribs byas pas// bdag gi sems kyang rab rmongs byed// shes rab chung la li nor cing // bdag gi sems la mi mkhas pa// byin ci log gi dz+ra dag gis/ 
236b8(phal chen): mi bzad lus ni 'phel bar byed// gang gi stong pa ma mthong ba// de dag 'khor zhing te yang nga / chos mig pas kyis mi khyab pa'i// mig kyang ba de la yod pa man// dbas tshig ni spyang bar gyis// bas pa rnaMs gang rnas pa
236b9(phal chen): sos ta gang phyir bdag cag sngan chang du// bder gshegs ma mthong chung kyang pos// yang dag sangs rgyas mthong na'ang // gang gi seMs la chag mad pa// rje ni sangs rgyas ci byung ba'i// chos nas de dag rang du thong // gang gi/ ra
237a1(phal chen): zad pa 'a// yang kyi mchos nyid na/ yang ngan sangs rgyas rnaMs mas pashad // rang bzhin thams cadu// shrI ba med cing 'tsho'i med// sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'ja ba// dpal gyis thos na sngon snyan te// de la
237a2(phal chen): bdag gis thos nas kyang // sangs rgyas chos nyid shes ma gyur// de nas byang chub sos dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis phyog bcur rna par bltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// rje bar rtog la spyod pa/ 
237a3(phal chen): yi mig ni shin du 'khrul ba yin te 'khrul bar mthong ba log pa ste// sangs rgyas la ni log mi mnga'// gang gi log par shes gyur te// yang dag ci bzhin ma nor la// yang dag ma yin 'din shes na// sangs rgyas / 
237a4(phal chen): med mthong ba yin// mthong ba dag gi dri mar 'gyur// rnam par mthong na de med de// sangs rgyas rnaMs ni mthong dang bral// de bas rno bar gzigs shes bya// de ni 'jig rten spyod pa ste// 'dzag rten de yang rno bar brtags/ 
237a5(phal chen): 'jig rten 'jig par shes gyur na// snang ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten rnaMs kyi snang ba 'di// 'jig rten mtshan nyid snang ba ste// yang dag ci bzhin mnyaM byas shing // de ltar mthong na mthong ba'o// de dag lhar many+dzu
237a6(phal chen): nyon mongs med/ dbang du gyur cing zag pa med/ ga gI tha dad med mthong ba// dngos por brtags pa ma yin// rtog dang rna par rtag pa'i// sangs rgyas chos nas brjod pa ste// de dag yod pa ma yin pa// rang bzhin de// 
237a7(phal chen): phyir sbyangs pa yin// da ga rang bzhin rna par dag// nama' bzhin du mtshan nyid med/ da dgal ni stod pa mang / mangs padz+ra hUM ya rlom// tsam rnam lan mos med de/ sa kyi 'du shes rje bskams shing / 
237a8(phal chen): yang ma bzlas pa// des ni thub can mamang ba yin// ji ltar yin tanams badzad ga/ da lar yang dag ngas rgyas mdzang // de mthong bas 'du byed kun// rang bzhin gyis kyang na bang 'ang // da ras byang chub seMs dpa'
237b1(phal chen): na nu'i zla gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyog bca na par bltas te// de'i ma tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras// kye sa sangs rgyas dpal chen nas// de bzhin gsheg pa chang can med do// na grol / 
237b2(phal chen): ni sdig mi mnga'// 'jig rten mthar phyin 'gal ba'o// yang dag ci bzhin mnor par// bskal pa rnas ni nang medra bar// ji ltar mkhas pas mthong ba bzhin// 'jig rten snan mas rab du gzigs// 'du byed
237b3(phal chen): cad skad cig mar// so so'i spyibo de dga' gangs// na mkha'i khas ni gzung byas shing // de dag de phyir khom pa med// bong pa med ces bya ba ni// dzaM yang brjod pa med pa ste// khom pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// khom pa ngas
237b4(phal chen): gyi mi khyab thob// gang la dngos po med pa'i// mi zad khom pa med par bshad// yod pa'i rang bzhin shes gyur na// de ni grag chen mthong ba yin// mthong ba med pa mthong zhes bya// mthong ba dag gi yod pa ni// ma bsgom
237b5(phal chen): pa ni rnam par bsgoms// ji ltar lta ba sus mthong ba// de dag gri ni lta ba bzhin// gang las sangs rgyas smos pa yid/ de dag chos rnaMs zhig pa yin// ji ltar thub pas bstan pa bzhin// sangs rgyas yongasu sus
237b6(phal chen): mthong ba// de ni 'jig rten snang bar byed// rgyal ba rno bar snang mdzade bzhi// chos rnaMs kyi ni snang ba gcig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab du bstan// dri ni brtson blo brtan pa bde// chos mang byed pa rab tu ston// yod dang med pa
237b7(phal chen): shes byas te// gang gi 'du shes hU~M bsdus pa// des ni sangs rgyas mthong ba ste/ yang dag mtha' la rab du gnas// de nas byang chub ses dpa' ye shwe blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rje bar danas
237b8(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigasu bca pa 'di dag smras// rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di thos na// snang ba bdag cag shes par gyur// b+hag bcu kun tu snang ba'i// yang dag sangs rgyas des kyang mdzad// seMs can dang bzhir yod gyur du// de rje
237b9(phal chen): sos can g.yang sa ste/ 'di la tsaM yang yod pa min// tshi gi laM rnas bsdus pa'o// byin pa 'dzin dang bcas pa'i rnaMs// bdag lus yang dag 'dzin pa la// sangs rgyas snang bar mi 'gyur te// de bzhin gsheg pa gzung ba med/ 
238a1(phal chen): yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing // gang nas mig yod ma yin bya// de dag bskal pa grangs med du// sred pa'i gang can mtshan 'khor// nyon mongs can ni 'khor bar bshad// nyon mongs med pa mya ngan sa
238a2(phal chen): mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yang // rang bzhin rnyed par mi rung ngo // 'khor zhes bya ba bdag yin te// mya ngan 'das pa brjod pa yin// 'phags pa'i chos rnaMs ma skyes pa// b+h+ra ma dag ni mi sheso// de ni sangs rgyas rgya
238a3(phal chen): ba 'di// de yin 'dra'i 'du shes can// de dag sangs rgyas mi mthong ste// tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log// zhi ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bar// gang gis zhi bshes gyur pa// des ni tshig gi la 'das pa'i// yang dag sangs/ 
238a4(phal chen): rgyas rab du mthong // chos rnaMs kun gyi spyod pa ni// rab du brjod kyang bstan pa med// 'on kyang mnyam pa nyid du blta// rgyal ba chos rnaMs kun dang mnyam// yang dag sangs rgyas mtha' dbung med// thog ma dag dang
238a5(phal chen): mtha' mar yang // 'gal med rtsa ba med pas na// des ni sangs rgyas de byar brjod// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' bden pa'i blo gros sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// phyog bcur rna par bltas te// de'i tshe

238a7(phal chen): med sprul bsngal sun cing byung // 'on kyang bde gshegs mthos pas// bdag cag 'khor las ma gu'o// de bzhin ma nor chos r+b+ba nas// yang dag nyid du rtoms myur te/ gang la rtogs pa med pa'i dz+nyAs/
